01IO012.description: Give an ally +2|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
01IO012.flavorText: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma
01IO012.name: Twin Disciplines

01IO015.description: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
01IO015.name: Yasuo

01IO015T1.description: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I strike it.
01IO015T1.name: Yasuo

01IO015T2.description:
Stun an attacking enemy.
Create a Yasuo in your deck.
01IO015T2.name: Yasuo's Steel Tempest

01IO020.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
01IO020.flavorText: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."
01IO020.name: Keeper of Masks

01IO045.description: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
01IO045.flavorText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem
01IO045.name: Herald of Spring

01IO008.description: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
01IO008.flavorText: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"
01IO008.name: Fae Bladetwirler

01IO040.flavorText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."
01IO040.name: Kinkou Lifeblade

01IO041.description: Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
01IO041.flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."
01IO041.name: Karma

01IO041T1.description:
Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
When you play a spell, copy it with the same targets.
01IO041T1.flavorText: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."
01IO041T1.name: Karma

01IO041T2.description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
Create a Karma in your deck.
01IO041T2.flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
01IO041T2.name: Karma's Insight of Ages

01IO011.flavorText: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.
01IO011.name: Recall

01IO009.description: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
01IO009.levelupDescription: I've seen myself or my shadows strike the enemy Nexus twice.
01IO009.flavorText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."
01IO009.name: Zed

01IO009T2.description: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats and positive keywords.
01IO009T2.flavorText: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."
01IO009T2.name: Zed

01IO009T3.description:
Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
Create a Zed in your deck.
01IO009T3.flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
01IO009T3.name: Zed's Shadowshift

01IO009T1.flavorText: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.
01IO009T1.name: Living Shadow

01IO014.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
01IO014.flavorText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.
01IO014.name: Greenglade Elder

01IO005.flavorText: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand
01IO005.name: Nimble Poro

01IO044.description: To play me, Recall an ally.
01IO044.flavorText: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."
01IO044.name: Navori Conspirator

01IO023.description: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
01IO023.flavorText:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands
01IO023.name: Jeweled Protector

01IO029.flavorText: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma
01IO029.name: Sown Seeds

01IO003.description: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
01IO003.flavorText: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed
01IO003.name: Death Mark

01IO047.flavorText: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.
01IO047.name: Shadow Flare

01IO026.description: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
01IO026.flavorText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”
01IO026.name: Inspiring Mentor

01IO024.description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
01IO024.flavorText: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed
01IO024.name: Dawn and Dusk

01IO028.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
01IO028.name: Scaled Snapper

01IO057.flavorText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.
01IO057.name: Shadow Assassin

01IO028T2.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
01IO028T2.name: Scaled Snapper

01IO028T1.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
01IO028T1.name: Scaled Snapper

01IO032.description: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
01IO032.levelupDescription: I've seen allies gain Barrier 5+ times.
01IO032.flavorText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."
01IO032.name: Shen

01IO032T1.description:
Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
When an ally gets Barrier, give it +3|+0 this round.
01IO032T1.flavorText: "...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other."
01IO032T1.name: Shen

01IO032T2.description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
Create a Shen in your deck.
01IO032T2.name: Shen's Stand United

01IO013.flavorText: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed
01IO013.name: Shadow Fiend

01IO018.description: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
01IO018.flavorText: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.
01IO018.name: Rush

01IO056.flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."
01IO056.name: Yone, Windchaser

01IO056T1.flavorText: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser
01IO056T1.name: Staggering Strikes

01IO016.description: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
01IO016.flavorText:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands
01IO016.name: Zephyr Sage

01IO036.description: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
01IO036.flavorText: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."
01IO036.name: Greenglade Lookout

01IO033.flavorText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand
01IO033.name: Minah Swiftfoot

01IO001.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
01IO001.flavorText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma
01IO001.name: Ritual of Renewal

01IO010.description: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
01IO010.name: Stand United

01IO022.description: Give an ally Elusive this round.
01IO022.flavorText: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed
01IO022.name: Ghost

01IO021.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
01IO021.flavorText:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands
01IO021.name: Windfarer Hatchling

01IO054.description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
01IO054.flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
01IO054.name: Insight of Ages

01IO027.description: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
01IO027.flavorText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."
01IO027.name: Silent Shadowseer

01IO031.description: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
01IO031.flavorText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.
01IO031.name: Cloud Drinker

01IO002.flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.
01IO002.name: Will of Ionia

01IO033T1.flavorText: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand
01IO033T1.name: Skyward Strikes

01IO017.description: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
01IO017.flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"
01IO017.name: Navori Bladescout

01IO042.description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
01IO042.flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"
01IO042.name: Sparring Student

01IO006.description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
01IO006.flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"
01IO006.name: Greenglade Duo

01IO050.description: Allegiance: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
01IO050.flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.
01IO050.name: Kinkou Wayfinder

01IO048.flavorText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."
01IO048.name: Yusari

01IO007.description: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
01IO007.flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”
01IO007.name: Ren Shadowblade

01IO053.flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."
01IO053.name: Emerald Awakener

01IO004.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
01IO004.flavorText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.
01IO004.name: Health Potion

01IO049.description: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
01IO049.name: Deny

01IO052.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
01IO052.flavorText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”
01IO052.name: Navori Highwayman

01IO052T1.flavorText: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.
01IO052T1.name: Navori Brigand

01IO030.flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General
01IO030.name: The Empyrean

01IO019.description: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
01IO019.flavorText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."
01IO019.name: Greenglade Caretaker

01IO037.description: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
01IO037.flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen
01IO037.name: Spirit's Refuge

01IO043.flavorText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."
01IO043.name: Rivershaper

01IO038.description: When I'm summoned, Recall all other allies.
01IO038.flavorText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."
01IO038.name: Solitary Monk

01IO039.description: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
01IO039.flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
01IO039.name: Shadowshift

01IO055.description:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
01IO055.flavorText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen
01IO055.name: Ki Guardian

01NX020.description: When I'm summoned or Strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
01NX020.levelupDescription: I've struck with 2+ total Spinning Axes.
01NX020.flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."
01NX020.name: Draven

01NX020T3.description: When I'm summoned or Strike: Create 2 Spinning Axes in hand.
01NX020T3.name: Draven

01NX020T2.description:
A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
Create a Draven in your deck.
01NX020T2.name: Draven's Whirling Death

01NX020T1.description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
01NX020T1.flavorText: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena regular
01NX020T1.name: Spinning Axe

01NX006.description: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
01NX006.flavorText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...
01NX006.name: Vladimir

01NX006T4.description: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
01NX006T4.name: Crimson Pact

01NX006T2.description: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
01NX006T2.name: Crimson Pact

01NX006T1.description: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
01NX006T1.flavorText: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."
01NX006T1.name: Vladimir

01NX006T3.description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a Vladimir in your deck.
01NX006T3.flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
01NX006T3.name: Vladimir's Transfusion

01NX004.description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
01NX004.flavorText: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.
01NX004.name: Culling Strike

01NX048.description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
01NX048.flavorText: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"
01NX048.name: Crimson Curator

01NX038.levelupDescription: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
01NX038.flavorText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain
01NX038.name: Darius

01NX023.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
01NX023.flavorText: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.
01NX023.name: Arachnoid Host

01NX013.description: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
01NX013.flavorText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain
01NX013.name: Decisive Maneuver

01NX046.flavorText: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat
01NX046.name: Arachnoid Sentry

01NX046T1.flavorText: It was not the kiss he had in mind.
01NX046T1.name: Paralyzing Bite

01NX047.description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
01NX047.flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
01NX047.name: Transfusion

01NX040.description: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
01NX040.flavorText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain
01NX040.name: Legion Saboteur

01NX038T2.flavorText: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"
01NX038T2.name: Darius

01NX038T1.description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
01NX038T1.flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
01NX038T1.name: Darius' Decimate

01NX025.flavorText: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran
01NX025.name: Brothers' Bond

01NX055.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
01NX055.flavorText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise
01NX055.name: House Spider

01NX030.description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
01NX030.flavorText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"
01NX030.name: Crimson Disciple

01NX007.description: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
01NX007.flavorText: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.
01NX007.name: Arena Battlecaster

01NX021.description: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
01NX021.flavorText: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.
01NX021.name: Legion Marauder

01NX009.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
01NX009.flavorText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.
01NX009.name: Crowd Favorite

01NX011.description: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
01NX011.name: Whirling Death

01NX053.description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
01NX053.name: Reckoning

01NX054.description: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
01NX054.flavorText: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster
01NX054.name: Intimidating Roar

01NX029.description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
01NX029.flavorText: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.
01NX029.name: Legion Veteran

01NX014.description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
01NX014.flavorText: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."
01NX014.name: Shiraza the Blade

01NX042.description: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
01NX042.levelupDescription: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
01NX042.flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
01NX042.name: Katarina

01NX042T2.description:
When I'm summoned, Rally and create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand. It costs 0.
Strike: Recall me.
01NX042T2.flavorText: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian border guard
01NX042T2.name: Katarina

01NX042T1.description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a Katarina in your deck.
01NX042T1.name: Katarina's Death Lotus

01NX051.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
01NX051.flavorText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.
01NX051.name: Captain Farron

01NX012.flavorText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.
01NX012.name: Legion Rearguard

01NX043.flavorText: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina
01NX043.name: Blade's Edge

01NX037.description: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
01NX037.flavorText: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.
01NX037.name: Legion Grenadier

01NX010.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
01NX010.flavorText: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.
01NX010.name: Legion General

01NX017.description: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
01NX017.flavorText: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.
01NX017.name: Legion Drummer

01NX003.description: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
01NX003.flavorText: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."
01NX003.name: Arena Bookie

01NX039.description: When played or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
01NX039.flavorText: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain
01NX039.name: Vision

01NX041.flavorText: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius
01NX041.name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker

01NX036.description: Round Start: Stun the weakest enemy.
01NX036.flavorText: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."
01NX036.name: Minotaur Reckoner

01NX044.flavorText:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."
01NX044.name: Battering Ram

01NX005.description: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
01NX005.flavorText: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."
01NX005.name: Crimson Aristocrat

01NX016.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
01NX016.flavorText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran
01NX016.name: Trifarian Hopeful

01NX019.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
01NX019.flavorText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius
01NX019.name: Might

01NX015.flavorText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.
01NX015.name: Precious Pet

01NX056.description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
01NX056.flavorText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.
01NX056.name: Shunpo

01NX033.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
01NX033.flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General
01NX033.name: Trifarian Assessor

01NX052.description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
01NX052.flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.
01NX052.name: Blood for Blood

01NX045.flavorText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie
01NX045.name: Savage Reckoner

01NX031.flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.
01NX031.name: Trifarian Gloryseeker

01NX002.flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
01NX002.name: Decimate

01NX008.flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.
01NX008.name: Basilisk Rider

01NX034.flavorText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius
01NX034.name: Affectionate Poro

01NX035.description: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
01NX035.flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"
01NX035.name: Draven's Biggest Fan

01NX026.flavorText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain
01NX026.name: Reckless Trifarian

01NX027.flavorText:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom
01NX027.name: Elixir of Wrath

01NX022.description: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
01NX022.flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.
01NX022.name: Noxian Guillotine

01NX032.description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
01NX032.flavorText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."
01NX032.name: Crimson Awakener

01NX024.description: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
01NX024.flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."
01NX024.name: Kato The Arm

01NX049.flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc
01NX049.name: Guile

01DE031.description: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
01DE031.flavorText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"
01DE031.name: Dawnspeakers

01DE022.levelupDescription: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.
01DE022.flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."
01DE022.name: Lucian

01DE019.description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
01DE019.flavorText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen
01DE019.name: Mobilize

01DE042.levelupDescription: I've seen you play 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
01DE042.flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
01DE042.name: Lux

01DE042T1.description:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Create a Lux in your deck.
01DE042T1.flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
01DE042T1.name: Lux's Prismatic Barrier

01DE042T2.description: When you play 6+ mana of spells, create a Final Spark in hand.
01DE042T2.name: Lux

01DE042T3.description: Deal 4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus instead.
01DE042T3.flavorText: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux
01DE042T3.name: Final Spark

01DE010.description: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
01DE010.flavorText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen
01DE010.name: Swiftwing Lancer

01DE020.flavorText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."
01DE020.name: Vanguard Defender

01DE034.description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
01DE034.flavorText: Wars are won in the forge.
01DE034.name: Battlesmith

01DE002.flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”
01DE002.name: Tianna Crownguard

01DE012.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
01DE012.flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.
01DE012.name: Garen

01DE012T1.description:
When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
Round Start: Rally.
01DE012T1.flavorText: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”
01DE012T1.name: Garen

01DE012T2.description:
A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
Create a Garen in your deck.
01DE012T2.name: Garen's Judgment

01DE017.description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
01DE017.flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.
01DE017.name: Stand Alone

01DE045.flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."
01DE045.name: Fiora

01DE052.description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
01DE052.flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen
01DE052.name: Brightsteel Formation

01DE021.flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
01DE021.name: Relentless Pursuit

01DE022T2.description:
Grant an ally +1|+1.
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
01DE022T2.flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
01DE022T2.name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit

01DE022T1.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
01DE022T1.flavorText: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."
01DE022T1.name: Lucian

01DE025.flavorText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader
01DE025.name: Detain

01DE007.description: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
01DE007.name: Judgment

01DE055.description: Play: Give an ally Challenger this round.
01DE055.flavorText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign
01DE055.name: Laurent Duelist

01DE048.description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
01DE048.flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook
01DE048.name: Mageseeker Inciter

01DE001.flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard
01DE001.name: Vanguard Bannerman

01DE043.description: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
01DE043.flavorText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.
01DE043.name: War Chefs

01DE049.flavorText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant
01DE049.name: Plucky Poro

01DE053.description: Strike: Create in hand another random Challenger follower from your regions.
01DE053.name: Laurent Chevalier

01DE033.description: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
01DE033.flavorText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian
01DE033.name: Remembrance

01DE045T1.description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
01DE045T1.name: Fiora

01DE045T2.description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
Create a Fiora in your deck.
01DE045T2.flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
01DE045T2.name: Fiora's Riposte

01DE044.description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
01DE044.flavorText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.
01DE044.name: Redoubled Valor

01DE024.description: Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
01DE024.flavorText:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook
01DE024.name: Mageseeker Conservator

01DE004.description: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
01DE004.flavorText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.
01DE004.name: Silverwing Vanguard

01DE011.flavorText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper
01DE011.name: Laurent Protege

01DE047.flavorText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.
01DE047.name: Succession

01DE046.flavorText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.
01DE046.name: Vanguard Lookout

01DE050.flavorText:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook
01DE050.name: Purify

01DE016.flavorText: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.
01DE016.name: Dauntless Vanguard

01DE040.description: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
01DE040.flavorText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"
01DE040.name: Mageseeker Persuader

01DE036.description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
01DE036.flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire
01DE036.name: Vanguard Squire

01DE037.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
01DE037.flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
01DE037.name: Riposte

01DE014.description: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
01DE014.flavorText:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code
01DE014.name: Reinforcements

01DE015.description: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
01DE015.flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign
01DE015.name: Radiant Guardian

01DE003.flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."
01DE003.name: Laurent Bladekeeper

01DE026.description: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
01DE026.flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora
01DE026.name: Single Combat

01DE032.description: Give an ally Barrier this round.
01DE032.flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
01DE032.name: Prismatic Barrier

01DE027.description: Give all allies Challenger this round.
01DE027.flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora
01DE027.name: En Garde

01DE006.description: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
01DE006.flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign
01DE006.name: Vanguard Sergeant

01DE038.description: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
01DE038.flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
01DE038.name: Senna, Sentinel of Light

01DE041.flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion
01DE041.name: Back to Back

01DE035.flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant
01DE035.name: For Demacia!

01DE018.flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian
01DE018.name: Radiant Strike

01DE009.description: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
01DE009.flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III
01DE009.name: Brightsteel Protector

01DE039.flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."
01DE039.name: Cithria of Cloudfield

01DE056.flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.
01DE056.name: Vanguard Firstblade

01DE029.description: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
01DE029.flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.
01DE029.name: Fleetfeather Tracker

01DE028.flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.
01DE028.name: Vanguard Cavalry

01DE013.flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.
01DE013.name: Chain Vest

01DE023.description: Create a Detain in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
01DE023.flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."
01DE023.name: Mageseeker Investigator

01DE051.description: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
01DE051.flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”
01DE051.name: Cithria the Bold

01DE054.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
01DE054.flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"
01DE054.name: Vanguard Redeemer

01DE030.flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.
01DE030.name: Silverwing Diver

01PZ040.levelupDescription: I see your hand is empty.
01PZ040.flavorText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"
01PZ040.name: Jinx

01PZ040T3.description:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a Jinx in your deck.
01PZ040T3.name: Jinx's Get Excited!

01PZ040T2.description: Deal 4 to the enemy nexus and 1 to all enemies.
01PZ040T2.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!

01PZ040T1.description:
Round Start: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time you empty your hand, create a Super Mega Death Rocket! in hand.
01PZ040T1.flavorText: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"
01PZ040T1.name: Jinx

01PZ008.description: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
01PZ008.flavorText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."
01PZ008.name: Teemo

01PZ008T2.description: Nexus Strike: Double the Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
01PZ008T2.flavorText: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"
01PZ008T2.name: Teemo

01PZ008T1.description:
Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
Create a Teemo in your deck.
01PZ008T1.flavorText: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
01PZ008T1.name: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud

01PZ056.description: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
01PZ056.levelupDescription: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.
01PZ056.flavorText: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"
01PZ056.name: Heimerdinger

01PZ013.description: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
01PZ013.flavorText: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.
01PZ013.name: Augmented Experimenter

01PZ007.description: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
01PZ007.flavorText: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.
01PZ007.name: Parade Electrorig

01PZ056T10.description: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
01PZ056T10.name: Heimerdinger

01PZ056T7.flavorText:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2
01PZ056T7.name: Mk2: Evolution Turret

01PZ056T9.flavorText:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4
01PZ056T9.name: Mk4: Stormlobber

01PZ056T3.description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a Heimerdinger in your deck.
01PZ056T3.flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
01PZ056T3.name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!

01PZ056T8.flavorText:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3
01PZ056T8.name: Mk3: Apex Turret

01PZ056T2.flavorText:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5
01PZ056T2.name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster

01PZ056T5.flavorText:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7
01PZ056T5.name: Mk7: Armored Stomper

01PZ056T1.flavorText:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface
01PZ056T1.name: Mk0: Windup Shredder

01PZ056T4.flavorText:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1
01PZ056T4.name: Mk1: Wrenchbot

01PZ056T6.flavorText:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6
01PZ056T6.name: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone

01PZ018.flavorText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.
01PZ018.name: Academy Prodigy

01PZ019.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
01PZ019.flavorText: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.
01PZ019.name: Eager Apprentice

01PZ025.description: When you play a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
01PZ025.flavorText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"
01PZ025.name: Puffcap Peddler

01PZ048.description: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
01PZ048.flavorText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."
01PZ048.name: Corina Veraza

01PZ048T1.description: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
01PZ048T1.flavorText: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza
01PZ048T1.name: Magnum Opus

01PZ032.flavorText: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!
01PZ032.name: Scrap Scuttler

01PZ015.flavorText:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8
01PZ015.name: T-Hex

01PZ022.flavorText:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme
01PZ022.name: Poison Puffcap

01PZ028.description: When played or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
01PZ028.flavorText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.
01PZ028.name: Jury-Rig

01PZ050.description: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
01PZ050.flavorText: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal
01PZ050.name: Rising Spell Force

01PZ054.description: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
01PZ054.flavorText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."
01PZ054.name: Boomcrew Rookie

01PZ030.description: Play: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
01PZ030.name: Shady Character

01PZ030T1.description: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
01PZ030T1.flavorText: Definitely not a pair of yordles in a suit.
01PZ030T1.name: Impersonate

01PZ017.description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
01PZ017.flavorText: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."
01PZ017.name: Used Cask Salesman

01PZ038.description: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
01PZ038.flavorText: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.
01PZ038.name: Sump Dredger

01PZ036.description: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
01PZ036.flavorText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"
01PZ036.name: Ezreal

01PZ036T1.description:
Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
When you play a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
01PZ036T1.flavorText: "Impossible is my favorite kind of possible!"
01PZ036T1.name: Ezreal

01PZ036T2.description:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an Ezreal in your deck.
01PZ036T2.flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
01PZ036T2.name: Ezreal's Mystic Shot

01PZ035.flavorText: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.
01PZ035.name: Jae Medarda

01PZ010.description: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
01PZ010.flavorText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
01PZ010.name: Mushroom Cloud

01PZ045.description: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
01PZ045.flavorText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"
01PZ045.name: Zaunite Urchin

01PZ013T1.description: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
01PZ013T1.name: Reckless Research

01PZ002.description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
01PZ002.flavorText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."
01PZ002.name: Back Alley Barkeep

01PZ004.description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
01PZ004.flavorText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal
01PZ004.name: Trueshot Barrage

01PZ020.flavorText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.
01PZ020.name: Daring Poro

01PZ046.description: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
01PZ046.flavorText: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.
01PZ046.name: Counterfeit Copies

01PZ052.flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
01PZ052.name: Mystic Shot

01PZ033.description: If you've played 20 cards with different names this game, summon Catastrophe.
01PZ033.flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer
01PZ033.name: Purrsuit of Perfection

01PZ005.description: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
01PZ005.flavorText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"
01PZ005.name: Hextech Transmogulator

01PZ021.description: Nexus Strike: Summon an exact copy of me.
01PZ021.flavorText:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."
01PZ021.name: Midenstokke Henchmen

01PZ031.description:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
01PZ031.flavorText: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger
01PZ031.name: Statikk Shock

01PZ001.description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
01PZ001.flavorText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx
01PZ001.name: Rummage

01PZ057.flavorText: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.
01PZ057.name: Scrapdash Assembly

01PZ027.description:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
01PZ027.flavorText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter
01PZ027.name: Thermogenic Beam

01PZ055.description: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
01PZ055.flavorText: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.
01PZ055.name: Astute Academic

01PZ014.flavorText: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan philanthropist
01PZ014.name: Unlicensed Innovation

01PZ034.description: Allegiance: Create a Sumpworks Map in hand. It costs 0 this round.
01PZ034.flavorText: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.
01PZ034.name: Sumpsnipe Scavenger

01PZ014T1.flavorText: "Absolutely NOT regulation hardware." - Safety Inspections Officer, Piltovan Bureau of Safety Inspections
01PZ014T1.name: Illegal Contraption

01PZ060.description: If you've played 15 cards with different names this game, summon Catastrophe.
01PZ060.flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan project engineer
01PZ060.name: Accelerated Purrsuit

01PZ003.description: When you play a spell, grant me +1|+1.
01PZ003.flavorText: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick
01PZ003.name: Assembly Bot

01PZ044.flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper
01PZ044.name: Chempunk Shredder

01PZ029.description: Last Breath: Create in hand a random Epic card from your regions.
01PZ029.flavorText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."
01PZ029.name: Eminent Benefactor

01PZ051.description: All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
01PZ051.flavorText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"
01PZ051.name: Funsmith

01PZ023.description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
01PZ023.flavorText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."
01PZ023.name: Professor von Yipp

01PZ024.description: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
01PZ024.flavorText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.
01PZ024.name: Unstable Voltician

01PZ049.description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
01PZ049.flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
01PZ049.name: Progress Day!

01PZ006.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've played this game.
01PZ006.flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.
01PZ006.name: Plaza Guardian

01PZ053.description: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
01PZ053.flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler
01PZ053.name: Clump of Whumps

01PZ039.description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
01PZ039.name: Get Excited!

01PZ016.description:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
01PZ016.flavorText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.
01PZ016.name: Flash of Brilliance

01PZ058.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
01PZ058.flavorText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler
01PZ058.name: Chump Whump

01PZ009.flavorText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer
01PZ009.name: Amateur Aeronaut

01PZ042.description: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
01PZ042.flavorText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.
01PZ042.name: Intrepid Mariner

01PZ026.flavorText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger
01PZ026.name: Sumpworks Map

01PZ043.description: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
01PZ043.flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.
01PZ043.name: Chempunk Pickpocket

01PZ047.description: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
01PZ047.flavorText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman
01PZ047.name: Caustic Cask

01FR024.description:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
01FR024.flavorText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."
01FR024.name: Anivia

01FR024T2.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
01FR024T2.flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.
01FR024T2.name: Glacial Storm

01FR024T1.description:
Frostbite 2 enemies.
Create an Anivia in your deck.
01FR024T1.flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia
01FR024T1.name: Anivia's Harsh Winds

01FR024T3.description:
Attack: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
01FR024T3.flavorText: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."
01FR024T3.name: Anivia

01FR024T5.description: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
01FR024T5.flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.
01FR024T5.name: Glacial Storm

01FR024T4.levelupDescription: Round Start: If you're Enlightened, transform me back into Anivia and Level Up.
01FR024T4.flavorText: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.
01FR024T4.name: Eggnivia

01FR039.levelupDescription: If I would die, I Level Up instead.
01FR039.flavorText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."
01FR039.name: Tryndamere

01FR039T1.description:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Create a Tryndamere in your deck.
01FR039T1.flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere
01FR039T1.name: Tryndamere's Battle Fury

01FR006.description: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it everywhere +2|+2.
01FR006.flavorText: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian
01FR006.name: Iceborn Legacy

01FR022.description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
01FR022.flavorText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen
01FR022.name: Omen Hawk

01FR042.flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia
01FR042.name: Harsh Winds

01FR009.description: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
01FR009.flavorText:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"
01FR009.name: Braum

01FR018.description: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
01FR018.flavorText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.
01FR018.name: Rimefang Wolf

01FR036.flavorText: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.
01FR036.name: Avarosan Marksman

01FR045.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
01FR045.flavorText: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."
01FR045.name: Scarthane Steffen

01FR008.description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
01FR008.flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder
01FR008.name: Lonely Poro

01FR008T1.description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
01FR008T1.flavorText: "Oho, there's a good lad! Even the coldest winter melts into spring." - Poro Herder
01FR008T1.name: Jubilant Poro

01FR055.description: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
01FR055.flavorText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen
01FR055.name: Shatter

01FR038.levelupDescription: You've reduced the Power of 4+ enemies to 0. When I level up, create a Crystal Arrow on top of deck.
01FR038.flavorText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."
01FR038.name: Ashe

01FR038T3.description: Frostbite an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
01FR038T3.flavorText: "All the world on one arrow." - Ashe
01FR038T3.name: Crystal Arrow

01FR038T2.description:
Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
01FR038T2.flavorText: "You are not our enemy. Our true foe is the long, lawless winter. We are all people of the Freljord, and this land belongs to all of us!"
01FR038T2.name: Ashe

01FR038T1.description:
Frostbite an enemy.
Create an Ashe in your deck.
01FR038T1.flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
01FR038T1.name: Ashe's Flash Freeze

01FR029.flavorText: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry
01FR029.name: Entreat

01FR035.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
01FR035.flavorText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna
01FR035.name: Unscarred Reaver

01FR028.flavorText: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!
01FR028.name: Enraged Yeti

01FR020.flavorText: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.
01FR020.name: Avalanche

01FR014.description: Last Breath: Create 2 Enraged Yetis in your deck.
01FR014.flavorText: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper
01FR014.name: Yeti Yearling

01FR049.description: When I'm summoned, the enemy summons a Snow Hare.
01FR049.flavorText:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb
01FR049.name: Stalking Wolf

01FR037.description: Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
01FR037.flavorText: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.
01FR037.name: Avarosan Outriders

01FR009T1.description: When I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
01FR009T1.flavorText: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder
01FR009T1.name: Braum

01FR009T2.description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a Braum in your deck.
01FR009T2.flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum
01FR009T2.name: Braum's Take Heart

01FR026.flavorText: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.
01FR026.name: Alpha Wildclaw

01FR030.description: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
01FR030.flavorText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum
01FR030.name: Brittle Steel

01FR013.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
01FR013.flavorText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”
01FR013.name: Scarmother Vrynna

01FR019.description: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then Frostbite all enemies.
01FR019.flavorText: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.
01FR019.name: Winter's Breath

01FR041.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
01FR041.flavorText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."
01FR041.name: Avarosan Hearthguard

01FR025.description: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you Behold a Poro.
01FR025.flavorText: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.
01FR025.name: Poro Herder

01FR054.flavorText: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"
01FR054.name: Scarmaiden Reaver

01FR021.description: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
01FR021.flavorText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere
01FR021.name: Tarkaz the Tribeless

01FR021T1.flavorText: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere
01FR021T1.name: Tarkaz's Fury

01FR043.description: Play: Combine all of our Poros into a Fluft of Poros, it gains their stats and keywords.
01FR043.flavorText:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."
01FR043.name: Heart of the Fluft

01FR049T1.flavorText:
"Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."
- Avarosan proverb
01FR049T1.name: Snow Hare

01FR033.description: Round Start: Get an extra mana gem this round.
01FR033.flavorText: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe
01FR033.name: Wyrding Stones

01FR011.flavorText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.
01FR011.name: Icevale Archer

01FR050.description: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
01FR050.flavorText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"
01FR050.name: Kindly Tavernkeeper

01FR052.description: Play: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
01FR052.flavorText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer
01FR052.name: She Who Wanders

01FR052T1.description: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
01FR052T1.flavorText: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer
01FR052T1.name: Balesight

01FR016.flavorText: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker
01FR016.name: Poro Snax

01FR005.flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere
01FR005.name: Battle Fury

01FR023.description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
01FR023.flavorText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.
01FR023.name: Warmother's Call

01FR047.flavorText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia
01FR047.name: Feral Mystic

01FR056.description: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
01FR056.name: Icy Yeti

01FR027.flavorText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.
01FR027.name: Bull Elnuk

01FR057.description: Give all allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
01FR057.flavorText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.
01FR057.name: Pack Mentality

01FR004.flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper
01FR004.name: Elixir of Iron

01FR048.description: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
01FR048.flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."
01FR048.name: Avarosan Trapper

01FR017.description: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
01FR017.flavorText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna
01FR017.name: Troop of Elnuks

01FR046.flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum
01FR046.name: Take Heart

01FR012.description: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
01FR012.flavorText: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.
01FR012.name: Catalyst of Aeons

01FR040.description: Round Start: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
01FR040.flavorText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."
01FR040.name: Rimetusk Shaman

01FR031.description: Round End: Reduce my cost by 1.
01FR031.flavorText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer
01FR031.name: Ancient Yeti

01FR053.flavorText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder
01FR053.name: Mighty Poro

01FR010.flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere
01FR010.name: Bloodsworn Pledge

01FR001.flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
01FR001.name: Flash Freeze

01FR043T1.description: Last Breath: Summon a Heart of the Fluft.
01FR043T1.flavorText:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"
01FR043T1.name: Fluft of Poros

01FR032.description: When you play a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
01FR032.flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."
01FR032.name: Starlit Seer

01FR051.description: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
01FR051.flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger
01FR051.name: Tall Tales

01FR034.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
01FR034.flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper
01FR034.name: They Who Endure

01FR007.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
01FR007.flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"
01FR007.name: Babbling Bjerg

01FR003.flavorText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."
01FR003.name: Avarosan Sentry

01SI038.description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
01SI038.flavorText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.
01SI038.name: Phantom Prankster

01SI049.flavorText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator
01SI049.name: Glimpse Beyond

01SI053.levelupDescription: Round Start: You have 3+ other Spiders.
01SI053.flavorText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.
01SI053.name: Elise

01SI053T1.description:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
Create an Elise in your deck.
01SI053T1.flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
01SI053T1.name: Elise's Crawling Sensation

01SI053T2.description: Other Spider allies have Challenger and Fearsome.
01SI053T2.flavorText: Beauty is in the many eyes of the beholder.
01SI053T2.name: Spider Queen Elise

01SI057.flavorText:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."
01SI057.name: Ancient Crocolith

01SI023.description: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+1.
01SI023.flavorText: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.
01SI023.name: Soul Shepherd

01SI010.flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.
01SI010.name: Onslaught of Shadows

01SI042.flavorText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.
01SI042.name: Hecarim

01SI042T1.description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "Ephemeral allies have +3|+0".
Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
01SI042T1.flavorText: Listen. Hear him ride. The trampling of hooves. The creak of armor, long-worn and rusted. The ghostly cries of soldiers, echoes of the past. The resounding silence that follows.
01SI042T1.name: Hecarim

01SI042T2.description:
Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
Create a Hecarim in your deck.
01SI042T2.flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.
01SI042T2.name: Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows

01SI027.description: If 3+ allies have died this round, summon Vilemaw.
01SI027.flavorText: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise
01SI027.name: Fresh Offerings

01SI027T1.flavorText: "Who is your god? What can your god do? Will he let you wither and die defending him? Or will he give you life and vitality like no mortal has ever known? Why serve a god who won't serve you?" - Elise
01SI027T1.name: Vilemaw

01SI048.description: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
01SI048.flavorText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.
01SI048.name: Cursed Keeper

01SI018.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
01SI018.flavorText: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"
01SI018.name: Scribe of Sorrows

01SI030.flavorText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.
01SI030.name: Kalista

01SI030T2.description: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the strongest dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
01SI030T2.name: Kalista

01SI030T1.description:
If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Kalista in your deck.
01SI030T1.flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista
01SI030T1.name: Kalista's Black Spear

01SI035.description: Play: Kill the 2 weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
01SI035.flavorText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
01SI035.name: Rhasa the Sunderer

01SI035T1.description: Kill the 2 Weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
01SI035T1.name: Night Harvest

01SI002.flavorText: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
01SI002.name: Spiderling

01SI024.flavorText: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.
01SI024.name: Spectral Rider

01SI005.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each ally that died this game.
01SI005.flavorText: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.
