01SI005.name: Scuttlegeist

01SI037.flavorText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.
01SI037.name: Sinister Poro

01SI048T1.flavorText: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.
01SI048T1.name: Escaped Abomination

01SI052.flavorText:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."
01SI052.name: Thresh

01SI033.description:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
01SI033.flavorText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.
01SI033.name: Commander Ledros

01SI003.description: Revive the 6 strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
01SI003.flavorText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.
01SI003.name: The Harrowing

01SI041.description: Last Breath: Revive me at the next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
01SI041.flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...
01SI041.name: The Undying

01SI045.flavorText: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh
01SI045.name: Absorb Soul

01SI036.description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
01SI036.flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
01SI036.name: Crawling Sensation

01SI051.description: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
01SI051.flavorText: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.
01SI051.name: Tortured Prodigy

01SI012.description: Play: Grant an ally in hand Ephemeral and reduce its cost by 1.
01SI012.name: Oblivious Islander

01SI052T2.description:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a Thresh in your deck.
01SI052T2.name: Thresh's The Box

01SI052T1.description: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
01SI052T1.flavorText: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...
01SI052T1.name: Thresh

01SI031.description: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you have.
01SI031.flavorText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.
01SI031.name: Iron Harbinger

01SI034.description: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
01SI034.flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista
01SI034.name: Black Spear

01SI043.flavorText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"
01SI043.name: Hapless Aristocrat

01SI009.description: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and Ephemeral.
01SI009.flavorText: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.
01SI009.name: Stirred Spirits

01SI007.flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.
01SI007.name: Haunted Relic

01SI007T1.flavorText: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.
01SI007T1.name: Unleashed Spirit

01SI056.description: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
01SI056.flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise
01SI056.name: Frenzied Skitterer

01SI001.flavorText: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.
01SI001.name: Vengeance

01SI019.description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
01SI019.name: The Box

01SI014.description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
01SI014.flavorText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.
01SI014.name: Mistwraith

01SI006.description: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
01SI006.flavorText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.
01SI006.name: Possession

01SI033T1.description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
01SI033T1.flavorText: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.
01SI033T1.name: Blade of Ledros

01SI028.description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
01SI028.flavorText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
01SI028.name: Splinter Soul

01SI025.description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
01SI025.flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.
01SI025.name: Atrocity

01SI011.description: To play me, kill an ally.
01SI011.name: Ravenous Butcher

01SI046.description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
01SI046.flavorText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator
01SI046.name: Mist's Call

01SI050.description: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
01SI050.name: Brood Awakening

01SI016.flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.
01SI016.name: Wraithcaller

01SI021.description: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
01SI021.flavorText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon
01SI021.name: Shark Chariot

01SI032.description: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
01SI032.flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.
01SI032.name: Chronicler of Ruin

01SI058.description: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
01SI058.flavorText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!
01SI058.name: Ethereal Remitter

01SI054.flavorText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.
01SI054.name: Grasp of the Undying

01SI044.description: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
01SI044.flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.
01SI044.name: Spectral Matron

01SI039.flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.
01SI039.name: Arachnoid Horror

01SI020.description: When I'm summoned, revive the strongest dead allied champion.
01SI020.flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?
01SI020.name: The Rekindler

01SI029.description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
01SI029.flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.
01SI029.name: Withering Wail

01SI004.flavorText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.
01SI004.name: Darkwater Scourge

01SI026.description: Last Breath: Create in hand another random Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
01SI026.flavorText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…
01SI026.name: Warden's Prey

01SI040.description: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
01SI040.flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
01SI040.name: Vile Feast

01SI015.flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.
01SI015.name: The Ruination

01SI055.flavorText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier
01SI055.name: Soulgorger

01SI047.description: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
01SI047.flavorText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.
01SI047.name: Fading Memories

02PZ001.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0.
02PZ001.flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...
02PZ001.name: Subpurrsible

02PZ010.description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
02PZ010.flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.
02PZ010.name: Veteran Investigator

02PZ006.description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
02PZ006.flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"
02PZ006.name: Gotcha!

02PZ004.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
02PZ004.flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
02PZ004.name: Vault Breaker

02PZ007.description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and give it Fleeting.
02PZ007.flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook
02PZ007.name: Insightful Investigator

02PZ002.description: When you draw a card, give it Fleeting and create an exact copy of it in hand.
02PZ002.flavorText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.
02PZ002.name: Chief Mechanist Zevi

02PZ008.description: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0).
02PZ008.flavorText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator
02PZ008.name: Vi

02PZ009.description: Create in hand a random 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
02PZ009.flavorText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."
02PZ009.name: Trail of Evidence

02PZ003.description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Grow an ally to 4|4.
02PZ003.flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
02PZ003.name: Suit Up!

02PZ008T2.description: When I strike a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
02PZ008T2.flavorText: "So! Looks like your buddies are all tuckered out. You wanna tell me where you hid the hextech, or d'ya wanna make friends with the wall, too?"
02PZ008T2.name: Vi

02PZ008T1.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
Create a Vi in your deck.
02PZ008T1.flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi
02PZ008T1.name: Vi's Vault Breaker

02PZ005.description: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
02PZ005.flavorText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.
02PZ005.name: Patrol Wardens

02BW040.flavorText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand
02BW040.name: Shellshocker

02BW057.flavorText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer
02BW057.name: Slippery Waverider

02BW041.flavorText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam
02BW041.name: The Beast Below

02BW013.flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."
02BW013.name: Prowling Cutthroat

02BW034.description: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
02BW034.flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune
02BW034.name: Monkey Idol

02BW034T1.description: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
02BW034T1.flavorText: "Mischievous little scamps, ain't they? More help than they seem, but word is they've got explosive tempers..." - Syren deckhand
02BW034T1.name: Powder Monkey

02BW056.description: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
02BW056.flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
02BW056.name: Devourer of the Depths

02BW056T1.description: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
02BW056T1.flavorText:
"She swallowed me whole, me skiff and me soul,
So I'm singin' this song in her belly,
And now I must wait 'til I meet my fate,
In the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
02BW056T1.name: Devour

02BW060.description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
02BW060.flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."
02BW060.name: Crackshot Corsair

02BW011.description: Allegiance: Nab 1 and create a Warning Shot in hand.
02BW011.flavorText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."
02BW011.name: Yordle Grifter

02BW030.description: When I'm summoned, Toss 2 and create 2 Treasures in your deck.
02BW030.flavorText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher
02BW030.name: Shipwreck Hoarder

02BW030T2.description:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
02BW030T2.flavorText: The deckhands roared as one and hauled the chains, their treasure now just below the calm waters. Little did they know the Seascraw's legendary cannon had one final act in store.
02BW030T2.name: Keelbreaker

02BW030T1.description:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are Fleeting.
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
02BW030T1.flavorText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.
02BW030T1.name: Treasure Trove

02BW030T4.flavorText: The terrifying beasts burst through the waves and split the hull with vice-like jaws. Though the sailors begged the Bearded Lady for mercy, their captain's greed had already sealed their fate.
02BW030T4.name: Vicious Platewyrm

02BW030T3.description:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Summon 3 Vicious Platewyrms.
02BW030T3.flavorText: The grizzled captain held his shining quarry aloft and roared out "This'll keep us fer life!" Heady cheers rang out from the crew, while around their brig, the waters began to churn...
02BW030T3.name: Platewyrm Egg

02BW019.flavorText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.
02BW019.name: Bubble Bear

02BW007.description:
To play me, discard 2.
Attack: Draw 2 and give them Fleeting.
02BW007.flavorText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."
02BW007.name: Brash Gambler

02BW014.description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
02BW014.flavorText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.
02BW014.name: Coral Creatures

02BW055.flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.
02BW055.name: Jagged Taskmaster

02BW017.description: Plunder: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then Rally.
02BW017.flavorText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."
02BW017.name: Citrus Courier

02BW038.description: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
02BW038.flavorText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.
02BW038.name: Zap Sprayfin

02BW021.flavorText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher
02BW021.name: Razorscale Hunter

02BW035.description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
02BW035.flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.
02BW035.name: Sheriff Lariette Rose

02BW058.flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.
02BW058.name: Jagged Butcher

02BW028.description: Plunder: Play Cannon Barrage 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
02BW028.flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"
02BW028.name: Riptide Rex

02BW028T1.description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
02BW028T1.flavorText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.
02BW028T1.name: Cannon Barrage

02BW037.flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"
02BW037.name: Abyssal Eye

02BW008.description: Play: Summon a Powder Keg or a random 1 cost follower.
02BW008.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
02BW008.name: Petty Officer

02BW008T02.description: Play: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
02BW008T02.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
02BW008T02.name: Petty Officer

02BW008T01.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
02BW008T01.name: Petty Officer

02BW047.flavorText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.
02BW047.name: Dreg Dredgers

02BW004.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
02BW004.flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."
02BW004.name: Dreadway Deckhand

02BW002.description: When I'm summoned, draw a Gangplank. Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
02BW002.flavorText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"
02BW002.name: The Dreadway

02BW016.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
02BW016.flavorText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.
02BW016.name: Slotbot

02BW027.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Golden Narwhal for your opponent.
02BW027.flavorText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.
02BW027.name: Hunting Fleet

02BW050.description: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
02BW050.flavorText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter
02BW050.name: Smooth Soloist

02BW015.description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
02BW015.flavorText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.
02BW015.name: The Syren

02BW010.flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank
02BW010.name: Plunder Poro

02BW009.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next Round Start and give it Fleeting.
02BW009.flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler
02BW009.name: Pool Shark

02BW005.description: When I'm summoned, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
02BW005.flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."
02BW005.name: Hired Gun

02BW039.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
02BW039.flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.
02BW039.name: Jaull Hunters

02BW006.description: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
02BW006.flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"
02BW006.name: Mystifying Magician

02BW036.flavorText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.
02BW036.name: Golden Narwhal

02BW033.description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
02BW033.flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"
02BW033.name: Black Market Merchant

02BW060T1.flavorText: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair
02BW060T1.name: Crackshot

02BW032.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
02BW032.levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
02BW032.flavorText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand
02BW032.name: Gangplank

02BW032T2.description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Gangplank in your deck.
02BW032T2.flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
02BW032T2.name: Gangplank's Parrrley

02BW032T3.description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon a Powder Keg.
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW032T3.flavorText: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer
02BW032T3.name: Gangplank

02BW032T1.description:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
02BW032T1.flavorText: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying
02BW032T1.name: Powder Keg

02BW032T4.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW032T4.name: Powderful Explosion

02BW022.description: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW022.flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."
02BW022.name: Miss Fortune

02BW022T3.description:
Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
Create a Miss Fortune in your deck.
02BW022T3.name: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain

02BW022T2.description: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW022T2.flavorText: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."
02BW022T2.name: Miss Fortune

02BW022T4.description: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW022T4.flavorText: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...
02BW022T4.name: Bullet Time

02BW022T1.description: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW022T1.flavorText: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune
02BW022T1.name: Love Tap

02BW046.description: When you play a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
02BW046.flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...
02BW046.name: Fizz

02BW046T3.description:
When you play a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
Nexus Strike: Create a Chum the Waters in hand.
02BW046T3.flavorText: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.
02BW046T3.name: Fizz

02BW046T2.flavorText: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.
02BW046T2.name: Longtooth

02BW046T1.description:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
Create a Fizz in your deck.
02BW046T1.name: Fizz's Playful Trickster

02BW026.flavorText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."
02BW026.name: Twisted Fate

02BW026T5.description: Deal 2 and Stun the strongest enemy.
02BW026T5.name: Gold Card

02BW026T3.description: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
02BW026T3.flavorText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."
02BW026T3.name: Twisted Fate

02BW026T1.description:
Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
Create a Twisted Fate in your deck.
02BW026T1.flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
02BW026T1.name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card

02BW026T4.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02BW026T4.name: Red Card

02BW053.levelupDescription: When you are Deep.  When I level up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
02BW053.flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
02BW053.name: Nautilus

02BW053T2.description:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
Create a Nautilus into your deck.
02BW053T2.name: Nautilus' Riptide

02BW053T1.flavorText: All pay the tithe, one way or another.
02BW053T1.name: Nautilus

02BW061.description:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
02BW061.flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate
02BW061.name: Pocket Aces

02BW024.flavorText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
02BW024.name: Double Trouble

02BW003.description: Plunder: Recall ANY follower into your hand.
02BW003.flavorText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer
02BW003.name: Strong-arm

02BW025.description: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
02BW025.name: Chum the Waters

02BW018.description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
02BW018.flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
02BW018.name: Parrrley

02BW048.flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
02BW048.name: Jailbreak

02BW043.description: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
02BW043.flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
02BW043.name: Pick a Card

02BW051.description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
02BW051.name: Playful Trickster

02BW054.description:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
02BW054.name: Riptide

02BW042.description: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of other spells you've played this game.
02BW042.flavorText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.
02BW042.name: Mind Meld

02BW059.flavorText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying
02BW059.name: Scrapshot

02BW023.description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
02BW023.flavorText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.
02BW023.name: Lure of the Depths

02BW031.description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
02BW031.name: Double Up

02BW029.flavorText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk...
02BW029.name: Salvage

02BW049.flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.
02BW049.name: Pilfered Goods

02BW001.description: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
02BW001.flavorText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand
02BW001.name: Ye Been Warned

02BW063.description: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
02BW063.flavorText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate
02BW063.name: Sleight of Hand

02BW045.description: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
02BW045.name: Make it Rain

02BW020.flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer
02BW020.name: Warning Shot

02BW044.flavorText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer
02BW044.name: Jettison

02BW062.description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
02BW062.flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous
02BW062.name: Island Navigator

02FR009.description: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
02FR009.flavorText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.
02FR009.name: Wolfrider

02FR004.description: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
02FR004.flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani
02FR004.name: Caught in the Cold

02FR002.description: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
02FR002.levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
02FR002.flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
02FR002.name: Sejuani

02FR001.flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme
02FR001.name: Ember Maiden

02FR005.description: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
02FR005.flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.
02FR005.name: Ursine Spiritwalker

02FR005T1.description: Other allies with 5+ Power have Overwhelm.
02FR005T1.flavorText: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.
02FR005T1.name: Stormclaw Ursine

02FR010.description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
02FR010.name: Shared Spoils

02FR008.description:
When I'm summoned, Draw a Sejuani.
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
02FR008.flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard
02FR008.name: The Tuskraider

02FR002T1.description:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a Sejuani in your deck.
02FR002T1.name: Sejuani's Fury of the North

02FR002T3.description:
Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, Frostbite all enemies.
02FR002T3.flavorText: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"
02FR002T3.name: Sejuani

02FR006.flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.
02FR006.name: Ruthless Raider

02FR003.description: Create 2 random Poros and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
02FR003.flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
02FR003.name: Aurora Porealis

02NX001.description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
02NX001.flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
02NX001.name: The Leviathan

02NX007.description: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
02NX007.flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."
02NX007.name: Swain

02NX007T2.description:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, Stun the strongest backrow enemy.
Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
02NX007T2.flavorText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."
02NX007T2.name: Swain

02NX007T1.description:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
Create a Swain in your deck.
02NX007T1.flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
02NX007T1.name: Swain's Ravenous Flock

02NX006.description: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
02NX006.flavorText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”
02NX006.name: Citybreaker

02NX002.flavorText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”
02NX002.name: Aurok Glinthorn

02NX009.description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
02NX009.flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
02NX009.name: Ravenous Flock

02NX004.description: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
02NX004.name: Imperial Demolitionist

02NX003.description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
02NX003.name: Noxian Fervor

02NX010.description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
02NX010.flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider
02NX010.name: Armored Tuskrider

02NX004T1.description: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
02NX004T1.flavorText: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.
02NX004T1.name: Black Powder Grenade

02NX008.description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
02NX008.name: Death's Hand

02NX005.flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer
02NX005.name: Iron Ballista

02DE003.flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.
02DE003.name: Loyal Badgerbear

02DE008.flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.
02DE008.name: Greathorn Companion

02DE004.flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."
02DE004.name: Greenfang Warden

02DE006.flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight
02DE006.name: Quinn

02DE006T3.description:
Summon Valor.
Create a Quinn in your deck.
02DE006T3.flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
02DE006T3.name: Quinn's Blinding Assault

02DE006T2.flavorText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.
02DE006T2.name: Valor

02DE006T1.description: Attack: Summon Valor Challenging the strongest enemy.
02DE006T1.name: Quinn

02DE009.description: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
02DE009.flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."
02DE009.name: Grizzled Ranger

02DE005.description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
02DE005.flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.
02DE005.name: Unyielding Spirit

02DE002.flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
02DE002.name: Blinding Assault

02DE010.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
02DE010.flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.
02DE010.name: Genevieve Elmheart

02DE007.description: Give all allies Tough this round.
02DE007.flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden
02DE007.name: Ranger's Resolve

02DE001.description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it one after another.
02DE001.name: Concerted Strike

02SI010.flavorText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal
02SI010.name: Deadbloom Wanderer

02SI008.description: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
02SI008.levelupDescription: Your units have died or your cards have been Tossed 25 times.
02SI008.flavorText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.
02SI008.name: Maokai

02SI008T3.flavorText: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal
02SI008T3.name: Sapling

02SI008T1.description:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a Maokai in your deck.
02SI008T1.name: Maokai's Sap Magic

02SI008T2.description:
When I level up, Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
Round Start: Summon a Sapling.
02SI008T2.flavorText: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.
02SI008T2.name: Maokai

02SI007.description: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
02SI007.flavorText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal
02SI007.name: Thorny Toad

02SI003.description:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
02SI003.flavorText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.
02SI003.name: Terror of the Tides

02SI001.description: When another ally dies, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
02SI001.flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal
02SI001.name: Neverglade Collector

02SI002.description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
02SI002.flavorText:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal
02SI002.name: Overgrown Snapvine

02SI004.description: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
02SI004.flavorText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"
02SI004.name: Blighted Caretaker

02SI006.description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
02SI006.flavorText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.
02SI006.name: Barkbeast

02SI009.description: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
02SI009.name: Sapling Toss

02IO008.description:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
02IO008.name: Sonic Wave

02IO005T1.description: When I'm Recalled, transform me into Concussive Palm.
02IO005T1.flavorText: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon
02IO005T1.name: Tail of the Dragon

02IO002.description: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
02IO002.flavorText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon
02IO002.name: Scales of the Dragon

02IO002T1.flavorText: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon
02IO002T1.name: Dragon's Protection

02IO006.description:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
02IO006.flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."
02IO006.name: Lee Sin

02IO011.description:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
Create a Lee Sin in your deck.
02IO011.name: Lee Sin's Sonic Wave

02IO006T1.description:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
I Dragon's Rage enemies that I Challenge.
02IO006T1.flavorText: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."
02IO006T1.name: Lee Sin

02IO006T3.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
02IO006T3.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
02IO006T3.name: Dragon's Rage

02IO004.flavorText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon
02IO004.name: Horns of the Dragon

02IO003.description: Round Start: Flow: Summon a Dragonling.
02IO003.flavorText:
"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon
02IO003.name: Eye of the Dragon

02IO001.description: Summon me from hand the first time you've played 2 spells each round.
02IO001.flavorText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon
02IO001.name: Claws of the Dragon

02IO003T1.flavorText: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon
02IO003T1.name: Dragonling

02IO005.description: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
02IO005.flavorText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon
02IO005.name: Concussive Palm

02IO010.description: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
02IO010.flavorText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...
02IO010.name: Retreat

02IO007.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
02IO007.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
02IO007.name: Dragon's Rage

02IO010T1.description: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
02IO010T1.flavorText: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.
02IO010T1.name: Return

02IO009.description:
Flow: Costs 2 less.
Draw 2 other spells.
02IO009.flavorText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.
02IO009.name: Deep Meditation

03NX019.description: Your opponent discards the weakest follower from hand.
03NX019.flavorText: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker
03NX019.name: Hunt the Weak

03NX022.description: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
03NX022.flavorText: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster
03NX022.name: Wild Claws

03NX007.description: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
03NX007.levelupDescription: I see Blade of the Exile in your hand.
03NX007.flavorText: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."
03NX007.name: Riven

03NX008.description: Give an ally Overwhelm this round.
03NX008.flavorText: "A warrior must know the weight of their weapon, burdened heavy with guilt." - Riven
03NX008.name: Heavy Blade Fragment

03NX007T3.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
Create a Riven in your deck.
03NX007T3.flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
03NX007T3.name: Riven's Weapon Hilt

03NX011.description: Grant an ally +2|+0, Overwhelm, and Quick Attack.
03NX011.flavorText: "But a warrior is more than their weapon alone. They must know power, but also consequence, forgiveness, and redemption." -  Riven
03NX011.name: Blade of the Exile

03NX010.description: Give an ally Quick Attack this round.
03NX010.flavorText: "A warrior must know the sharpness of their blade, an edge that cuts both friends and foes." - Riven
03NX010.name: Keen Blade Fragment

03NX007T1.description:
When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
Each round, the first time you increase my Power, increase it by twice the amount.
03NX007T1.flavorText: "...and I will not run from those who would break me."
03NX007T1.name: Riven

03NX012.flavorText: "A warrior must know their weapon's history... every bloody piece." - Riven
03NX012.name: Glinting Blade Fragment

03NX006.description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
03NX006.flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
03NX006.name: Weapon Hilt

03NX002.description: Round End: If you played a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
03NX002.flavorText:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."
03NX002.name: Arrel the Tracker

03NX018.description:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
03NX018.name: Apprehend

03NX009.flavorText: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."
03NX009.name: Wrathful Rider

03NX017.description: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
03NX017.flavorText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.
03NX017.name: Basilisk Bloodseeker

03NX016.description: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
03NX016.flavorText: "It's not the sharpness of the claws you've got to look out for, it's the appetite of the beast that's grown 'em." - Basilisk trainer
03NX016.name: Gouge

03NX015.description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
03NX015.flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
03NX015.name: Survival Skills

03NX014.flavorText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire
03NX014.name: Sharpened Resolve

03NX003.flavorText: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."
03NX003.name: Blade Squire

03NX001.flavorText: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."
03NX001.name: Runeweaver

03NX005.description: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
03NX005.flavorText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."
03NX005.name: Brutal Hunter

03BW006.description: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
03BW006.flavorText: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.
03BW006.name: Jack, the Winner

03BW010.description: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
03BW010.flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
03BW010.name: Bayou Brunch

03BW005.description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
03BW005.flavorText: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench
03BW005.name: Sunk Cost

03BW004.description: Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
03BW004.levelupDescription: I've Captured 3+ units. When I level up, Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
03BW004.flavorText: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."
03BW004.name: Tahm Kench

03BW004T2.description: Tahm Kench swallows an enemy unit. It strikes him, then he Captures it.
03BW004T2.flavorText: "You had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool who let me in..." - Tahm Kench
03BW004T2.name: An Acquired Taste

03BW004T3.description:
Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
Attack: Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
03BW004T3.flavorText: "You struck a deal, my friend, and though you will undoubtedly bask in its benefits, remember... there will be a time when I get my fill, too."
03BW004T3.name: Tahm Kench

03BW004T4.description:
An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a Tahm Kench in your deck.
03BW004T4.flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
03BW004T4.name: Tahm Kench's Bayou Brunch

03BW002.flavorText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker
03BW002.name: Lounging Lizard

03BW014.description:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
03BW014.flavorText: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer
03BW014.name: Monkey Business

03BW007.flavorText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry
03BW007.name: Boxtopus

03BW006T1.description: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
03BW006T1.flavorText: "Daub 'em with your blood, and set the sharks loose." - Jack, the Winner
03BW006T1.name: Sleep with the Fishes

03BW016.description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
03BW016.flavorText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor
03BW016.name: Boomship

03BW001.description: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
03BW001.flavorText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.
03BW001.name: The Slaughter Docks

03BW015.flavorText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus
03BW015.name: Crusty Codger

03BW003.description: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
03BW003.flavorText: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.
03BW003.name: Wise Fry

03BW017.description:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
03BW017.flavorText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker
03BW017.name: Wiggly Burblefish

03BW008.description: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
03BW008.flavorText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard
03BW008.name: Fortune Croaker

03BW020.description: Summon a Powder Monkey and give a random enemy Vulnerable this round for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
03BW020.flavorText: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune
03BW020.name: Powder Pandemonium

03BW009.description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
03BW009.flavorText: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry
03BW009.name: Shakedown

03DE010.description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and Challenger this round.
03DE010.flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.
03DE010.name: The Grand Plaza

03MT005.description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
03MT005.flavorText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.
03MT005.name: Divergent Paths

03FR009.description: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
03FR009.flavorText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.
03FR009.name: The Howling Abyss

03SI009.description: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
03SI009.flavorText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?
03SI009.name: Vaults of Helia

03MT052.description: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
03MT052.flavorText:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse
03MT052.name: Star Spring

03IO006.description: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
03IO006.flavorText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.
03IO006.name: Monastery of Hirana

03IO016.flavorText: "The monastery welcomes all who seek refuge." - Elder Souma
03IO016.name: Sanctuary

03NX013.description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
03NX013.flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
03NX013.name: Scorched Earth

03NX004.description: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
03NX004.flavorText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster
03NX004.name: Noxkraya Arena

03MT005T2.flavorText: Each summit gave way before them, emboldening their climb and filling their hearts with determination. They would scale Targon.
03MT005T2.name: Path of Destruction

03MT005T1.flavorText: Beyond each summit loomed yet another, but their spirits pushed them onward. They would surmount the peaks of Targon.
03MT005T1.name: Path of Discovery

03DE004.description: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
03DE004.flavorText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.
03DE004.name: Captain Arrika

03DE004T1.flavorText: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika
03DE004T1.name: Claim

03IO005.description: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
03IO005.name: Homecoming

03SI008.description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
03SI008.flavorText: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.
03SI008.name: Crumble

03MT064.description: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
03MT064.flavorText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.
03MT064.name: Targon's Peak

03PZ001.description: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
03PZ001.flavorText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.
03PZ001.name: The University of Piltover

03FR003.description: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
03FR003.flavorText: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard
03FR003.name: It That Stares

03MT079.description: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
03MT079.flavorText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."
03MT079.name: Starry Scamp

03MT015.flavorText: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?
03MT015.name: Behold the Infinite

03MT018.flavorText:
"As leaves unfurl from barren branches, the Lady of Spring sends her messenger to inform the Lord of Winter of the changing season. The messenger's bark startles the stars into new places in the sky, while his loyal heart warms the land." 
- Song of the Seasons
03MT018.name: The Messenger

03MT034.flavorText:
"During Targon's first equinox, the people of the mountain attempted their first truce. But as their leaders laid their weapons down, one suddenly cried out in pain! Soldiers drew their spears, and all thoughts of peace were lost. Little did they know the true betrayer was a serpent hidden beneath their feet, forevermore a sign of violent times." 
- Targonian folk tale
03MT034.name: The Serpent

03MT083.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
03MT083.flavorText: "For ages, the Immortal Fire flew alone, till one day she saw a young bird with fiery golden wings like hers. She rejoiced, for she had never known another like herself. But as years passed, the young bird grew old and flickered out. The Immortal Fire grieved, for she had never known death. And so she wept sparks and sighed herself ablaze, till she emerged, renewed in body but burdened with knowledge." - Shuriman folk tale
03MT083.name: The Immortal Fire

03MT004.description: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
03MT004.flavorText: "Each full moon bathes our world in Her silver glow, revealing paths not yet trod, stories not yet told." - Lunari Priestess
03MT004.name: Moonsilver

03MT037.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
Attack: Give other allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
03MT037.flavorText: Legends speak of a Scourge that lurks at the furthest reaches of the Celestial Realm. Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.
03MT037.name: The Scourge

03MT059.description: When I'm summoned, summon The Silver Sister.
03MT059.flavorText:
"From the heavens
Two beings came:
One was robed in silver's glow,
The other clad in golden flame..."
- Hymn of the Hours
03MT059.name: The Golden Sister

03MT053.flavorText: "Bathe in Her gentle glow and receive Her blessing." - Lunari Priestess
03MT053.name: Moonglow

03MT032.description: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
03MT032.flavorText: "The vastness of the night sky represents the gulf between humanity below and the divine above. But there are some mortals who strive to achieve a higher purpose, and if the mountain deems them worthy, they may rise to become one with the stars themselves." - Mountain Scryer
03MT032.name: Written in Stars

03MT024.description: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate 2 enemy units or landmarks.
03MT024.flavorText: Dying stars create explosions so bright and powerful that even other stars, still lively and burning, are easily outshone.
03MT024.name: Supernova

03MT066.description: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant allies everywhere +2|+2.
03MT066.flavorText: "Look to the night sky. Take in the stars' brilliance, and let them suffuse you with their healing light." - Soraka
03MT066.name: Cosmic Inspiration

03MT077.description: Fill your hand with random Fleeting Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
03MT077.flavorText: "They say that some constellations were once mortals whose exceptional exploits earned them a place amongst the stars." - Mountain Scryer
03MT077.name: Living Legends

03MT010.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game.
03MT010.flavorText: "To safeguard the spaces between land and sky, a horned guardian was placed in the stars over the mountains. Sturdy and swift, it traverses the night sky in search of intruders, whom it greets with an impact that sends shudders through earth and sky alike." - The Minotaur Histories
03MT010.name: The Destroyer

03MT070.flavorText: "We were always one and the same--we were separated only by the mountain, the journey, and a sea of stars."
03MT070.name: The Traveler

03MT049.description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
03MT049.flavorText: "Forging stars is a messy business, I'm afraid. You never know where those little rocks will land. I am so terribly, terribly sorry if they happen to fall on you. And crush you. Oh so violently." - Aurelion Sol
03MT049.name: Meteor Shower

03MT043.flavorText: "I will drive the stars themselves through this insufferable place. It will be GLORIOUS." - Aurelion Sol
03MT043.name: Falling Comet

03MT022.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
I am a Dragon.
03MT022.flavorText: "Oh yes, my favorite constellation. I like to think it will be the first to rain down upon this forsaken mountain." - Aurelion Sol
03MT022.name: The Great Beyond

03MT078.description: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate enemies with 3 or less Power.
03MT078.flavorText: In the dark beginning, a spark of creation rippled through the universe. What sound it made, what light it shone, we will never know, for there were not yet then words to describe, nor yet ears or eyes to perceive it.
03MT078.name: Cosmic Rays

03MT065.flavorText: In the space between the stars, there is absolute silence.
03MT065.name: Equinox

03MT050.flavorText: The strongest star in the night's sky, they say, is that of the warrior. An ancient being, thought immortal, who descends from the stars to prove his worth in combat. Never has he been beaten, but all stories must end, and all stars must die.
03MT050.name: The Warrior

03MT011.flavorText: "Even the moon's glow can be blinding." - Diana
03MT011.name: Crescent Strike

03MT095.flavorText: "So, there I was going 'bout my day, when in struts this fella packed to the gills with gold. Easy mark, eh? I sidle over, amp up the charm, and amp up the price. It's only when I put my coins away I realize the little scamp's paid me with my OWN money! The Trickster was shining bright that night, I tell ya." - Yordle Grifter
03MT095.name: The Trickster

03MT059T1.flavorText:
"...Though both were formed of cosmic light,
They fought, for they were too alike.
And so these two split night from day,
So each could always have their way..."
- Hymn of the Hours
03MT059T1.name: The Silver Sister

03MT090.flavorText: "The gold of the sun adorns his horns, and its fire lights his heart. Let the thunder of our shields ring out like the thunder of his hooves across the horizon!" - Solari battle prayer
03MT090.name: The Charger

03MT221.description: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
03MT221.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer
03MT221.name: The Fangs

03MT073.description: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
03MT073.flavorText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."
03MT073.name: Lunari Duskbringer

03MT073T1.description: The next card with Nightfall you play this round costs 1 less.
03MT073T1.flavorText: The fragrance of the duskpetal is like none other. Sweet and strange, but fleeting, it is delicate as moonlight itself.
03MT073T1.name: Duskpetal Dust

03MT217.description:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
03MT217.flavorText: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker
03MT217.name: Aphelios

03MT217T10.description: Summon a random 2 cost follower from your regions. Phase Calibrum or Severum.
03MT217T10.flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune
03MT217T10.name: Crescendum

03MT217T14.description: Give an ally +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round. Phase Crescendum or Calibrum.
03MT217T14.name: Infernum

03MT217T11.description:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an Aphelios in your deck.
03MT217T11.name: Aphelios' Gifts From Beyond

03MT217T9.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and Lifesteal this round. Phase Gravitum or Infernum.
03MT217T9.name: Severum

03MT217T8.description: Deal 3 to a follower. Phase Severum or Gravitum.
03MT217T8.flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune
03MT217T8.name: Calibrum

03MT217T13.description:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or Round Start: Create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
03MT217T13.flavorText: "...it is Aphelios and Alune who will best teach them.." - Lunari wanespeaker
03MT217T13.name: Aphelios

03MT217T12.description: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start. Phase Infernum or Crescendum.
03MT217T12.flavorText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune
03MT217T12.name: Gravitum

03MT001.description: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
03MT001.flavorText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.
03MT001.name: Sneaky Zeebles

03MT060.description: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
03MT060.flavorText: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"
03MT060.name: Broadbacked Protector

03MT033.flavorText: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd
03MT033.name: Grandfather Rumul

03MT021.description:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
03MT021.flavorText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.
03MT021.name: The Infinite Mindsplitter

03MT056.description: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
03MT056.flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.
03MT056.name: Diana

03MT056T1.description: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Challenger this round.
03MT056T1.flavorText: Diana raced down the mountain, sword drawn and coated with duskpetal dust. She knew Leona would find her--she was counting on it. Her heart fluttered with anxious anticipation, and she breathed deeply to still it. This time upon their meeting, she would have the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
03MT056T1.name: Diana

03MT056T2.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
Create a Diana in your deck.
03MT056T2.flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
03MT056T2.name: Diana's Pale Cascade

03MT067.flavorText: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.
03MT067.name: Crystal Ibex

03MT092.description: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
03MT092.flavorText: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.
03MT092.name: Mountain Goat

03MT055.description: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
03MT055.flavorText: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."
03MT055.name: Soraka

03MT055T1.description:
Each round, the first time you heal a damaged ally, draw 1.
Support: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
03MT055T1.flavorText: "What you give of yourself to help others will be returned to you a hundredfold. This is the power of giving. Generosity is a gift that heals the giver as well, in mind, body, and spirit."
03MT055T1.name: Soraka

03MT055T2.description:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a Soraka in your deck.
03MT055T2.name: Soraka's Wish

03MT048.description: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
03MT048.flavorText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."
03MT048.name: Gift Giver

03MT063.flavorText: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"
03MT063.name: Moondreamer

03MT006.description: Each round, when an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
03MT006.flavorText: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons
03MT006.name: Inviolus Vox

03MT054.flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.
03MT054.name: Leona

03MT054T2.description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round. Create a Leona in your deck.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
03MT054T2.flavorText:
"She is our unflinching leader in the heavens, the blinding flash of our weapons at noon, and the unquenchable fire that burns in our hearts." 
- Solari Priestess
03MT054T2.name: Leona's Morning Light

03MT054T3.flavorText: "The closer they stretch toward the heavens, the more the sun will burn them." - Leona
03MT054T3.name: Solar Flare

03MT054T1.description: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
03MT054T1.flavorText: This was what Leona had prepared for. She knew she would find Diana fleeing down the mountain, retreating before the light of the sun. She breathed deeply to still her fluttering heartbeat, willing it silent with grim resolve. This time upon their meeting, she had the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
03MT054T1.name: Leona

03MT014.flavorText: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.
03MT014.name: Herald of Dragons

03MT058.description: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
03MT058.levelupDescription: I've seen you target or support allies 7+ times.
03MT058.flavorText: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer
03MT058.name: Taric

03MT098.flavorText: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer
03MT098.name: Sunblessed Vigor

03MT040.flavorText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess
03MT040.name: Sparklefly

03MT001T1.description: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
03MT001T1.flavorText: "Hahahaha, lookit 'em GO!  They're just. So. Fast! Is your head spinning too?!" - Zoe
03MT001T1.name: Mischief

03MT220.description: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
03MT220.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer
03MT220.name: The Cloven Way

03MT075.flavorText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening
03MT075.name: Lunari Priestess

03MT020.description: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
03MT020.flavorText: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn.
