While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
03MT020.name: Resplendent Stellacorn

03MT071.flavorText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.
03MT071.name: Tyari the Traveler

03MT002.description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
03MT002.flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
03MT002.name: The Skies Descend

03MT009.description: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
03MT009.levelupDescription: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.
03MT009.flavorText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."
03MT009.name: Zoe

03MT009T2.description:
Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
Create a Zoe in your deck.
03MT009T2.flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
03MT009T2.name: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble

03MT009T1.description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
Nexus Strike: Create a Behold the Infinite that costs 0 in hand.
03MT009T1.flavorText: "Ah, the vastness of space and a myriad realities stretched, squished, and squeezed out before us! Maaaaaybe we'll even see my favorite space doggy!"
03MT009T1.name: Zoe

03MT086.description: Play: Discard 1 to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
03MT086.flavorText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."
03MT086.name: Spacey Sketcher

03MT087.description:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
03MT087.levelupDescription: Round End: Your allies have 20+ total Power.
03MT087.flavorText: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"
03MT087.name: Aurelion Sol

03MT087T1.description:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
03MT087T1.flavorText: Aurelion Sol is handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very inteligent.
03MT087T1.name: Aurelion Sol

03MT087T2.description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
Create an Aurelion Sol in your deck.
03MT087T2.flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
03MT087T2.name: Aurelion Sol's The Skies Descend

03MT214.description: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
03MT214.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer
03MT214.name: The Flight

03MT013.description:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
03MT013.flavorText: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana
03MT013.name: Moonlight Affliction

03MT023.description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
03MT023.flavorText: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.
03MT023.name: Sunburst

03MT096.description: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
03MT096.flavorText: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.
03MT096.name: Solari Priestess

03MT045.description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
03MT045.flavorText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector
03MT045.name: Astral Protection

03MT080.description: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
03MT080.flavorText: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."
03MT080.name: Spring Guardian

03MT080T1.flavorText: "Let the springs soothe that which ails you." - Spring Guardian
03MT080T1.name: Spring Gifts

03MT042.description: Manifest an enemy spell played this game.
03MT042.flavorText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe
03MT042.name: Spell Thief

03MT057.description: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
03MT057.flavorText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.
03MT057.name: Solari Sunforger

03MT091.description: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
03MT091.flavorText: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe
03MT091.name: Supercool Starchart

03MT044.flavorText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription
03MT044.name: Sun Guardian

03MT041.description:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
03MT041.flavorText:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners
03MT041.name: Mentor of the Stones

03MT028.flavorText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.
03MT028.name: Solari Shieldbearer

03MT072.flavorText: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.
03MT072.name: Fused Firebrand

03MT025.flavorText: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric
03MT025.name: Shards of the Mountain

03MT017.description: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
03MT017.flavorText: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess
03MT017.name: Messenger's Sigil

03MT051.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
03MT051.flavorText: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.
03MT051.name: Guiding Touch

03MT012.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
03MT012.flavorText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.
03MT012.name: Arbiter of the Peak

03MT094.flavorText: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest
03MT094.name: Lunari Shadestalker

03MT076.description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
03MT076.flavorText: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."
03MT076.name: Mountain Scryer

03MT215.description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
03MT215.name: Gifts From Beyond

03MT100.description:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
03MT100.flavorText:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
03MT100.name: Eclipse Dragon

03MT058T1.description: Support: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
03MT058T1.flavorText: "Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer
03MT058T1.name: Taric

03MT058T2.description:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a Taric in your deck.
03MT058T2.name: Taric's Blessing of Targon

03MT029.description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
03MT029.flavorText: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"
03MT029.name: Star Shepherd

03MT219.description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+0.
03MT219.flavorText: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.
03MT219.name: The Veiled Temple

03MT092T1.description: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
03MT092T1.flavorText: "You don't need to see to believe. Just have a little faith." - Tyari the Traveler
03MT092T1.name: Gem

03MT062.description: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
03MT062.flavorText: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."
03MT062.name: Giddy Sparkleologist

03MT082.description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
03MT082.flavorText: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona
03MT082.name: Morning Light

03MT047.description: Nightfall: Give me and an ally Elusive this round.
03MT047.flavorText: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.
03MT047.name: Cygnus the Moonstalker

03MT038.flavorText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.
03MT038.name: Whiteflame Protector

03MT081.description: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
03MT081.flavorText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.
03MT081.name: Mountain Sojourners

03MT007.flavorText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
03MT007.name: Fledgling Stellacorn

03MT220T1.description: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
03MT220T1.flavorText: The Solari did not believe that another light could blind--a lesson the Lunari would readily teach.
03MT220T1.name: Sky Charge

03MT216.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
03MT216.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer
03MT216.name: The Sky Shadows

03MT026.description:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
03MT026.flavorText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"
03MT026.name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear

03MT093.description: Deal 5 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
03MT093.name: Paddle Star

03MT110.description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
03MT110.flavorText:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'
03MT110.name: Out Of The Way

03MT003.description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
03MT003.flavorText: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager
03MT003.name: Dragon's Clutch

03MT030.description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
03MT030.flavorText: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."
03MT030.name: Stargazer

03MT088.flavorText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.
03MT088.name: Solari Soldier

03MT089.flavorText: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription
03MT089.name: Crescent Guardian

03MT027.description:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it Overwhelm this round.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
03MT027.flavorText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest
03MT027.name: Zenith Blade

03MT218.description: If you Behold a Celestial, create The Messenger in your deck and grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
03MT218.flavorText:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer
03MT218.name: Starbone

03MT084.description: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
03MT084.flavorText: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol
03MT084.name: Starshaping

03MT016.flavorText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe
03MT016.name: Startled Stomper

03MT074.description: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
03MT074.flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
03MT074.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

03MT035.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
03MT035.flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
03MT035.name: Pale Cascade

03MT003T1.flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
03MT003T1.name: Hatched Egg

03MT003T2.flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
03MT003T2.name: Crushed Egg

03MT039.flavorText: In space, no one can hear you squee.
03MT039.name: Porofly

03PZ019.description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
03PZ019.flavorText: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.
03PZ019.name: Patched Porobot

03PZ005.description: Round Start: Create an Ignition in hand.
03PZ005.flavorText:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011
03PZ005.name: Ballistic Bot

03PZ004.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
03PZ004.flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
03PZ004.name: Death Ray - Mk 1

03PZ004T2.flavorText:
"The beam melts flesh and metal alike with exceptional speed! I have since eagerly integrated it onto my machine body. To see, feel, and dissect the world with such CLARITY... This is the great potential of the human mind unburdened by flesh! A truly glorious evolution!" 
- Viktor's design annotations
03PZ004T2.name: Death Ray - Mk 3

03PZ004T1.description: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 3 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
03PZ004T1.flavorText:
"Altered beam transmission medium, adjusted lenses to optimal focal distances, internal mirrors polished and positioned. Intensity increased tenfold. But it must improve. I MUST IMPROVE!"
- Viktor's design annotations
03PZ004T1.name: Death Ray - Mk 2

03PZ003.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
03PZ003.flavorText: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."
03PZ003.name: Viktor

03PZ003T1.description:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
03PZ003T1.flavorText: "Ah, Piltover. As a boy, I looked up to you, the shining 'City of Progress'. But as a man, I see its corrupt foundations, built atop the suffering of our home, Zaun. Today, we herald a new era of Zaunite innovation--and you will be the first to witness our rise!"
03PZ003T1.name: Viktor

03PZ003T15.description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Viktor in your deck.
03PZ003T15.flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
03PZ003T15.name: Viktor's Death Ray - Mk 1

03PZ003T11.flavorText: Humanity is destined to break free from the confines of flesh. We must become more. We must augment. We must evolve!" - Viktor
03PZ003T11.name: Hex Core Upgrade

03PZ010.description: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
03PZ010.name: Mechanized Mimic

03PZ022.description:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
03PZ022.flavorText:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'
03PZ022.name: Give It All

03PZ014.description: Create an Armed Gearhead, Ballistic Bot, or Nyandroid in hand and grant it +1|+1.
03PZ014.flavorText: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor
03PZ014.name: Calculated Creations

03PZ013.description: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
03PZ013.flavorText: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic
03PZ013.name: Iterative Improvement

03PZ025.description: Remove Fleeting from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 Fleeting.
03PZ025.flavorText: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
03PZ025.name: Stress Testing

03PZ012.flavorText: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."
03PZ012.name: Armed Gearhead

03PZ020.flavorText: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor
03PZ020.name: Hexcore Foundry

03PZ016.flavorText:
"If they do not choose to add metal to their bodies, I will deliver metal to them instead. That was a humorous remark. Ha."
- Ballistic Bot
03PZ016.name: Ignition

03PZ002.flavorText: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."
03PZ002.name: Nyandroid

03PZ011.description: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
03PZ011.flavorText: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor
03PZ011.name: Aftershock

03PZ017.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random 1 cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
03PZ017.flavorText: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger
03PZ017.name: Tri-beam Improbulator

03PZ018.description:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 Daring Poros in hand.
03PZ018.flavorText: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.
03PZ018.name: Poro Cannon

03SI004.description:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact Ephemeral copy in hand.
03SI004.name: Stalking Shadows

03SI001.description: Nightfall: Create a copy of me in hand.
03SI001.flavorText: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter
03SI001.name: Evershade Stalker

03SI018.description: Kill an ally with Last Breath to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
03SI018.name: Gluttony

03SI012.description: Obliterate all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
03SI012.flavorText:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
03SI012.name: Passage Unearned

03SI014.description: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
03SI014.flavorText:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
03SI014.name: Encroaching Shadows

03SI016.description:
Drain 1 from a unit.
Create 2 copies of Go Hard in your deck. Every third time this happens, transform all copies of me everywhere into Pack Your Bags.
03SI016.flavorText:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'
03SI016.name: Go Hard

03SI016T1.description: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me everywhere back to Go Hard.
03SI016T1.flavorText:
"Sorry for the bad news sorry I’m so bad
Only took a minute for me to get all you had
Sorry for the bad news know it makes you sad
I’ll be here for a minute baby you should pack your bags"
- Evelynn, 'THE BADDEST'
03SI016T1.name: Pack Your Bags

03SI007.description: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and SpellShield this round.
03SI007.flavorText: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter
03SI007.name: Shroud of Darkness

03SI013.flavorText: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.
03SI013.name: Risen Mists

03SI005.description: Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
03SI005.flavorText:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
03SI005.name: Nocturne

03SI005T3.description:
Drain 1 from anything. Create a Nocturne in your deck.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
03SI005T3.flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
03SI005T3.name: Nocturne's Unspeakable Horror

03SI005T1.description:
Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
Other allies have Fearsome.
When you summon a unit, give enemies -1|-0 this round.
03SI005T1.flavorText:
"My dreams grow more vivid with each passing night. I see a creature of pure evil, writhing in the dark, twisting its way toward me. Though I was to be stationed here for another week, I have just paid for transport to Fossbarrow this evening. Plainly, I cannot stand this place."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
03SI005T1.name: Nocturne

03SI006.description: Nightfall: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
03SI006.flavorText: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.
03SI006.name: Doombeast

03SI015.description: Last Breath: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
03SI015.flavorText: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.
03SI015.name: Pesky Specter

03SI006T1.flavorText: What knows you better than your own mind? What can torment you more exquisitely than your own dreams?
03SI006T1.name: Torment

03SI003.description: Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Fearsome this round.
03SI003.flavorText: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.
03SI003.name: Stygian Onlooker

03SI002.description:
Drain 1 from anything.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
03SI002.flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
03SI002.name: Unspeakable Horror

03SI010.description: Nightfall: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated Nightfall this game.
03SI010.flavorText: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.
03SI010.name: Duskrider

03IO025.description: Grant an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack. If it already has it, grant it Double Attack instead.
03IO025.flavorText: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon
03IO025.name: Flurry of Fists

03IO017.description: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
03IO017.flavorText:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu
03IO017.name: Pix!

03IO008.description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round.
03IO008.name: Whimsy!

03IO008T1.flavorText: A fae flash knocked him to the floor! Newly keen ears heard a yordle's fading laughter, and he looked down to see furry paws, attached to furry arms...
03IO008T1.name: Squirrel

03IO001.flavorText: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.
03IO001.name: Flower Child

03IO019.description: Pick an ally. Recall ALL other units and landmarks.
03IO019.flavorText: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk
03IO019.name: Singular Will

03IO002.description: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
03IO002.flavorText: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"
03IO002.name: Lulu

03IO002T4.description: Give an ally Barrier or an enemy Vulnerable this round.
03IO002T4.name: Help, Pix!

03IO002T5.description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round. Create a Lulu in your deck.
03IO002T5.name: Lulu's Whimsy!

03IO002T1.description:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Help, Pix! in hand.
Support: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
03IO002T1.flavorText: "Oooh! Look, Pix! It's a whole different world out here! Now let's give it lots of colors!"
03IO002T1.name: Lulu

03IO011.flavorText: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.
03IO011.name: Swole Squirrel

03IO009.flavorText: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...
03IO009.name: Tasty Faefolk

03IO003.flavorText: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."
03IO003.name: Fae Guide

03IO007.description: Support: Create an attacking Mumblesprite with my supported ally's stats.
03IO007.flavorText: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.
03IO007.name: Trevor Snoozebottom

03IO007T1.flavorText: Another mumblesprite burst out, its eyes full of devilish mischief. "No more cheese for Trevor!" Bri announced. The others all nodded.
03IO007T1.name: Mumblesprite

03IO010.description: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
03IO010.flavorText: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!
03IO010.name: Young Witch

03IO020.description: Stop a Fast or Slow spell that costs 3 or less.
03IO020.flavorText: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu
03IO020.name: Nopeify!

03IO022.description: Recall an ally to summon an exact Ephemeral copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
03IO022.flavorText:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'
03IO022.name: Go Get It

03IO018.description:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
03IO018.flavorText: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.
03IO018.name: Fuzzy Caretaker

03DE008.description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
03DE008.flavorText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."
03DE008.name: Dragonguard Lieutenant

03DE015.flavorText: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.
03DE015.name: Stony Suppressor

03DE006.flavorText: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.
03DE006.name: Screeching Dragon

03DE025.description: An ally with Fury strikes the 2 weakest enemies one after another.
03DE025.flavorText: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.
03DE025.name: Molten Breath

03DE002.description: An ally and an enemy strike each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
03DE002.flavorText: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.
03DE002.name: Strafing Strike

03DE011.levelupDescription: I've seen Dragon allies deal 12+ damage.
03DE011.flavorText:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
03DE011.name: Shyvana

03DE011T1.description: Attack: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a Fleeting Strafing Strike in hand.
03DE011T1.flavorText:
"The first time I witnessed her transformation, I beheld her with revulsion. There was Yvva, replete in fire and fury! If only I had known then what I know now--that she would become our sister in arms, an exemplary soldier... and my dear, dear friend."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
03DE011T1.name: Dragon Shyvana

03DE011T2.description:
Grant an ally Challenger.
Create a Shyvana in your deck.
03DE011T2.name: Shyvana's Confront

03DE003.description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
03DE003.flavorText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia
03DE003.name: Dragonguard Lookout

03DE013.flavorText: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
03DE013.name: Stalking Broodmother

03DE005.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
03DE005.flavorText:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
03DE005.name: Egghead Researcher

03DE007.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +2|+2.
03DE007.flavorText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.
03DE007.name: Kadregrin the Infernal

03DE012.description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
03DE012.flavorText: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen
03DE012.name: For The Fallen

03DE014.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and "I can block units with Elusive" this round.
03DE014.flavorText: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.
03DE014.name: Sharpsight

03FR020.description: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and Tough.
03FR020.flavorText: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.
03FR020.name: The Scargrounds

03FR007.description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
03FR007.flavorText:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.
03FR007.name: Troll Scavenger

03FR004.description:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
Enlightened: Reduce its cost to 0.
03FR004.flavorText: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman
03FR004.name: Revitalizing Roar

03FR017.description: Play: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant an ally Overwhelm and Regeneration.
03FR017.flavorText: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.
03FR017.name: Augur of the Old Ones

03FR006.description: When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
03FR006.levelupDescription: I've seen you play Ice Pillar.
03FR006.flavorText:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"
03FR006.name: Trundle

03FR006T2.description:
When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you Behold.
03FR006T2.flavorText: The Avarosans refused. Trundle gestured, and, like an avalanche, the trolls descended with such momentum that it carried them on for miles afterward, deep into the Avarosan tribelands, battering and breaking everything in their path without reserve.
03FR006T2.name: Trundle

03FR006T3.description:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a Trundle in your deck.
03FR006T3.name: Trundle's Icequake

03FR006T1.description:
Play: Refill 8 mana.
Play and Round Start: Give the strongest enemy Vulnerable this round.
03FR006T1.flavorText: "Haha! You didn't see that coming!" - Trundle
03FR006T1.name: Ice Pillar

03FR008.description: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
03FR008.name: Icequake

03FR002.description: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
03FR002.flavorText: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.
03FR002.name: Troll Chant

03FR011.flavorText:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"
03FR011.name: Uzgar the Ancient

03FR005.description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me Regeneration.
03FR005.flavorText: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.
03FR005.name: Troll Ravager

03FR018.description: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
03FR018.flavorText: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger
03FR018.name: Call the Wild

03FR010.description: Round Start: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
03FR010.flavorText:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant
03FR010.name: Faces of the Old Ones

03FR019.description:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
03FR019.flavorText: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.
03FR019.name: Voices of the Old Ones

03FR025.description: Grant an ally Regeneration. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
03FR025.flavorText: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.
03FR025.name: Troll Gifts

03FR022.description: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
03FR022.flavorText:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'
03FR022.name: Feel The Rush

04PZ001.description: Strike: Create a Fleeting Time Trick in hand.
04PZ001.levelupDescription: You've Predicted 4+ times. When I level up, create 3 Chronobreaks in your deck.
04PZ001.flavorText: It's not about how much time you have, it's about how you spend it.
04PZ001.name: Ekko

04PZ001T4.description: Revive all allies that died this round, then Rally.
04PZ001T4.flavorText: "Once more, for the first time." - Ekko
04PZ001T4.name: Chronobreak

04PZ001T2.description:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
Create an Ekko in your deck.
04PZ001T2.name: Ekko's Called Shot

04PZ001T3.description: Strike: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Time Trick in hand.
04PZ001T3.flavorText: Ekko can't fix everyone's mistakes, but that'll never stop him from trying again, and again, and again, and...
04PZ001T3.name: Ekko

04PZ005.description: When you summon another Chirean Sumpworker, Obliterate me and transform allied Chirean Sumpworkers everywhere into Sumpworks Posses.
04PZ005.flavorText: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.
04PZ005.name: Chirean Sumpworker

04PZ005T2.description: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
04PZ005T2.flavorText: It takes a lot to upset a group of chirean, but when they get mad, everyone's gonna know about it.
04PZ005T2.name: Circuit Breaker

04PZ005T1.description: Attack: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
04PZ005T1.flavorText: "They're sweet enough on their own, sure, but get a bunch of 'em together, and before you know it, they've built some madcap machine and are off knockin' down some part of the Lanes." - Zaunite machinist
04PZ005T1.name: Sumpworks Posse

04PZ014.description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
04PZ014.flavorText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger
04PZ014.name: Production Surge

04PZ003.description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
04PZ003.name: Timewinder

04PZ011.description:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
04PZ011.name: Called Shot

04PZ011T1.description: Start a free attack with an exact Ephemeral copy of each ally.
04PZ011T1.name: Parallel Convergence

04PZ002.description: When I'm summoned, create a Hexite Crystal in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
04PZ002.name: Fallen Feline

04PZ020.description: Play: Swap my stats with another unit.
04PZ020.flavorText:
"A new slotbot? Didn't they shut down the plant that made these years ago?"
"I thought so. Something about 'rolling bombs' and 'unintended conflagration."
"Huh."
"...Wanna play?"
"Absolutely yes."
- Zaunite patrons
04PZ020.name: Defective Swapbot

04PZ013.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
04PZ013.flavorText: "OKAY, LITTLE BUDDY, YOU JUST SIT STILL WHILE I FLIP THIS SWITCHAROO OVER HEEERE AND BOOM! HA! ELNUKS FOREVER! We're totally gonna need more grass. And room." - Practical Perfectionist
04PZ013.name: Volunteer Elnuk

04PZ002T1.description:
If you see me in a Prediction, draw me.
Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
04PZ002T1.flavorText: "Strange how such a small thing could change the world so fundamentally. Strange, too, how that cat seems so intent on getting his paws on a sample. I suspect he enjoys the way light bounces through the crystal!" - Hextech researcher
04PZ002T1.name: Hexite Crystal

04PZ010.description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
04PZ010.name: Concurrent Timelines

04PZ016.description: When I'm summoned, create a Flame Chompers! in hand.
04PZ016.flavorText: Jinx had a more conventional supplier once, but the two of them had a small falling out. By which we mean, the supplier fell out of a window. By which we mean, the supplier was blown out of a window. By Jinx.
04PZ016.name: Boom Baboon

04PZ007.flavorText: "The future's what I make it..." - Ekko
04PZ007.name: Time Trick

04PZ012.description: Play: Predict. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
04PZ012.flavorText: "Kay's awesome. She's got that whole 'practice makes perfect' mentality, you know? And boyyy does she practice." - Shomi
04PZ012.name: Practical Perfectionist

04PZ020T1.description: Swap my Power and Health with that of another unit.
04PZ020T1.name: Swapbot's Swap

04PZ017.description: Your cards have -1 cost, Augment, are created by Glorious Evolution, and are now Tech.
04PZ017.flavorText: "Progress is everything. I will bring the future to this city, whether it is ready or not." - Viktor
04PZ017.name: Glorious Evolution

04PZ015.description: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
04PZ015.flavorText: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger
04PZ015.name: Adaptatron 3000

04PZ004.description: If you see me in a Prediction, summon me.
04PZ004.flavorText: "Ahh, Shomi's a GENIUS with that hoverboard. I once saw them switch a sumpgrinder into a bottomboard backslide, then catch air with a three-point triple dip! Or something. Look, the point is, they're awesome, okay?" - Practical Perfectionist
04PZ004.name: Dropboarder

04BW002.description: An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
04BW002.name: Bone Skewer

04BW007.description: Play: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
04BW007.flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a jaull-fish to show you who you can trust, and who you can kill." - Pyke
04BW007.name: Jaull-fish

04BW001.flavorText: When a hammersnout breaks a ship's keel, it seems to do it for sheer entertainment. They rarely devour the crew they stranded, instead leaving a feast for the creatures that follow.
04BW001.name: Redfin Hammersnout

04BW005.description: When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
04BW005.flavorText:
"...the visions are back again. I see his desperate eyes looking up at me whilst the jaull-fish closed its maw around him. We tried pulling, but the ship was too small, and the beast too big. I had no choice. I had to cut his line. I had to."
- Blood-soaked letter
04BW005.name: Pyke

04BW005T2.description:
When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
When I kill an enemy, I strike the weakest enemy.
04BW005T2.flavorText: First he came for his old crew, then other captains, then cheaters, gamblers, and drunkards. Pyke's craving for revenge slowly gave way to a newfound lust for murder. Now, instead of only listing those who once wronged him, his growing manifest only illustrates what Pyke has become.
04BW005T2.name: Pyke

04BW005T1.description:
An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
Create a Pyke in your deck.
04BW005T1.name: Pyke's Bone Skewer

04BW010.description:
Deal 5 to a unit.
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
04BW010.flavorText: "The beast's been stuck already, lads! Now stick it again 'til it stops thrashin' and the waters've lost their blue!" - Jagged Taskmaster
04BW010.name: Monster Harpoon

04BW014.description:
Summon a Powder Keg.
Create a Knock 'Em Down in hand.
04BW014.flavorText: "Done as you asked, Cap'n. Give 'er a little spark and she'll kick back alright." - Dreadway Deckhand
04BW014.name: Line 'Em Up

04BW011.description: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
04BW011.flavorText: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench
04BW011.name: Loaded Dice

04BW015.flavorText: "Might not look much, aye, but they're eager for blood. And if you let 'em at you, they'll know where to find it when they're bigger. Best wear yer gloves." - Jaull Hunters
04BW015.name: Sharkling

04BW003.description: Play: I start a free attack.
04BW003.flavorText:
"Drip, drop, drip, drop, the blood splashes down,
Swim, swim, comes the swarm, better now to drown,
Snip, snap, go the teeth, and we all scream,
To the deep, off we sleep, for forever dreams!"
- Bilgewater nursery rhyme
04BW003.name: Snapjaw Swarm

04BW009.description: When allies attack, before Lurk tries to activate, obliterate the top card of your deck if it doesn't have Lurk.
04BW009.flavorText: Bilgewater's more treacherous coves soon became home to all manner of sea beasts. There they lie, waiting for the next foolhardy crew to ignore the harbormaster's warnings.
04BW009.name: Ripper's Bay

04BW008.description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
04BW008.name: Lost Riches

04BW014T1.flavorText: "A little spark, eh? I've just the thing..." - Gangplank
04BW014T1.name: Knock 'Em Down

04BW013.description:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
Countdown 2: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and Fearsome.
04BW013.flavorText: "Ye think ye've got what it takes to call yourself a Hook, do ye? We'll see, ye tyke. By the time we're done with ye, ye'll either be worth yer weight, or ye'll be weighed down below the waves, bait fer the beasts!" - Petty Officer
04BW013.name: Reaver's Row

04BW007T1.description: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
04BW007T1.name: Frenzied Feast

04BW004.description: Create a Snapjaw Swarm on top of your deck.
04BW004.flavorText: "If it were up ta me, I'd have a jaull-fish take me afore them bloody things. Sooner go fast than be left screamin' fer me mates to stick me while I'm eaten alive." - Jagged Butcher
04BW004.name: Bloodbait

04BW016.description: Play: Play Cannon Barrage on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 6 times.
04BW016.name: Ruined Rex

04BW006.description: Grant an enemy Vulnerable. If it's already Vulnerable, the strongest ally starts a free attack Challenging it.
04BW006.flavorText: "You've got a name, and I've got a list." - Pyke
04BW006.name: The List

04IO008.flavorText: "Fall back! It's time for another to take center stage!" - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
04IO008.name: Defiant Dance

04IO005.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
04IO005.flavorText: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."
04IO005.name: Irelia

04IO020.description:
Play: Draw a Slow, Fast, or Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
04IO020.flavorText: The strange and hauntingly beautiful sky-songs of the Cloud Drinkers kept some of the Black Mist at bay... but only for so long.
04IO020.name: Scattered Pod

04IO005T1.description:
Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
Create an Irelia in your deck.
04IO005T1.flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
04IO005T1.name: Irelia's Vanguard's Edge

04IO005T2.description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
When allies attack, create a Bladesurge in hand.
04IO005T2.flavorText: "...Though our hearts are heavy, we are full of purpose, and return to dance once more."
04IO005T2.name: Irelia

04IO005T5.flavorText: "There is no song more perfect than that of two voices entwined in harmony..." - Blossoming Blade
04IO005T5.name: Flawless Duet

04IO004.flavorText:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
04IO004.name: Blossoming Blade

04IO003.description: Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
04IO003.flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
04IO003.name: Vanguard's Edge

04IO015.flavorText: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk
04IO015.name: Dancing Droplet

04IO014.description: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
04IO014.flavorText: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi
04IO014.name: Shadow Apprentice

04IO002.description:
When you Blade Dance, I attack with the Blades.
Play: Blade Dance 1.
04IO002.flavorText: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"
04IO002.name: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

04IO010.description: Obliterate me when I leave combat.
04IO010.flavorText: "Keep your skills sharp--it is not only the blade that strikes, but the hand behind it." - Irelia
04IO010.name: Blade

04IO007.flavorText: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
04IO007.name: Syncopation

04IO011.description: Recall an ally to create a Flawless Duet in hand.
04IO011.flavorText: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
04IO011.name: Lead and Follow

04IO020T1.description:
Play: Draw a Slow spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
04IO020T1.flavorText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer
04IO020T1.name: Scattered Pod

04IO020T2.description:
Play: Draw a Fast spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
04IO020T2.flavorText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer
04IO020T2.name: Scattered Pod

04IO020T3.description:
Play: Draw a Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
04IO020T3.flavorText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer
04IO020T3.name: Scattered Pod

04IO013.description:
Play: Give an ally Barrier this round and draw a Shen.
Allies with Barrier have Double Attack.
04IO013.flavorText: "Just as we fight to protect the land, the land itself rises up to defend us. We draw strength from the earth's wrath and drive out our enemies. And so, balance remains." - Ionian Priest
04IO013.name: Sacred Protector

04IO012.description: Recall each ally and summon a Living Shadow in its place.
04IO012.flavorText: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed
04IO012.name: Shadows of the Past

04IO009.flavorText: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"
04IO009.name: Ribbon Dancer

04IO001.description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
04IO001.flavorText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.
04IO001.name: Field Musicians

04IO006.description: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
04IO006.flavorText:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter
04IO006.name: Coastal Defender

04SH100.description:
To Play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
04SH100.flavorText: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer
04SH100.name: Careful Preparation

04SH070.description:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
04SH070.flavorText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen
04SH070.name: Unworthy

04SH081.description: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
04SH081.flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
04SH081.name: Baccai Sandspinner

04SH059T2.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
04SH059T2.flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
04SH059T2.name: Rite of Negation

04SH059T1.description: Kill an ally to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
04SH059T1.flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
04SH059T1.name: Rite of Negation

04SH077.description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
04SH077.flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
04SH077.name: Voice of the Risen

04SH019.description:
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
Round End: Place me into your deck.
04SH019.flavorText: "Young Jhuraa was exploring, as is his way, and in a small hidden cave, discovered some ancient texts! We took them to a translator in Marrowmark, and the scrolls... they speak of an ancient terror who stalked our ancestors. A queen. A xer'sai queen!" - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder
04SH019.name: Rek'Sai

04SH019T2.description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
Create a Rek'Sai in your deck.
04SH019T2.flavorText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer
04SH019T2.name: Rek'Sai's Call the Pack

04SH019T1.description:
When I level up, create 3 random Lurkers in hand.
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
04SH019T1.flavorText: "We have known of her terror for generations, but for our ancestors to know her, too? How old must she be? How many of our people has she butchered? The thought unsettles me greatly." - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder
04SH019T1.name: Rek'Sai

04SH138.description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a The Absolver's Return in hand.
04SH138.flavorText: "Everyone told me not to use this. 'No one must wield such a powerful weapon,' they said." - Akshan
04SH138.name: The Absolver

04SH089.description: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
04SH089.flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
04SH089.name: Desert Naturalist

04SH089T1.description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
04SH089T1.flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
04SH089T1.name: Teen Spirit

04SH015.flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
04SH015.name: Raz Bloodmane

04SH058.description: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
04SH058.flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
04SH058.name: Sandcrafter

04SH080.description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
04SH080.flavorText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer
04SH080.name: Call the Pack

04SH035.description: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
04SH035.flavorText: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir
04SH035.name: Payday

04SH028.description:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
04SH028.flavorText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.
04SH028.name: Ancient Preparations

04SH054.description: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
04SH054.flavorText: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."
04SH054.name: Treasure Seeker

04SH002.description: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
04SH002.flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH002.name: Baccai Reaper

04SH042.flavorText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary
04SH042.name: Hibernating Rockbear

04SH032.description: Reputation: I cost 3 and when I'm summoned, grant me Overwhelm.
04SH032.flavorText: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."
04SH032.name: Callous Bonecrusher

04SH055.flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
04SH055.name: Ruin Runner

04SH039.description: Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
04SH039.levelupDescription: I've seen you destroy 2 allied Time Bombs.
04SH039.flavorText: Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.
04SH039.name: Zilean

04SH060T1.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 and advance other allied Time Bombs 1 round.
Countdown 1: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
04SH060T1.name: Time Bomb

04SH039T3.description:
To Play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
Create a Zilean in your deck.
04SH039T3.flavorText: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer
04SH039T3.name: Zilean's Careful Preparation

04SH039T2.description:
Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
Create a Zilean in your deck.
04SH039T2.flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
04SH039T2.name: Zilean's Chronoshift

04SH039T1.description:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting copy of each non-Fleeting card I saw you play last round.
Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
04SH039T1.flavorText: Countless possibilities stretched before and behind him. He saw them all at once, a dizzying array that only he could decipher. With a single gesture, Zilean could unfold entire timelines -- but none had yet shown him how to save Icathia.
04SH039T1.name: Zilean

04SH073.description: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
04SH073.flavorText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima
04SH073.name: Taliyah

04SH073T2.description:
Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
Attack: I deal 2 damage to my blocker 3 times. If it's dead or gone, I deal 2 damage to the enemy Nexus instead.
04SH073T2.flavorText: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.
04SH073T2.name: Taliyah

04SH073T1.description: Deal 2 to Taliyah's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
04SH073T1.name: Threaded Volley

04SH073T3.description:
Manifest a landmark you can afford.
Create a Taliyah in your deck.
04SH073T3.flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
04SH073T3.name: Taliyah's Stoneweaving

04SH091.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
04SH091.flavorText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"
04SH091.name: Khahiri the Student

04SH024.description: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the strongest ally +2|+2.
04SH024.flavorText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.
04SH024.name: Salt Spire

04SH003.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
04SH003.flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH003.name: Azir

04SH003T2.description:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
04SH003T2.flavorText:
"The Emperor Azir, though haughty, is generous. Above all, he cares deeply for those who would march alongside him into Shurima's golden future, as the nation rises anew, its people once again united under his rule." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH003T2.name: Azir

04SH003T3.description:
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
04SH003T3.flavorText: "Short of fulfilling his destiny, Azir's lifelong friend - and newly named brother - hatefully cast him off the dais. In that fateful moment Shurima was cursed, doomed to ruin for thousands of years to follow." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH003T3.name: Azir

04SH003T14.flavorText: "They appeared out of nowhere, made up of swirling sands! Then, after they had dispatched our forces, their forms simply... disappeared, melted back into the desert." - Desert Survivor
04SH003T14.name: Sandstone Charger

04SH003T5.description: Play and Round Start: Summon 2 Sand Soldiers and grant them +2|+2.
04SH003T5.flavorText: Now more powerful than ever, Azir has raised his most loyal soldiers to lead his armies.
04SH003T5.name: Golden Herald

04SH003T4.description:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
Create a Azir in your deck.
04SH003T4.name: Azir's Arise!

04SH003T10.description:
Enemies are Vulnerable.
Round Start: Rally.
04SH003T10.flavorText: "Observe our god-emperor! He knows the power of these lands better than any, and his army only grows. Shurima is risen, and it shall never fall again!" - Voice of the Risen
04SH003T10.name: General's Palace

04SH003T1.description: Nexus Strike: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
04SH003T1.flavorText: Azir's legions were reputed to be unstoppable even before Shurima was reborn, but now they are truly innumerable.
04SH003T1.name: Sand Soldier

04SH003T8.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
04SH003T8.flavorText: "Behold! See how our champion sits astride the lion? Even the king of beasts would yield to his power, for he is the Will of Azir!" - Voice of the Risen
04SH003T8.name: Eternal Gladiator

04SH003T6.flavorText: "Those who oppose us will be reduced to dust." - Azir
04SH003T6.name: Crumbling Sands

04SH003T12.flavorText: The storm rolls in with a peal like thunder, and when it passes, it leaves nothing behind.
04SH003T12.name: Sandstorm

04SH003T11.flavorText: The emperor's golden guard moves as one, a succession of regimented warriors that is as terrifying as it is impressive to behold.
04SH003T11.name: Emperor's Guard

04SH003T7.description:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral.
Draw 1.
04SH003T7.flavorText: Between the sand, the sun, and the heat, it can be difficult to tell what is real, and what is merely a mirage.
04SH003T7.name: Shimmering Mirage

04SH003T13.description:
Rally.
Summon Renekton and Nasus. Immediately level them up to level 3.
04SH003T13.flavorText: "They will serve their emperor. My generals will make sure of it." - Azir
04SH003T13.name: Ascended's Call

04SH003T9.flavorText: Birds found in the desert climes are all considered symbols of Azir, and Shurimans find their presence a good omen.
04SH003T9.name: Emperor's Prosperity

04SH011.description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
04SH011.flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
04SH011.name: Xenotype Researchers

04SH130.description: When I'm summoned or Strike: Summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 1 round.
04SH130.levelupDescription: Warlord's Palace has finished its Countdown. When I level up, summon a Warlord's Hoard.
04SH130.flavorText: "The Sentinels' code seems full of complicated restrictions. Things like 'Never take a life in the name of vengeance' and 'Fight for the world, never for yourself'. As for me..."
04SH130.name: Akshan

04SH130T5.description:
An ally you've targeted this round strikes an enemy.
Create an Akshan in your deck.
04SH130T5.flavorText: "They never expect the grappling hook!" - Akshan
04SH130T5.name: Akshan's Grappling Hook

04SH130T2.description: When I'm summoned or Strike: Summon a Warlord's Hoard or advance it 1 round.
04SH130T2.flavorText: "My code is far simpler--disregard any rule that prevents me from doing whatever I want."
04SH130T2.name: Akshan

04SH130T1.description:
Countdown 8: Create a Relic of Power in hand.
When you target allies advance me 1.
04SH130T1.flavorText: "See that eyesore of a building? That's where the swine lives. We'll take him out, grab the loot, and be back in time for dinner." - Vekauran Vagabond
04SH130T1.name: Warlord's Palace

04SH130T6.description:
Countdown 8: Create a Sentinel's Hoard in hand.
When you target allies advance me 1.
04SH130T6.flavorText: When a group of survivors from the fallen city of Vekaura learned of a particular warlord's sordid history, they wasted no time making plans to seize his ill-gotten gains.
04SH130T6.name: Warlord's Hoard

04SH130T13.description: Play a The Absolver's Resurrection, a Fount of Power, or a Shield of the Sentinels.
04SH130T13.flavorText: Before the thief could even reach for her tools, a pale green fog enveloped the box, coaxing it open with a cold whisper.
04SH130T13.name: Sentinel's Hoard

04SH130T7.description: Draw 2. Your cards cost 1 less this round.
04SH130T7.flavorText: "My love... Why won't you answer? Please. Answer me, Isolde. ANSWER ME!" - Viego
04SH130T7.name: Fount of Power

04SH130T14.description: Grant all enemies Vulnerable and create in hand a 0 cost copy of the strongest ally that died this game.
04SH130T14.flavorText: "Fate is what I make it." - Akshan
04SH130T14.name: The Absolver's Resurrection

04SH130T8.description: Grant your champions everywhere SpellShield and +2|+2.
04SH130T8.flavorText: The Sentinels of Light trace their heritage back to blessed Helia. The relic stones they saved from the Ruination would become the world's greatest defense against the darkness of the Black Mist.
04SH130T8.name: Shield of the Sentinels

04SH130T10.description: Pick 1 - Predict then draw 1, summon a Sandstone Charger, or grant all allies +1|+0.
04SH130T10.flavorText: The Black Mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
04SH130T10.name: Relic of Power

04SH130T12.flavorText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
04SH130T12.name: Relic of Power

04SH130T9.flavorText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
04SH130T9.name: Relic of Power

04SH130T11.flavorText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
04SH130T11.name: Relic of Power

04SH114.description:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
04SH114.flavorText: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.
04SH114.name: Desert's Wrath

04SH067.description: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
04SH067.flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH067.name: Renekton

04SH067T1.description: When I block or Attack: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
04SH067T1.flavorText: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH067T1.name: Renekton

04SH067T4.flavorText: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH067T4.name: Renekton

04SH067T2.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create a Renekton in your deck.
04SH067T2.name: Renekton's Ruthless Predator

04SH067T5.description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
04SH067T5.name: Dominus Destruction

04SH138T1.description: Give an ally Overwhelm and +2|+1 this round.
04SH138T1.name: The Absolver's Return

04SH120.description: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand, or advance your landmarks 1 round.
04SH120.name: Imagined Possibilities

04SH119.description:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
04SH119.flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
04SH119.name: Ricochet

04SH068.flavorText: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.
04SH068.name: Xer'sai Caller

04SH093.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
04SH093.flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
04SH093.name: Shaped Stone

04SH079.description:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
04SH079.flavorText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir
04SH079.name: Scrying Sands

04SH038.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
04SH038.flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
04SH038.name: Rock Hopper

04SH104.description: Play: Advance an allied landmark 3 rounds.
04SH104.flavorText: Whenever he seeks a moment's peace, Zilean returns to Icathia's last garden, just as he remembers it.
04SH104.name: Preservationist

04SH128.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 2 rounds.
04SH128.flavorText: Seeing Akshan hanging underneath the fourth-floor window, Najah cursed under her breath. Pretty boy beat her to the mark. Again. Turning her dagger over in her hand, she pondered what to say to him. Maybe this time, he'd finally acknowledge her.
04SH128.name: Vekauran Vagabond

04SH109.description: Give an enemy -4|-0 or 2 enemies -1|-0 this round. Disable their positive keywords this round.
04SH109.flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
04SH109.name: Quicksand

04SH109T1.description: Give 2 enemies -1|-0 and disable their positive keywords this round.
04SH109T1.flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
04SH109T1.name: Quicksand

04SH109T2.description: Give an enemy -4|-0 and disable its positive keywords this round.
04SH109T2.flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
04SH109T2.name: Quicksand

04SH043.description:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
04SH043.flavorText: "Go. Surround them. They cannot fight the land itself." - Azir
04SH043.name: Shifting Sands

04SH099.description:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
04SH099.name: Arise!

04SH048.description:
Reputation: I cost 0. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
04SH048.flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
04SH048.name: Inner Sanctum

04SH056.description: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
04SH056.flavorText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders!
