Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."
04SH056.name: Profiteer

04SH098T12.flavorText: "If I can't get past you, I'll just go through you." - Sivir
04SH098T12.name: Lucky Find

04SH098T10.flavorText: "Can't spend your earnings if you're dead." - Sivir
04SH098T10.name: Lucky Find

04SH098T8.flavorText: "Go on. Gimme your best shot. Then it's my turn." - Sivir
04SH098T8.name: Lucky Find

04SH098T1.flavorText: "Your tricks ain't worth the sand you're standing on, kid." - Sivir
04SH098T1.name: Lucky Find

04SH098.description: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
04SH098.name: Lucky Find

04SH020.flavorText: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.
04SH020.name: Sivir

04SH057.description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
04SH057.flavorText: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.
04SH057.name: Inspiring Marshal

04SH103.flavorText: "And... there. Tied up, nice 'n pretty. Renekton likes his meals delivered still-squirming."
04SH103.name: Merciless Hunter

04SH120T1.description: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand.
04SH120T1.name: Imagined Possibilities

04SH006.description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it Vulnerable.
04SH006.flavorText: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.
04SH006.name: Roiling Sands

04SH076T1.description: Countdown 1: Summon exact copies of the units and landmarks stored inside.
04SH076T1.flavorText:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers
04SH076T1.name: Stasis Statue

04SH065.description: Attack: If I have 8+ Power, give me Fearsome, Overwhelm, and SpellShield this round.
04SH065.flavorText: "It is said that hundreds of years ago, the river Khaleek bore a great trading outpost known as Taraleek upon its shores. That is, until one fateful day, when a mighty beast broke through the ground, and annihilated both the outpost and all who called it home. But what monster could do such a thing?" - Shuriman historian
04SH065.name: Xerxa'Reth, The Undertitan

04SH034.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Instant Centuries in hand.
04SH034.flavorText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.
04SH034.name: The Clock Hand

04SH034T1.description: Summon a random landmark with Countdown, or advance a landmark 4 rounds.
04SH034T1.flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'..." - Zilean
04SH034T1.name: Instant Century

04SH034T2.flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean
04SH034T2.name: Instant Century

04SH034T3.description: Summon a random landmark with Countdown.
04SH034T3.flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean
04SH034T3.name: Instant Century

04SH082.description:
Draw 1.
If you've slain a unit this round, drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
04SH082.flavorText: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.
04SH082.name: Ruinous Path

04SH075.description: Give enemies Vulnerable this round and summon 6 Sand Soldiers.
04SH075.name: Emperor's Divide

04SH018.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
04SH018.name: Rite of Dominance

04SH009.description: Play: If you've slain 4+ units this game, an enemy and I strike each other.
04SH009.flavorText: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.
04SH009.name: Rampaging Baccai

04SH049.description: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
04SH049.flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
04SH049.name: Destined Poro

04SH049T1.flavorText: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.
04SH049T1.name: Exalted Poro

04SH045.description: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
04SH045.flavorText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.
04SH045.name: Exhaust

04SH037.flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
04SH037.name: Unraveled Earth

04SH107.description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
04SH107.flavorText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir
04SH107.name: Ascended's Rise

04SH047.description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
04SH047.flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH047.name: Nasus

04SH097.description: Play: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
04SH097.flavorText: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.
04SH097.name: Sanctum Conservator

04SH026.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
04SH026.flavorText: "As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
04SH026.name: Dunekeeper

04SH102.description: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
04SH102.flavorText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"
04SH102.name: Golden Ambassador

04SH001.flavorText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.
04SH001.name: Aspiring Chronomancer

04SH022.flavorText: While all xer'sai are able tunnelers, only their dunebreakers have the mass and power needed to break through the veins of solid bedrock that snake through the Great Sai, and open up the lands beyond for further hunting.
04SH022.name: Xer'sai Dunebreaker

04SH009T1.description: Rampaging Baccai and an enemy strike each other.
04SH009T1.flavorText: The baccai are twisted, warped versions of what they might have been - had they become part of the Ascended Host - and the rage they feel at their failure must be unleashed somewhere.
04SH009T1.name: Baccai Rampage

04SH030.description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
04SH030.flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
04SH030.name: Chronoshift

04SH013.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
04SH013.flavorText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.
04SH013.name: Preservarium

04SH062.description:
Start of Game: Summon 1 of me from your deck if it's all Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
When an Ascended ally levels up, advance me 9 rounds.
04SH062.flavorText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.
04SH062.name: Buried Sun Disc

04SH016.description:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
04SH016.name: Siphoning Strike

04SH125.description: Play: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
04SH125.flavorText: Tena waited patiently as her pet's caustic spittle wore away the gilded bars of the palace's rear gate. Around the corner, she would soon find a hoard of unspeakably valuable treasure--more than enough to bring Vekaura back to its former glory.
04SH125.name: Vekauran Safecracker

04SH108.description: An ally strikes the strongest and weakest enemies one after another.
04SH108.name: Boomerang Blade

04SH066.description: Predict and advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
04SH066.flavorText: "If only you saw time as I do, you would know it is not immutable." - Zilean
04SH066.name: Time in a Bottle

04SH014.flavorText: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.
04SH014.name: Clockling

04SH047T1.description:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
Create a Nasus in your deck.
04SH047T1.name: Nasus' Siphoning Strike

04SH047T2.description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game. 
Enemies have -3|-0.
04SH047T2.flavorText: "His hope revived by Shurima's rise, Nasus finally returned after years spent wandering the desert, eager to make amends with his brother. He never suspected he would find Renekton maddened by years spent suffering at Xerath's hands in the tomb, waiting for him." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH047T2.name: Nasus

04SH047T3.description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game. 
Enemies have -1|-0.
04SH047T3.flavorText: "For years, Nasus and his brother Renekton served the empire. Nasus was a scholar, Renekton a fierce warrior. It was not until the two were called upon to confront the betrayer, Xerath, that Nasus was forced to make a terrible choice..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
04SH047T3.name: Nasus

04SH021.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
04SH021.flavorText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.
04SH021.name: Khahiri the Returned

04SH101.description: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
04SH101.flavorText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"
04SH101.name: Devoted Council

04SH012.description: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 3 rounds.
04SH012.flavorText: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker
04SH012.name: Esteemed Hierophant

04SH020T2.description:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a Sivir in your deck.
04SH020T2.flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
04SH020T2.name: Sivir's Ricochet

04SH020T1.description: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
04SH020T1.flavorText: "If you wanna work with me, I'll give you the same talk I give everyone: work for your share, and you'll get everything you're due. But if you slow me down, or get in my way, I'll kill you myself."
04SH020T1.name: Sivir

04SH031.description: Grant an allied landmark "My Countdown completion effect activates twice".
04SH031.flavorText: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean
04SH031.name: Promising Future

04SH004.description: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
04SH004.flavorText: "One life in return for so many. One life so that others might thrive." - Nasus
04SH004.name: Weight of Judgment

04SH059.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
04SH059.flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
04SH059.name: Rite of Negation

04SH044.description: Play: Advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
04SH044.flavorText: The constructs that guard Zilean's tower are able to withstand the harsh desert for millennia, and not just for their clever construction.
04SH044.name: Clockwork Curator

04SH076.description: Obliterate an ally to summon a Stasis Statue in place with the ally stored inside.
04SH076.flavorText:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher
04SH076.name: Ancient Hourglass

04SH118.flavorText: "The box might be worth something, but whatever's inside sure as sand isn't. By which I mean, it's not worth opening. Speaking from experience, here." - Sivir
04SH118.name: Waking Sands

04SH072.description: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks SpellShield.
04SH072.flavorText: "Ah, you did not expect to see water in the middle of the desert. Worry not. Come, drink your fill, wash your feet. Rest in the shade awhile. This is Azir's new Shurima, and it is an oasis."
04SH072.name: Soothsayer

04SH041.description: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
04SH041.flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
04SH041.name: Sai Scout

04SH005.flavorText: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.
04SH005.name: Bloodthirsty Marauder

04SH083.flavorText: "The fin brings fear, but the teeth bring death." - Shuriman saying
04SH083.name: Feral Prescience

04SH092.description:
Summon a Clockling.
If you've Predicted this game, summon 2 instead.
04SH092.flavorText: "Come here and stop fussing! You have sand in your gears." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer
04SH092.name: The Time Has Come

04SH046.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
04SH046.flavorText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.
04SH046.name: Sandstone Chimera

04SH062T1.description:
Immediately draw 1 of each of your Ascended allies.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascended allies are level 3.
04SH062T1.flavorText: "Shurima has known no glory like today. Come, bask in the light of our sun!" - Voice of the Risen
04SH062T1.name: Restored Sun Disc

04SH018T2.description: Kill an ally to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
04SH018T2.name: Rite of Dominance

04SH018T1.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
04SH018T1.name: Rite of Dominance

04SH105.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
04SH105.flavorText: As they passed through the ravine, the Sandcrafter spoke the words of magic. A gust of wind echoed through the canyon and turned to the thunder of oncoming hooves.
04SH105.name: Sandswept Tomb

04SH131.description: An ally you've targeted this round strikes an enemy.
04SH131.flavorText: "They never expect the grappling hook!" - Akshan
04SH131.name: Grappling Hook

04SH074.flavorText: Once a caravan has been disabled, the hunters will occasionally retreat and allow their hatchlings to forage forward. It is here that the young xer'sai refine their instincts, learning which sounds are of the desert, and which signal their prey.
04SH074.name: Xer'sai Hatchling

04SH137.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in hand if you've leveled a champion this game.
04SH137.flavorText: The giant scarabs were thought to have perished when the Shuriman empire fell. But the Mist's creeping tendrils burrowed deep into the sands, and bound the ancient things to Viego's service.
04SH137.name: Thrumming Swarm

04SH069.description: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
04SH069.name: Ruthless Predator

04SH121.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
04SH121.name: Rite of Calling

04SH121T1.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
04SH121T1.name: Rite of Calling

04SH121T2.description: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
04SH121T2.name: Rite of Calling

04SH097T1.description: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
04SH097T1.flavorText: "We are where both gods and men find their end." - Sanctum Conservator
04SH097T1.name: Conservator's Judgment

04SH110.description: Manifest a landmark you can afford.
04SH110.flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
04SH110.name: Stoneweaving

04SH051.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
04SH051.flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
04SH051.name: Emperor's Dais

04SH106.description: Give enemies -2|-0 and "Round End: Deal 2 to me" this round.
04SH106.name: Spirit Fire

04SH129.description: Strike: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
04SH129.flavorText:
"Okay, Barb. That's the last of the guards on this floor, but we've still gotta keep a low profile."
"BLARGH-BLAAA!"
"Inside voice, Barbara."
"Blarb."
"That's my girl."
04SH129.name: Vekauran Bruiser

04SH090.flavorText:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary
04SH090.name: Grumpy Rockbear

04FR006.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
04FR006.flavorText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."
04FR006.name: Draklorn Inquisitor

04FR012.description: Obliterate each enemy to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the enemy stored inside.
04FR012.name: Buried in Ice

04FR016.description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
Plunder: Grant +2|+4 instead.
04FR016.flavorText: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna
04FR016.name: Spoils of War

04FR001T1.flavorText: Freed from its icy tomb, the corrupted troll knew one thing, and one thing only - it must do as its dark mistress commanded.
04FR001T1.name: Frostguard Thrall

04FR013.description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
04FR013.flavorText: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall
04FR013.name: Cold Resistance

04FR005.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
04FR005.levelupDescription: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+. When I level up, create a Watcher in hand.
04FR005.flavorText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."
04FR005.name: Lissandra

04FR005T4.description:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 5+ allies that cost 8+ this game. 
Attack: Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 3 non-champions.
04FR005T4.flavorText: "This is the end. As it was foretold -- as I promised. Sisters... forgive me." - Lissandra
04FR005T4.name: Watcher

04FR005T1.description:
Your Nexus is Tough.
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Ice Shard in hand.
04FR005T1.flavorText: Few know what Lissandra sacrificed in order to gain power, her ambitions too great to be stymied by mortal trappings.
04FR005T1.name: Lissandra

04FR005T2.description:
Obliterate a unit and summon a Frozen Tomb in its place.
Create a Lissandra in your deck.
04FR005T2.name: Lissandra's Entomb

04FR011.description:
Frostbite an enemy.
Summon a Frozen Thrall.
04FR011.flavorText: "The cold elicits many reactions. Let us find out yours." - Lissandra
04FR011.name: Succumb to the Cold

04FR019T1.flavorText: The young wolves were the most nervous, but were quickly emboldened as they saw their mother lunge for the boar's throat, icy fangs flashing.
04FR019T1.name: Rimefang Pack

04FR001.flavorText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...
04FR001.name: Frozen Thrall

04FR007.description: Obliterate a unit to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the unit stored inside.
04FR007.name: Entomb

04FR007T1.description: Countdown 2: Summon exact copies of the units and landmarks stored inside.
04FR007T1.flavorText: "Our lady will bury this world and all you know in ice." - Draklorn Inquisitor
04FR007T1.name: Frozen Tomb

04FR017.description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
Enlightened: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
04FR017.flavorText: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.
04FR017.name: Ancestral Boon

04FR014.description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2.
Countdown 1: Deal 2 to ALL units.
04FR014.flavorText: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.
04FR014.name: Blighted Ravine

04FR009.flavorText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra
04FR009.name: Ice Shard

04FR015.description: When I'm summoned, grant all ally Poros a random keyword.
04FR015.flavorText: There is one figure said to be legendary to all porokind. It is said that, as he travels, he bestows his deserving furry friends with all manner of magical forged gifts.
04FR015.name: Fabled Poro

04FR019.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Rimefang Pack. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you've Frostbitten enemies this game.
04FR019.flavorText: The rimefang wolves circled the drüvask, crouched low, wary. The stench of death clung tightly to it, pungent and overwhelming.
04FR019.name: Rimefang Denmother

04FR018.description:
Round Start: If you have 2+ Yetis, summon me from hand and create a copy of me in your deck.
Play: Draw a Yeti.
04FR018.flavorText: "...and they're sneaky, too! Last time I was out there, I had found shelter in a cave, only to find yearlings in there, fast asleep. Tried to keep my distance, but then one of the big 'uns returned, tall as a mountain, and covered in ice! Now you listen to me, because..." - Babbling Bjerg
04FR018.name: Abominable Guardian

04FR010.description: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
04FR010.flavorText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.
04FR010.name: Three Sisters

04NX002.flavorText: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.
04NX002.name: Whispered Words

04NX010.description: When I'm summoned, create a Guile in hand.
04NX010.flavorText: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy
04NX010.name: Thorn of the Rose

04NX021.description: When you target me, grant me +1|+0.
04NX021.flavorText: After countless battles, Beryn had vowed to never again raise his sword, even if it meant forfeiting his life. But when the strange mists swept through Noxus and overtook Thea, he knew he had to break his promise. He would free her, no matter the cost.
04NX021.name: Retired Reckoner

04NX022.description: When I'm summoned, create a Midnight Raid in hand.
04NX022.flavorText: When her sentence ended, Thea knew she could never rejoin her people. War - and Noxus - had changed her, made her a killer. She wouldn't know peace. Instead, she put her newfound skills to use for coin in the arenas.
04NX022.name: Ruined Reckoner

04NX022T1.description: An ally starts a free attack.
04NX022T1.name: Midnight Raid

04NX015.description:
Reputation: I cost 2. 
An ally with 5+ Power strikes an enemy.
04NX015.flavorText: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc
04NX015.name: Bloody Business

04NX019.description: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
04NX019.flavorText: Surprised by the resilience of the creature they'd found on the shore of Ionia, the young general insisted on taking it back home, eager to find out its true strength.
04NX019.name: Thrashing Snapper

04NX008.description:
Reputation: I cost 6. 
When I'm summoned, Rally.
04NX008.flavorText: Within the inner chambers of the Black Rose, Noxian nobles play their pieces, and murder befalls distant victims.
04NX008.name: Incisive Tactician

04NX006.description: Reputation: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the strongest ally that struck this round.
04NX006.flavorText: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."
04NX006.name: Black Rose Spy

04NX001.description:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
04NX001.flavorText: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.
04NX001.name: Mimic

04NX004.levelupDescription: I've seen you deal 15+ damage. When I level up, create a Mirror Image in hand.
04NX004.flavorText: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."
04NX004.name: LeBlanc

04NX004T1.description:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a LeBlanc in your deck.
04NX004T1.flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
04NX004T1.name: LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice

04NX005.description: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
04NX005.name: Mirror Image

04NX004T2.description: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a Mirror Image in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead.
04NX004T2.name: LeBlanc

04NX016.flavorText: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise
04NX016.name: Shrieking Spinner

04NX007.description: Attack: Increase my Power by the total Power of all allies.
04NX007.flavorText: A nameless aberration towered above them in the smoke-filled chamber. The mages chanted in discordant chorus, dread their voices reaching a strained, fevered pitch. The monster breathed deep of their mounting fear, and each breath brought it terrible power.
04NX007.name: Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin

04NX018.description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
04NX018.flavorText: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple
04NX018.name: Crimson Bloodletter

04NX003.description:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
04NX003.flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
04NX003.name: Sigil of Malice

04NX017.flavorText: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.
04NX017.name: Strength in Numbers

04NX009.flavorText: "You will act with grace and courtesy. You will flatter, you will disarm. You will listen. You will learn. And, when it is time, you will strike, and you WILL kill." - LeBlanc
04NX009.name: Thorned Blade

04SI005.description:
Each round, the first time you slay a unit, I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
04SI005.levelupDescription: I've seen you slay 2 units with my mark.
04SI005.flavorText:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.
04SI005.name: Kindred

04SI005T4.description:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a Kindred in your deck.
04SI005T4.name: Kindred's Spirit Journey

04SI005T1.description:
Each round, the first time you slay a unit, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
04SI005T1.flavorText:
Death took the form of hunters 
None escape such as they
One cajoles with arrows and bow
One chases down its prey.
04SI005T1.name: Kindred

04SI055.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
04SI055.levelupDescription: I've seen allies with 20+ total power die.
04SI055.flavorText: "There is something that deeply unsettles me about the young king. Something at his heart... a hunger that cannot be satisfied, a desire that goes unfulfilled." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor
04SI055.name: Viego

04SI055T1.description:
Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
Create a Viego in your deck.
04SI055T1.flavorText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego
04SI055T1.name: Viego's Despair

04SI055T2.description:
Each round, the first time a unit dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
Round Start: Steal the strongest enemy this round. If it's a champion, kill it instead.
04SI055T2.flavorText: "It is obvious to me in hindsight that it was not Isolde's death that fueled Viego's delusions, nor his need for fulfillment, but simply that something he desperately wanted was denied him." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor
04SI055T2.name: Viego

04SI016.description: Play: Kill an ally to draw 2.
04SI016.flavorText: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.
04SI016.name: Spirit Leech

04SI007.description: Play: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
04SI007.flavorText: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor
04SI007.name: The Etherfiend

04SI011.description:
Draw 1.
Nightfall: Activate an ally's Nightfall effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
04SI011.flavorText: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother
04SI011.name: Unto Dusk

04SI018.description: Once I've seen 3 Fearsome allies attack, destroy me to summon Vilemaw.
04SI018.flavorText:
Its altars may lie dormant, its paths may seem untrod,
But in the dark still skitters, the beast that fools forgot.
04SI018.name: The Twisted Treeline

04SI015.description: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Toss 1.
04SI015.flavorText: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain
04SI015.name: Sea Scarab

04SI045.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allied Viegos and other Encroaching Mists everywhere +1|+1.
04SI045.flavorText: Each living creature that beholds the Black Mist sees something unique in it, their own fears manifested and realized in vague, roiling forms.
04SI045.name: Encroaching Mist

04SI004.description: Play: Play me as First Wave or Last Wind.
04SI004.flavorText: The Kinkou speak of only two gods: the first wave, who cradles life in its warm waters, and the last wind, who snatches life with its final, frigid sighs.
04SI004.name: The Wings and The Wave

04SI004T1.description: To play me, kill an ally.
04SI004T1.name: Last Wind

04SI004T2.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
04SI004T2.name: First Wave

04SI017.description: Grant an ally Lifesteal, Fearsome, and Ephemeral.
04SI017.flavorText: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler
04SI017.name: Song of the Isles

04SI054.description: When I'm summoned, summon an Encroaching Mist.
04SI054.flavorText: The soldiers of Camavor marched with Viego in life, then again in death, their loyalty unwavering.
04SI054.name: Camavoran Soldier

04SI001.description: Give the weakest ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
04SI001.flavorText: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb
04SI001.name: Lamb's Respite

04SI056.flavorText: "I will take what I want, and dispense with what I don't." - Viego
04SI056.name: Withering Mist

04SI012.description: Play: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
04SI012.flavorText: A handful of Targonian tribes speak of the Fox, a god of death seen as a lone star in the night sky. As the legend goes, the Fox descends upon the mountain with each death, and takes the soul to the skies to create his own dark constellation.
04SI012.name: Astral Fox

04SI029.description: Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
04SI029.flavorText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego
04SI029.name: Despair

04SI012T1.description: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
04SI012T1.name: Symmetry In Stars

04SI009.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and Fearsome if an ally died this round.
04SI009.flavorText: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."
04SI009.name: Soulspinner

04SI013.description: Play: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
04SI013.flavorText: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?
04SI013.name: Mask Mother

04SI007T3.description: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
04SI007T3.flavorText: "Eventually all will be forgotten." - The Etherfiend
04SI007T3.name: The Second Death

04SI021.description: To play me, I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
04SI021.flavorText: At first, the Demacian soldiers thought they heard dozens of claws skittering across the square's tile. It wasn't until it breached the watchtower that they realized those many limbs belonged to a single creature.
04SI021.name: Crawling Viperwyrm

04SI002.description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
04SI002.name: Spirit Journey

04SI053.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon an Encroaching Mist.
04SI053.flavorText: Maokai worked tirelessly to cultivate life in the Shadow Isles. The Mist's ambivalence makes its ironies no less cruel.
04SI053.name: Invasive Hydravine

04SI003.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
04SI003.flavorText: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?
04SI003.name: Fading Icon

04SI014.flavorText: "They flicker through the dark forest, dotting the treeline like stars in the night sky, unaware of their pursuers." - Lamb
04SI014.name: Prey

04SI028.description:
To play me, I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
When I kill another unit, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
04SI028.flavorText: For centuries, the Black Mist has sought out creatures all over the world, twisting and warping them; turning them into nightmarish versions of their past selves.
04SI028.name: Camavoran Dragon

04MT014.description:
Countdown 1: Stun the 2 weakest enemies.
Daybreak: Summon a copy of me with Countdown 2.
04MT014.flavorText: "Let the sun shed Her light upon us. Those who are weak and unworthy will cower before Her gaze!" - Solari Priestess
04MT014.name: Eye of the Ra-Horak

04MT008.levelupDescription: You've summoned 10+ mana of landmarks. When I level up, if you have the attack token, create an Unstoppable Force in hand.
04MT008.flavorText:
"And here's da last stop on da Chip tour of Targon! It's PAPA! He's da BIGGEST of da Targon giants, an' sings a mean song, too, lemme tell ya. Just don't try to climb him! Da spikes tickle him, and you dun want him sneezin' when you're halfway up no sah!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 6
04MT008.name: Malphite

04MT008T1.description:
Play: Stun an enemy.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create an Unstoppable Force in hand.
04MT008T1.name: Malphite

04MT008T5.description:
Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
Create a Malphite in your deck.
04MT008T5.flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip
04MT008T5.name: Malphite's Ground Slam

04MT008T6.flavorText: "Only place to go is down!" - Malphite
04MT008T6.name: Rockslide

04MT010.description: Countdown 2: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
04MT010.flavorText: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.
04MT010.name: Startipped Peak

04MT005.description: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
04MT005.flavorText:
"Okay so hello I'm Chip an' I'm here to show you Targon! It's wowow big an' tall so I hope you got good shoes for da walkin'! Let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 1
04MT005.name: Chip

04MT009.description: Countdown 3: Create a Seed of Strength in hand.
04MT009.flavorText:
"Here's da first stop on da tour! I call this da leg wobbler because WOWEE are dere a lot steps! Pretty cool view too, an' dat's one of the best things in Targon. Okay let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2
04MT009.name: Spiral Stairs

04MT009T1.flavorText:
"OH I FORGOT. Okay so you're probabab... probababer... problee thinkin' dat your legs are like WOWOW tired right now, but I seen the people who walk around here a lot, an' sooner or later dey get ALL KINDSA muscles! So keep at it, and let's GO! AGAIN!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2.1
04MT009T1.name: Seed of Strength

04MT001.flavorText:
"Okay so EV-ER-EE-BODY watch out here cuz dis is a BIG DROP an' I've fallen down here a few times and LEMME TELL YOU it's a long way down! An' I'm made of wok so I just bounce, but dat's not true for you guys... so be caref--ooh dere's Cliff! Let's go say hi!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 3
04MT001.name: Rockfall Path

04MT018.description: When I'm supported, give me and my supporting ally +1|+1 this round.
04MT018.flavorText:
"Don't be afraid of the howling gale
As it blows 'cross the mountain and through the dale
Never you worry, you have nothing to fear
My darling, rest, mother is near." - Targonian lullaby
04MT018.name: Frightened Ibex

04MT004.description: Last Breath: Summon a Crest of Insight.
04MT004.flavorText:
"Okay EV-ER-EE-ONE say "HI BLU!" HI BLU! Okay one time I thought he was like "HI BLU!" back, but now dat I think about it might have been my voice bouncin' off da walls. OH WELL he's all magical and stuff and also blue so if you ask me he doesn't even NEED to speak! OKAY BYE BLUE LET'S GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 5
04MT004.name: Blue Sentinel

04MT013.flavorText: The Solari believe that it was Targon's sunhawks--brilliant as they are--who caught the Immortal Fire's attention, and who subsequently inspired her cycle of death and rebirth.
04MT013.name: Solari Sunhawk

04MT003.description: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0.
04MT003.flavorText:
"Okay, so dis is CLIFF! He's a big ol' fella who's been aroun' da block QUITE A FEW times let me tell you. An' I know dat he looks cool and I know dat he seems like a nice guy, but he's got a lotta heavy stuff on his back, and sometimes it falls on people so BE CAREFUL okay? Thank you moving on!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 4
04MT003.name: Earth Elemental

04MT004T1.description: Countdown 1: Get an extra mana gem this round.
04MT004T1.flavorText: "Dis is Blu's faaaaaavorite place inna whole wide world! He says it's SUPER magical! Oooh, ahhh!" - Chip
04MT004T1.name: Crest of Insight

04MT002.description: Play: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
04MT002.flavorText: From time to time, the great colossi of Targon awaken from their slumber and trek to new grounds atop the great mountain. These events are never quiet, and seldom safe.
04MT002.name: Stonebreaker

04MT006.description:
Invoke.
If you have a Celestial ally, replace your deck with 20 copies of Behold the Infinite.
04MT006.flavorText: "Look, Kulun! The stars have so many stories to tell! Which should we read tonight, hmm?" - Moondreamer
04MT006.name: Starlit Epiphany

04MT012.flavorText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric
04MT012.name: Destiny's Call

04MT007.description: Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
04MT007.flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip
04MT007.name: Ground Slam

04MT013T1.flavorText: Some Solari claim the sunhawk's brilliant gleam is the bird trying to send a signal to The Immortal Fire herself.
04MT013T1.name: Blinding Crest

04MT002T2.description: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
04MT002T2.flavorText: "Spike is not a morning person..." - Malphite
04MT002T2.name: Shaken Ground

04MT015.description:
Daybreak: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
Nightfall: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
04MT015.flavorText: So goes the cycle of night and day, one always following the other.
04MT015.name: Heavens Aligned

04DE004.description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
04DE004.flavorText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.
04DE004.name: Ardent Tracker

04DE014.description: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
04DE014.flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer
04DE014.name: Dragon Chow

04DE001.description: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
04DE001.flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
04DE001.name: Honored Lord

04DE012.description: The next time you play a unit this round, grant it Scout. It's now an Elite.
04DE012.flavorText: When Demacians' mettle is tested, they rise to the occasion.
04DE012.name: Field Promotion

04DE003.description: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
04DE003.name: Cataclysm

04DE002.description:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
04DE002.flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
04DE002.name: Golden Aegis

04DE006.flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
04DE006.name: Battlefield Prowess

04DE007T1.description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
04DE007T1.name: Tattered Banner

04DE008.description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
04DE008.levelupDescription: Allies have survived 3+ strikes from enemy blockers.
04DE008.flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
04DE008.name: Jarvan IV

04DE008T1.description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
04DE008T1.flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.
04DE008T1.name: Jarvan IV

04DE008T2.description:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
04DE008T2.name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm

04DE005.description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them Challenger.
04DE005.flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III
04DE005.name: Cithria, Lady of Clouds

04DE020.description: When an ally with Fury kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
04DE020.flavorText: The Mist warped Gregem's mind, forcing him to relive Wrenwall, over and over. Stoked by long-buried bitterness and rage, he turned against the comrades who once stood with him.
04DE020.name: Ruined Dragonguard

04DE010.description:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
04DE010.flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
04DE010.name: King Jarvan III

04DE016.description: Play: Grant an ally Challenger and +1|+1.
04DE016.flavorText: Kadregrin sowed chaos and fear long before the Black Mist reached Demacia. Under Viego's command, however, his skills would bolster all of the Ruined King's forces.
04DE016.name: Kadregrin the Ruined

04DE013.description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
04DE013.flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.
04DE013.name: Towering Stonehorn

04DE015.description:
Play: Create a Silverwing Vanguard, Blinding Assault, or Fleetfeather Tracker in hand.
Attack: Give other Challenging allies +1|+1 this round.
04DE015.flavorText: The very sight of the Swiftwing flight inspires Demacian soldiers on fields far below. Upon seeing them descend through the clouds, those on the ground are reinvigorated, and ready to continue the fight.
04DE015.name: Swiftwing Flight

04DE007.description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
04DE007.flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
04DE007.name: Penitent Squire

04DE009.description: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
04DE009.flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
04DE009.name: Gallant Rider

05BC058.description: When I'm summoned, create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
05BC058.levelupDescription: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.
05BC058.flavorText: Kennen had heard it too, the roar of some unseen... something. Man or monster, it did not matter. The Kinkou would protect their land at any cost.
05BC058.name: Kennen

05BC010.description: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking Short Tooth.
05BC010.flavorText: The Trainer's routine is the same each night. Fish 'n ale for supper, a quick puff of his bubblepipe, followed by kisses on snouts and a story for his sharks before bedtime.
05BC010.name: Shark Trainer

05BC102.flavorText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.
05BC102.name: Wizened Wizard

05BC230.description: To play, discard 1. Grant all allies +1|+1.
05BC230.flavorText: "I can never remember how these things work." - Poppy
05BC230.name: Spirit Portal

05BC010T1.flavorText:
"They say don't bite the hand that feeds--but by Bandle--they bit my hand AND anything else they could reach!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Note, Day 13
05BC010T1.name: Short Tooth

05BC099.description: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and Elusive.
05BC099.flavorText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."
05BC099.name: Swole Scout

05BC133.description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
05BC133.flavorText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."
05BC133.name: Tristana

05BC202.description:
Costs 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've played cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
Create a Tristana in your deck.
05BC202.flavorText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.
05BC202.name: Tristana's Buster Shot

05BC133T1.description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant me and it +1|+0 and Impact.
05BC133T1.name: Tristana

05BC023.description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Megatee.
05BC023.flavorText: Things minitees like: napping on the warm summerstones beside the Nakotak tribal lands. Things minitees do not like: being shoved off said summerstones by cheeky yordles...
05BC023.name: Minitee

05BC023T1.description: Round Start: Transform the strongest enemy into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it. It can't block.
05BC023T1.flavorText: ...but, as they say, yordles gonna yordle!
05BC023T1.name: Megatee

05BC029.description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
05BC029.levelupDescription: I or the unit I'm Attached to have attacked 3+ times.
05BC029.flavorText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.
05BC029.name: Yuumi

05BC078.description: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
05BC078.name: Electro Harpoon

05BC106.flavorText:
"Though quite small, the grumbleslug has a large appetite and possesses what I can only describe as a 'real attitude problem.'" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 17
05BC106.name: Grumbleslug

05BC161.description: Strike: Create a Pokey Stick in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 2.
05BC161.levelupDescription: Round End: You've damaged the enemy Nexus this round.
05BC161.flavorText: Long ago, Gnar and his kin thrived in the Nakotak Valley. It was an innocent place, untouched by modern trappings. How unfortunate that the passing of time took this place from Gnar. But how fortunate that time doesn't exactly function as expected in Bandle City.
05BC161.name: Gnar

05BC161T2.description:
Deal 1 to an enemy and Stun it. 
Create a Gnar in your deck.
05BC161T2.name: Gnar's Wallop

05BC161T1.description:
When I level up, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
Round End: If I've seen you start the round with the attack token, transform me back into Gnar.
05BC161T1.flavorText: The yordles sat on their tree branch and cheered for Gnar as he duked it out with another passing monster. These were rare events, but always awesome to spectate!
05BC161T1.name: Mega Gnar

05BC086.description: Attack: Double my Power and Impact.
05BC086.flavorText:
"They say I'm a joke. That I've got dirt for brains. That I'm all tremble and no quake. Well I've just got one thing to say to my opponents...  I'm gonna rock your world!" 
- Pre-match interview
05BC086.name: Earthshaker

05BC073.description: When I’m summoned, summon a Scrappy Bomb.
05BC073.flavorText: Giselle was one of Professor Heimerdinger's best students until she heard of Ziggs' strange experiments down in Zaun. Then it was all "hexplosives" this and "could you recommend me for an internship" that.
05BC073.name: Inventive Chemist

05BC039.description: Allegiance: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
05BC039.flavorText: "Alice here holds two shots: one's a greeting, the other's a farewell. You two wanna meet?"
05BC039.name: Gruff Grenadier

05BC148.description: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me Impact 4 times.
05BC148.flavorText: Chewy outside, tough and gritty center.
05BC148.name: Furious Faefolk

05BC029T5.description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to SpellShield and +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me SpellShield and +1|+1 instead.
05BC029T5.flavorText: Yet with each new portal came new adventures, and with each new adventure came a chance to make new friends!
05BC029T5.name: Yuumi

05BC029T6.description:
Grant an ally +1|+0. Deal 1 to an enemy.
Create a Yuumi in your deck.
05BC029T6.name: Yuumi's Prowling Projectile

05BC029T7.flavorText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.
05BC029T7.name: Yuumi

05BC029T4.description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to SpellShield and +1|+1.
05BC029T4.name: Yuumi

05BC029T8.description: Round Start: Grant me SpellShield and +1|+1.
05BC029T8.flavorText: Yet with each new portal came new adventures, and with each new adventure came a chance to make new friends!
05BC029T8.name: Yuumi

05BC029T3.description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1.
05BC029T3.levelupDescription: The unit I'm Attached to has attacked 3+ times.
05BC029T3.name: Yuumi

05BC173.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+2 for each card you discarded last round, then shuffle my stats.
05BC173.flavorText: For obvious reasons, "paddlemarpower" never really took off as a unit of measurement.
05BC173.name: Salty Spinner

05BC119.description: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in hand at the next Round Start.
05BC119.flavorText:
"A true supervillain can never have enough minions! Short little fellows who know their place, obey your every word, and always come back for further instruction."
- Excerpt from Ch. 2 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
05BC119.name: Minion

05BC019.flavorText: The Rainbowfish was glad to do some aerial reconnaissance, even if it meant taking a bigger leap than she ever had before. She would take any reprieve, however slight, from Yuumi's hungry stare.
05BC019.name: Rainbowfish

05BC019T1.description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
05BC019T1.name: Rainbowfish

05BC019T2.flavorText: The Rainbowfish was glad to do some aerial reconnaissance, even if it meant taking a bigger leap than she ever had before. She would take any reprieve, however slight, from Yuumi's hungry stare.
05BC019T2.name: Rainbowfish

05BC093.description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
05BC093.flavorText:
"This world will fear me. It will wear my scars for all eternity. It will ache under the weight of my power. It will shudder under the shadow of my enormity!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 1 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
05BC093.name: Veigar

05BC093T1.description:
Stun an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
Create a Veigar in your deck.
05BC093T1.name: Veigar's Event Horizon

05BC093T2.description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
When you play Darkness, it can target anything.
05BC093T2.flavorText:
"Aha. Muaha. Ahahaha. AHAHA. AHAHAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 12 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
05BC093T2.name: Grand Overseer Veigar

05BC007.flavorText: Yordles haven't quite figured out gravity yet, but then, gravity hasn't quite figured out Bandle City, either.
05BC007.name: Stone Stackers

05BC174.description: Give an ally Barrier or SpellShield this round.
05BC174.flavorText: "I'll protect you with my wild and furious... meow!" - Yuumi
05BC174.name: Friendship!

05BC185.description: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally Elusive and +1|+1 this round.
05BC185.flavorText:
"I SEE them enter the left shell, yet when I CHOOSE that shell, it's empty. I'm beginning to suspect this game might be rigged..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 14
05BC185.name: Shell Game

05BC096.description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a Bass of Burden.
05BC096.flavorText: If Veigar needed help tipping the scales of justice, then none were better suited to the job than these two. They knew all of them. Except the mixolydian one.
05BC096.name: Tenor of Terror

05BC096T1.flavorText: "The show had already run into a number of mishaps by the third piece, when the larger of the two singers--I use the term loosely--either delved into the world of the true avant-garde, or choked on a hairball. I am, even at the time of writing, unsure which." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper
05BC096T1.name: Bass of Burden

05BC088.description: Play: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied Rumbles everywhere Impact for the first, Quick Attack for the second, and SpellShield for the third.
05BC088.levelupDescription: I've seen Mecha-Yordle allies deal 12+ damage.
05BC088.flavorText:
"Annnnd that oughta do 'er."
"ERROR."
"WHAT? I just fixed that!"
"SYSTEM FAILURE IMMINENT."
"Turn it off. TURN IT OFF!"
- Rumble and Tristy
05BC088.name: Rumble

05BC088T2.description: When you deal damage to the enemy Nexus, create a random Mecha-Yordle in hand or if you have one, grant all Mecha-Yordles in hand +1|+1 and reduce their cost by 1.
05BC088T2.flavorText: "I mean, I know Tristy's already got the flamethrower, the electro-drill, and the giant freakin' mace, but c'mon... I wasn't NOT gonna add rockets. Heh heh."
05BC088T2.name: Rumble

05BC088T1.description:
Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
Create a Rumble in your deck.
05BC088T1.flavorText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble
05BC088T1.name: Rumble's Flamespitter

05BC190.description: Attack: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
05BC190.flavorText: "How do I do it? Screamin' matches night after night? Gargle engine oil. Five minutes in the mornin', five at night."
05BC190.name: Arena Mechacaster

05BC042.description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
05BC042.flavorText:
"I used to be like you–couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement
05BC042.name: Purpleberry Shake

05BC205.description: Stun an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
05BC205.name: Event Horizon

05BC223.description: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
05BC223.flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
05BC223.name: Entrapment

05BC223T2.description: Pick 1 of 3 spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
05BC223T2.flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
05BC223T2.name: Entrapment

05BC223T1.description: Pick 1 of 3 units from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
05BC223T1.flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
05BC223T1.name: Entrapment

05BC058T3.description:
Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
Create a Kennen in your deck.
05BC058T3.flavorText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen
05BC058T3.name: Kennen's Lightning Rush

05BC058T5.description: Grant an enemy Mark of the Storm. If they already have it, remove the mark to Stun and deal 3 to them instead.
05BC058T5.name: Mark of the Storm

05BC058T2.description: When I'm summoned, blocked, or Attack: Create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
05BC058T2.flavorText: "We are wind and thunder! We are rain and lightning! This is... TEMPEST!"
05BC058T2.name: Kennen

05BC091.description: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
05BC091.flavorText: "TICKETS! GET YER TICKETS! NOWWWW HALF OFF! Oh, biscuits, if I don't sell these tickets, the boss'll kill me... literally."
05BC091.name: Arena Promoter

05BC174T2.description: Give an ally SpellShield this round.
05BC174T2.flavorText: "When my friends are happy, I'M happy!" - Yuumi
05BC174T2.name: Best Pals

05BC174T1.description: Give an ally Barrier this round.
05BC174T1.name: Best Buddies

05BC172.description: When I'm summoned, create a random 1, 2, and 3 cost follower in hand.
05BC172.flavorText: "Somebody get these freakin' hairballs off my desk!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
05BC172.name: Professor Von Mech

05BC163.description: Attack: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
05BC163.levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
05BC163.flavorText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto
05BC163.name: Ziggs

05BC163T3.description:
Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
05BC163T3.name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

05BC163T4.description: Deal 1 to Ziggs' blocker and to the enemy Nexus.
05BC163T4.name: Short Fuse

05BC163T6.description:
Deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
05BC163T6.name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

05BC163T7.description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
05BC163T7.name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

05BC163T1.description:
Attack: I deal 2 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
05BC163T1.flavorText:
"We passed?! WE PASSED!"
"Heh, well, 'passed' is a strong word... but hoo-wee, if you didn't put on a heck of a show!" - Ziggs and Wilfred, Safety Inspector
05BC163T1.name: Ziggs

05BC163T5.description: Deal 2 to Ziggs' blocker and the enemy Nexus.
05BC163T5.name: Short Fuse

05BC151.description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
05BC151.flavorText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker
05BC151.name: Mirror Mage

05BC027.description: When I’m summoned or destroyed, Stun the strongest enemy.
05BC027.flavorText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs
05BC027.name: Hexplosive Minefield

05BC200.description: To play, discard 1. Manifest a Yordle that costs 3 or less and summon it.
05BC200.name: Yordle Portal

05BC021.description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
05BC021.name: Bouncing Bomb

05BC167.description: Nexus Strike: Create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
05BC167.flavorText: "Gunnin' in the streets and tuckin' kiddos into sheets!"
05BC167.name: Bandle Commando

05BC179.description: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +0|+1.
05BC179.flavorText:
"Poppy! Excellent execution of our latest tactic. What do you think of calling it 'Peanut Petalstorm'?"
"I, uh, kinda just hit the baddie with my hammer. Can't we just call this one 'Hammer'?"
"That's what we called the last three!" - Kip and Poppy
05BC179.name: Yordle Ranger

05BC214.description: Deal 1 to all enemies, then do it again.
05BC214.name: Mega Inferno Bomb

05BC221.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Give me Power this round equal to the number of other allied Fae in play or Attached.
05BC221.flavorText: The little pinheads are rather cute, and by themselves, have mushroom to grow.
05BC221.name: Mushroom Ring

05BC041.description: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
05BC041.flavorText: Humility is a mark of heroism, but many historians would agree that Poppy is kind of pushing it.
05BC041.name: Poppy

05BC176.description: Grant an ally +1|+0. Deal 1 to an enemy.
05BC176.name: Prowling Projectile

05BC105.description: When I'm summoned, if you've summoned units from 4+ regions this game, grant me Impact 4 times.
05BC105.name: Bandle Gunners

05BC066.flavorText: "W... h... e... r... e... s... N... o... r... r... a...? Oh dear, what should I tell it?" - Mouse steward
05BC066.name: Quick Quill

05BC177.flavorText:
"One more fold, and see? This one is a giraffe! His name is Socks." 
"Why 'Socks'?" 
"Norra loves socks, so she'll love him, too!" - Mouse stewards
05BC177.name: Papercraft Dragon

05BC177T2.flavorText:
"One more fold, and see? This one is a giraffe! His name is Socks." 
"Why 'Socks'?" 
"Norra loves socks, so she'll love him, too!" - Mouse stewards
05BC177T2.name: Papercraft Dragon

05BC177T1.description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
05BC177T1.flavorText: "Help out a friend, won'tcha, little guy?" - Yuumi
05BC177T1.name: Papercraft Dragon

05BC136.description:
To play, discard 1.
Manifest a Mecha-Yordle.
05BC136.flavorText: "Junk. Crap. Garbage... Hey, now THIS is what I'm freakin' talkin' about!" - Rumble
05BC136.name: Scrapheap

05BC164.description: Deal 1 to anything and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
05BC164.name: Poison Dart

05BC194.description: Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Win the game if I've seen allies from 10 regions.
05BC194.flavorText: Stretching an unknowable distance into the heavens above, The Bandle Tree is an impossible fixture at the heart of the city. Under its great, gnarled branches, some yordles see a beacon of hope and friendship while others see an ominous, riddle-filled monolith. All agree that to gaze upon the Bandle Tree is to glance into the soul of something very old and very powerful.
05BC194.name: The Bandle Tree

05BC127T1.description: When I'm summoned, grant me Impact three times.
05BC127T1.flavorText: The Stormcloud crashed into the Aberration in a crackling tangle of mist and lightning. The beast howled as it fell to the ground, its monstrous eye rolling into the back of its head. Kennen gingerly approached through the Stormcloud's dissipating haze. The Kinkou had won, but it would be short-lived. There would always be another threat. Another monster. But they would be ready.
05BC127T1.name: Stormcloud

05BC195.description: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards in the enemy's hand or deck and Prank it.
05BC195.name: Prank

05BC216.description: Destroy a landmark or create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
05BC216.name: Yordle Contraption

05BC216T1.description: Create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
05BC216T1.name: Yordle Contraption

05BC212.description: Round Start: Create a Inspection Passed! in hand.
05BC212.flavorText: Wilfred was originally skeptical. He was skeptical throughout, too. In fact, he was skeptical 'til the very end - but Ziggs and the other hexplosive experts proved they knew how to put on a real humdinger of a fireworks show.
05BC212.name: Safety Inspector

05BC212T1.description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 3 to anything.
05BC212T1.flavorText: "... turns out, HE was a huge hexplosives fan, too!" - Ziggs
05BC212T1.name: Inspection Passed!

05BC141.flavorText:
"'There the heroes stood, back to back--'"
"--Butt to butt! Hehehehehe!"
"N-no! Peppy, if you must interject, please do so during less dramatic moments!" 
- Tales told 'round the yordle campfire
05BC141.name: Heroic Refrain

05BC209.description: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
05BC209.flavorText: The Bawkatrice is a loyal, steadfast mount under normal circumstances. However, when put under too much stress they are known to react in... unusual ways.
05BC209.name: Stress Defense

05BC210.flavorText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble
05BC210.name: Flamespitter

05BC196.flavorText: "Ya see? It gets everywhere! I DON'T LIKE SAND! The cleanup's gonna cost me a fortune!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
05BC196.name: Dunehopper Mech

05BC013.description: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
05BC013.flavorText:
"Note to self: On next expedition, keep all valuables in my FRONT pockets." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 19
05BC013.name: Tricksy Tentacles

05BC100.description: Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
05BC100.flavorText: "What's that, boy? Two of the recruits were scouting in the woods and stumbled across a scary grass monster, and now they might die a long and painful death? Lead the way!" - Teemo
05BC100.name: Puffcap Pup

05BC098.description: Strike: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
05BC098.flavorText: Darkness comes in all shapes and sizes. Some of them SURPRISINGLY adorable.
05BC098.name: Twisted Catalyzer

05BC122.description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+2.
05BC122.flavorText: "Giantus grassicus. These terrifying creatures camouflage themselves by laying like ordinary grass and attack any unfortunate enough to walk over them. If encountered, run away forever!" - Ava Achiever
05BC122.name: Yordle Newbie

05BC120.description: When you summon another ally with equal or less Power than me, grant it +1|+1.
05BC120.flavorText: "Adventuring means finding baddies, and turning them into friends!"
05BC120.name: Yordle Captain

05BC046.description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a Thunder Fist this game, transform me into Masa, Crashing Thunder.
05BC046.flavorText: As Masa struck the training dummy, a flash of lightning erupted from the fist, splitting the wood in two and singeing the hair on his hands. He pulled on the rope, reeling in the bronze hand and reflecting on his training—he was finally ready. Suddenly, a monstrous roar echoed in the distance.
05BC046.name: Thunder Fist

05BC018.flavorText: "Nine hundred ninety-eight... nine hundred ninety-nine... one thousand! There we are, Bawky, you look impeccable as ever. Okay, now do mine!"
05BC018.name: Pompous Cavalier

05BC041T1.description: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +2|+2 and Impact.
05BC041T1.flavorText: Power is a famously corrupting influence, but Poppy proves that its corruption is no match for a good heart and stubborn, steadfast obliviousness.
05BC041T1.name: Poppy

05BC041T3.description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck. Create a Poppy in your deck.
05BC041T3.name: Poppy's Keeper's Verdict

05BC132.description:
Costs 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've played cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
05BC132.flavorText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.
05BC132.name: Buster Shot

05BC168.description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Giga Gromp.
05BC168.flavorText: The yordles of Nakotak Valley had tried for several generations to understand their gromp neighbors. First, Chief Hegabo had tried poking them with a stick. Next, Chief Babobu tried poking them with a stick. Chief Nakotak had a brand new plan: he was going to poke them with a stick.
05BC168.name: Spotted Toad

05BC170.description: Attack: Grant the top 3 allies in your deck +1|+1.
05BC170.flavorText: Mess with the mech, you get the horns.
05BC170.name: Furyhorn Crasher

05BC056.description: When I'm summoned, create a Cloud Stance in hand.
05BC056.flavorText: "It is from control of breath that our school's technique is derived. Just as it is from wind that a tempest is born."
05BC056.name: Gust Monk

05BC014.description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Terrordactyl.
05BC014.flavorText: The creatures of Nakotak Valley are as varied and lively as the land they inhabit... and just as likely to explode.
05BC014.name: Teenydactyl

05BC138.description: The first time you discard a card or damage the enemy Nexus, grant me +2|+1.
05BC138.flavorText: "Alright, good fight. Good show everyone. Now clean up this crap, and uh, you know the drill: anything salvageable... fix it up, put it in the shop, and we'll just sell it right back to 'em! AHAHAHA!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
05BC138.name: Fix-Em-Uppers

05BC198.description: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
05BC198.flavorText: "Okay, this one's for the newsletter. And remember to smile this time! One... two... three...!" - Tristana
05BC198.name: Group Shot

05BC181.description: Give an ally +2|+0 and "Round End: Recall me" this round.
05BC181.flavorText: "Return to breath, and find your strength!" - Gust Monk
05BC181.name: Cloud Stance

05BC160.flavorText: The poros of yesteryear had much thicker heads than their contemporary kin, making them a little bit dumber, and a whole lot headbuttier.
05BC160.name: Proto Poro

05BC005.description: Nexus Strike: Create a Prank in hand.
05BC005.flavorText:
"Dear me, I've just had the oddest dream. One moment, I'm scrambling through the kelp, looking for my shell hat, when suddenly I hear the most wonderful melody. Next thing I know, I'm seated here, pen in hand, writing these words. I don't recall sitting down for a nap..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 22
05BC005.name: Kelp Maidens

05BC079.description:
To play me, discard a unit.
Last Breath: Summon an exact copy of the discarded unit.
05BC079.flavorText: "You thought I kept my money buried beneath the arena? HAH! What am I, a pirate? Now go fill that hole before the next match! ... ... Tim, we gotta move the money again." - Karl, Arena Kingpin
05BC079.name: Lil Dipper

05BC020.description: Nexus Strike: Draw a spell that costs 3 or less.
05BC020.flavorText: "Jelly's my BEST FRIEND! I mean, after you, Book. And Norra. Okay, Jelly's my THIRD-BEST FRIEND. That's still pretty good though, right?!" - Yuumi
05BC020.name: Assistant Librarian

05BC049.description: Play: Manifest a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
05BC049.flavorText:
"Today is indeed a red letter day! An exploration into the deep! I expect things to proceed quite... swimmingly! Ho ho!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 1
05BC049.name: Conchologist

05BC046T2.flavorText: Masa attacked with a loud cry. There was a sizzle, then a crack, followed by a howl. Enraged, The Aberration fixed its massive eye on the still-smoking bronze fists, unaware of the encroaching Stormcloud. Masa steeled himself as a monstrous hand fast-approached and prayed he'd bought them enough time.
05BC046T2.name: Masa, Crashing Thunder

05BC001.description: Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
05BC001.flavorText: "Oh-ho! How cute! How adorable! How TINY!" - Veigar
05BC001.name: Minimorph

05BC082.flavorText: "That hole you put in the ceiling during the last match? It's comin' outta your next paycheck!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
05BC082.name: Bouncer & Bolt

05BC167T1.flavorText:
"...But one day he arrived, empty-handed,
And one by one, the greedy birds landed.
They pecked and scratched and mauled
'Til there was nothing left of him at all!"
- Bandle City tall tale
05BC167T1.name: Hungry Owlcat

05BC026.description: Costs 2 less if you've created 2+ cards this game. Draw 2.
05BC026.flavorText: Very few outsiders know the way to Bandle City, but strange markings in the rocks and trees of Runeterra offer hints to those who know what to look for.
05BC026.name: Hidden Pathways

05BC152.description: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
05BC152.name: Aloof Travelers

05BC070.description:
When I'm summoned or Round End: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck. 
Traps on enemy cards are doubled when activated.
05BC070.flavorText: "Rule 378: A good scout is always brave, always prepared, and always daring!"
05BC070.name: Ava Achiever

05BC015.description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Lava Lizard.
05BC015.flavorText: "Eat the pepper!" barked Nakotak, probably. "No, YOU eat the pepper!" replied Jojo, also probably. As they argued, a small lizard scuttled by, chasing a smaller fly. The two yordles looked at the lizard, then the pepper, then each other. If lightbulbs existed, one would've gone off.
05BC015.name: Bitsy Lizard

05BC145.description: Play: Create a Tiny Spear or a Tiny Shield in hand.
05BC145.flavorText: "My spear used to belong to a great hero, too... I made Poppy hold it for a minute!"
05BC145.name: Yordle Squire

05BC015T1.flavorText: Jojo and Nakotak screamed out giggles and giggled out screams as they fled. The Lava Lizard's flames had already singed their back fur, consumed trees, and was now starting to melt the delicate snowdrift. It was AWESOME.
05BC015T1.name: Lava Lizard

05BC140.description: Attack: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
05BC140.flavorText: "An' den DAT Bobjim da poro was like "DAT WAY!" an' so off dey went into da horizahn, with da other poros scamperin' behind, tryin' their bestest to keep up!" - Ingvar the Younger
05BC140.name: Poro Sled

05BC129.flavorText: "There's a sucker born every minute, and I'm gonna take 'em for all they got... this mech arena's gonna be a GOLD MINE."
05BC129.name: Arena Kingpin

05BC004.description: When I'm summoned, create a Prank in hand.
05BC004.flavorText:
"Curious and playful, the otterpus are an immensely cheery bunch. Or is it otterpi? Say, didn't I pack a third sandwich?" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 7
05BC004.name: Otterpus

05BC155.description: When you summon another ally, grant me +1|+0.
05BC155.flavorText: "Small sparks become a raging blaze. We are the embers of your destruction!"
05BC155.name: Ember Monk

05BC104.flavorText: Yes, he's very cute. Yes, he has a temper. No, you don't want to see it.
05BC104.name: Primal Strength

05BC073T1.description: Countdown 3: or when I'm destroyed: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
05BC073T1.flavorText: "It's a real work of art, isn't it!" - Giselle, Inventive Chemist
05BC073T1.name: Scrappy Bomb

05BC218.description: Create a Hungry Owlcat in hand, then grant Fae allies in hand +1|+1.
05BC218.name: Fae Aid

05BC168T1.description: When I transform, deal 1 to all enemies.
05BC168T1.flavorText: So, it turns out that poking Nakotak Valley gromps with a stick causes them to react very... expansively! If only those yordles had known this through extensive, generational testing. If. Only.
05BC168T1.name: Giga Gromp

05BC066T1.description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
05BC066T1.flavorText: "Show 'em what you can do, quills!" - Yuumi
05BC066T1.name: Quick Quill

05BC066T2.flavorText: "W... h... e... r... e... s... N... o... r... r... a...? Oh dear, what should I tell it?" - Mouse steward
05BC066T2.name: Quick Quill

05BC192.description: When I'm summoned, create a random landmark that costs 2 or less in hand.
05BC192.flavorText: The Fussyfoot Bomberator-X did precisely what it was meant to do: sow chaos. Plus, it was easy to parallel park.
05BC192.name: Bomber Twins

05BC169.flavorText: Now you see him. Now you don't. And now you're dead.
05BC169.name: Shadowtech Walker

05BC162.description: When an ally transforms, fully heal it and grant it +1|+1 and Impact.
