05BC162.flavorText: Chief Nakotak declared himself leader of the tribe after finding a large dinosaur bone in the snowdrifts surrounding their lands. None of the others were aware that dinosaur bones equated to tribe leadership, but also none of the others were really all that bothered. So Nakotak it was.
05BC162.name: Chief Nakotak

05BC032.description: Each round, the first Fae you play costs 2 less.
05BC032.flavorText: "Lantern follows Norra, moon moths follow Lantern, mouses follow moon moths! Follow, follow!"
05BC032.name: Gleaming Lantern

05BC166.flavorText: The first rule of experimentation: poke it, and see what happens.
05BC166.name: Pokey Stick

05BC006.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. 
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
05BC006.flavorText: Wherever Ziggs went, Arnie followed, his serene demeanor a natural foil to Ziggs' chaotic zeal. His duties ranged from making sure the munitions were stocked, to putting out fires, to clapping his hands over Ziggs' ears when Ziggs (inevitably) forgot hearing protection.
05BC006.name: The Arsenal

05BC110.flavorText: "Yes, yes, you've told me all about how much she likes tea, socks, you, buttons, and collecting little bits and bobs, but you still haven't told me anything about what she LOOKS like!"
05BC110.name: Scholarly Climber

05BC063.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 and a random keyword.
I keep these stat buffs and keywords when I'm Recalled.
05BC063.flavorText: The Tornado maintains her calm with breathing exercises... and by channeling her inner turmoil into a vicious hurricane of deadly blades.
05BC063.name: Tornado Warrior

05BC217.description: Manifest a Fae and grant it +1|+1.
05BC217.flavorText: Every living thing requires sustenance. The fae are no different, though it can be hard to tell how exactly they use it.
05BC217.name: Fae Sprout

05BC180.description: Recall a unit with 3 or less Power.
05BC180.flavorText: "We are quick! We are the wind!" - Kennen
05BC180.name: Quicken

05BC040.description: Manifest an Otterpus or one of 2 spells from your regions that cost 3 or less.
05BC040.name: Trinket Trade

05BC213.description: Deal 1 to an enemy and Stun it.
05BC213.name: Wallop

05BC208.description: An ally strikes an enemy. If it survives, Stun it.
05BC208.name: Heroic Charge

05BC085.description: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and grant it SpellShield.
05BC085.flavorText: "Turn it down, will ya?! I can barely hear myself counting all this money!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
05BC085.name: Bilgerat Rascal

05BC112.description: Play: Give me Barrier this round or grant me Impact.
05BC112.flavorText: The Blastcone Seedlings are shy creatures, and while they will retreat first and foremost, if threatened...
05BC112.name: Blastcone Seedling

05BC135.description: An ally strikes an enemy. If the ally is multi-region, it strikes the enemy again.
05BC135.flavorText: "The Acorn M1-85: a fully-automatic, oak caliber rifle with a bandlewood scope, and a purpleberry finish. Yeah, mama's cookin' up something good tonight!" - Bandle Commando
05BC135.name: Double Tap

05BC084.description: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle.
05BC084.name: Squeaker

05BC171.description: Support: Give my supported ally SpellShield and +2|+2 this round.
05BC171.flavorText: Powered by gems mined from the caves beneath Bandle City, the Mechaforcer emits a defensive shield that can withstand even the strongest of weapons. It's pretty to look at too.
05BC171.name: Geode Mechaforcer

05BC184.description: When I'm summoned, create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
05BC184.flavorText:
"This is a song
About Poppy the strong!
Poppy the mightiest, frightiest... sprong!" 
- Scratched-out lyrics from the 'Songbook of Reginaldactyl and Faltimisquee, Bards Extraordinaire'
05BC184.name: Babbling Balladeers

05BC080.description: When I'm summoned, grant me Impact twice.
05BC080.flavorText:
"I didn't choose the smash life, the smash life chose ME!"
- Post-match interview
05BC080.name: Smash & Dash

05BC116.description:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
Play: Manifest a multi-region follower.
05BC116.flavorText: It's unclear whether Bandle City ever really elected a mayor, but an enormous mustache would almost certainly be a prerequisite.
05BC116.name: Bandle City Mayor

05BC111.description: Give allies +2|+2 this round. If you've played cards from 4+ regions, give allies +3|+3 instead.
05BC111.flavorText: "We... look so cool right now." - Tristana
05BC111.name: Yordles in Arms

05BC145T2.flavorText: "I found it! But you can use it!!" - Yordle Squire
05BC145T2.name: Tiny Shield

05BC145T1.flavorText: "A small spear is still a spear." - Yordle saying, probably
05BC145T1.name: Tiny Spear

05BC224.description: Recall an ally. The next ally you play this round with equal or less cost, costs 0 instead.
05BC224.flavorText: "Speed of body, speed of mind!" - Kennen
05BC224.name: Transposition

05BC130.description: Attack: Grant the top champion in your deck +1|+1 and a random keyword.
05BC130.flavorText: Otto's summer barbecues had something of a reputation. While enthusiastic about grilling, he left his guests few choices for the steaks other than "well done" or "extremely well done".
05BC130.name: Hothead

05BC191.description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck.
05BC191.name: Keeper's Verdict

05BC112T2.description: Play: Give me Barrier this round.
05BC112T2.name: Blastcone Seedling

05BC052.description: Fill your hand with random cards. They cost 0 and areFleeting. You can only play 3 more cards this round.
05BC052.flavorText: One mortal's trash is another yordle's giant pile of scrap parts.
05BC052.name: Treasured Trash

05BC089.description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
05BC089.flavorText: The mechs and yordles were bruised, battered, beaten. Then a clarion call sounded, granting them new steam, new life: Doot doot!
05BC089.name: Trumpetecher

05BC050.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Pranks in hand.
05BC050.flavorText:
"Those who are prone to nausea should approach this gentle giant with EXTREME caution. Your insides will thank you... On a related note, I really shouldn't have eaten that second mushroom sandwich..." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 3
05BC050.name: Benemone

05BC094.description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
05BC094.flavorText: "Yes, I'm quite sure the fellow up on the roof has many stories to tell. We all know he has lots to say. We just don't have any idea exactly WHAT it is he's saying." - Stilted Robemaker
05BC094.name: Darkbulb Acolyte

05BC014T1.description: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
05BC014T1.flavorText: Once enraged, the Terrordactyls tear erratically through the skies, leaving mayhem and enraptured yordles in their colorful wake.
05BC014T1.name: Terrordactyl

05BC146.description: Play: Discard 1 to create a multi-region follower in hand.
05BC146.flavorText: "Painting's not about copying what you see, it's about expressing how YOU see the world. And right now, I'm seeing that you moved again. Hold still please!"
05BC146.name: Bandle Painter

05BC235.description: Attack: Give all allies with equal or less Power than me Quick Attack this round.
05BC235.flavorText: "Poppy never listens t'me, so you better: It's not about the hammer, it's about the yordle who swings it."
05BC235.name: Yordle Smith

05BC175.description: Play: Manifest a Celestial that costs 3 or less, Epic, or multi-region follower.
05BC175.flavorText: The strangest part wasn't that the telescope got up, stretched, and started walking around, but that it insisted on dressing for the weather, so it had to find a suitably comfortable scarf.
05BC175.name: Loping Telescope

05BC182.description: Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
05BC182.flavorText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen
05BC182.name: Lightning Rush

05BC127.description: When I'm summoned, summon a Stormcloud.
05BC127.flavorText: Weaving a Stormcloud took time. Time Rissu didn't have. Her hands worked furiously as the Aberration closed in. A bit of cloud here, some lightning there. Then... CRACK! BOOM! She had done it, but would it be enough?
05BC127.name: Rissu, The Silent Storm

05BC069.description: Attack: Create a Fleeting Poison Dart in hand.
05BC069.name: Lecturing Yordle

05BC057.description: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of your Darkness everywhere by 1.
05BC057.flavorText:
"It is important, when assembling one's cabal, that each maniacal member brings something unique to the supervillain table. One of my fellows, for instance, has a lethal sense of style..."
- Excerpt from Ch. 4 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
05BC057.name: Stilted Robemaker

05BC108.description: When you summon another Yordle, grant it +1|+0.
05BC108.flavorText: "Priceless is the glory of exploration, but the greatest discoveries are always... ahem... profitable."
05BC108.name: Yordle Explorer

05BC183.description:
When I'm summoned, create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
When you summon another Fae, grant it +1|+0.
05BC183.flavorText:
"Gather 'round, hear what I say,
The sad tale of Grandfather Fae.
Each day he'd feed the hungry birds,
An odd mixture of seed and curds..."
- Bandle City Tall Tale
05BC183.name: Grandfather Fae

05BC188.description: When you pick a non-champion card from randomly selected options, create a copy in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
05BC188.flavorText: Famously shy, the elusive shellfolk are known to hide in their shells until their curiosity gets the better of them. Once emerged, their playful personalities become fully engaged, including a propensity to play tricks by expertly mimicking the sound of other sea life.
05BC188.name: Curious Shellfolk

05FR001.description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Murkwolf Rager.
05FR001.flavorText: "We do not die as cowards! Instead, we fall with claws drawn and teeth bared. In doing so, we honor The Wolf." - Hyara Allseer
05FR001.name: Murkwolf Shaman

05FR001T1.description: When I transform, draw a unit.
05FR001T1.flavorText: A shaman of the Murkwolf never truly dies alone. In death, they are joined by the spirits of other fallen shaman and begin their journey through the Great Beyond as a new pack.
05FR001T1.name: Murkwolf Rager

05FR002.description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Mammoth Rager.
05FR002.flavorText: When faced with predators, mammoth herds will surround their young calves and pregnant cows. And so the shamans of the great mammoth spirit call not just upon their spirit's physical strength but also upon the strength of unity with which it protects its family.
05FR002.name: Mammoth Shaman

05FR002T1.flavorText: Few Freljodian beasts are as fearsome as a mammoth protecting its herd.
05FR002T1.name: Mammoth Rager

05FR013.description: When I'm summoned or Strike: Create a Stance Swap in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost to 0.
05FR013.levelupDescription: You've played Stance Swap 3+ times this game.
05FR013.flavorText: "The Spirits shape our world just as we and our world shapes the Spirits. By drawing power from them we take power from within ourselves."
05FR013.name: Udyr

05FR013T5.description:
Grant your allies +1|+1. Then deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
Create an Udyr in your deck.
05FR013T5.flavorText:
"Ancient ones, bolster our strength against the encroaching cold, and drive away our foes with storms of wind and ice. For we have not forgotten you or the honors you are due."
- Murkwolf Shaman's Benediction
05FR013T5.name: Udyr's Spirits Unleashed

05FR013T4.description:
When I'm summoned or Strike: Create a Stance Swap in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost to 0. 
I have +1|+1 for each stance you've played this game.
05FR013T4.flavorText: "We are united as one, heart and Spirit! Together, we will drive our foes into the cold, eternal night!"
05FR013T4.name: Udyr

05FR016.description: Create 2 Fleeting 0 cost Stance Swaps in hand.
05FR016.flavorText: "You will see them... great Spirits of teeth and claw, scale and feather. And in that moment, you will tremble in fear and awe, and you will know that the Old Gods have not forgotten us." - Hyara Allseer
05FR016.name: Shaman's Call

05FR012.description:
When I'm summoned, create a Stance Swap in hand. 
The first Stance Swap you play each round costs 0.
05FR012.flavorText: Revered by all, the great shaman, Hyara Allseer, lost her sight long ago and now sees through the eyes of the hawks and eagles that nest on her mountaintop home. Now, troublesome tidings have brought her down from the mountain... she hopes the omens remain but mere visions.
05FR012.name: Hyara Allseer

05FR014.description: Enemies with 3 or less Power can't block.
05FR014.flavorText: "I was there, years ago... first came the cold, biting and unrelenting. Then a storm, angry and uncaring. Last came a roar, so sharp it cut me to the bone. I fell to my knees and prayed we hadn't made a grave mistake. To call upon a great spirit is to ask for its vengeance... and its mercy." - Hyara Allseer
05FR014.name: Wrath of the Freljord

05FR010.description: Grant a Stance to an ally.
05FR010.name: Stance Swap

05FR010T4.description: Pick an ally. Deal 1 to EVERYTHING else.
05FR010T4.flavorText: "Against the freezing night you warm us. Against our foes you bring protective flame...  Spirit of fire, AID US!" - Udyr
05FR010T4.name: Ram Stance

05FR010T3.flavorText: "It is not the absence of pain I seek. It is the tenacity to fight through it." - Hyara Allseer
05FR010T3.name: Boar Stance

05FR010T2.flavorText: "The Great Bear is indomitable, and in taking it's blessing, we shall know no fear... or mercy." - Hyara Allseer
05FR010T2.name: Bear Stance

05FR017.description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round. Create a Stance Swap in hand.
05FR017.name: Inner Beast

05FR006.flavorText: Few shaman families have served the Winter's Claw tribe as long as Chuluun's. As a shaman of great walrus, he heralds and portends the sea's bounty... and its dangers.
05FR006.name: Tusk Speaker

05FR015.description: Grant your allies +1|+1. Then deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
05FR015.flavorText:
"Ancient ones, bolster our strength against the encroaching cold, and drive away our foes with storms of wind and ice. For we have not forgotten you or the honors you are due."
- Murkwolf Shaman's Prayer
05FR015.name: Spirits Unleashed

05FR005.description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
05FR005.flavorText: Few scry the future as well as the shamans serving the Elk of Bones. Fewer still can stomach seeing the looming death of any who come seeking their foresight.
05FR005.name: Bone Scryer

05FR004.description: When I'm summoned, create a Stance Swap in hand.
05FR004.flavorText: "Eager and cautious. Quick and quiet. The way of the fox is the joy of seeing but not being seen. In travel and war, a wise leader honors those who follow the fox spirit. For no battle is won without pathfinders and scouts." - Scarmother Vrynna
05FR004.name: Vulpine Wanderer

05FR006T1.flavorText: "Many songs can touch your heart. My songs shake the heavens." - Chuluun
05FR006T1.name: Dance of Tusks

05IO003.description: Costs 2 less if you've Recalled a unit this round.
05IO003.flavorText:
"Himon'she, it is an honor to travel with you. The others tell me you are wise beyond measure. Where are we heading?"
"Oh dear. I was following you!" - Ahri and the Pathless Ancient
05IO003.name: Pathless Ancient

05IO004.description: Attack: The first time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
05IO004.flavorText: She searched for herself in other peoples' secrets. Saw herself through the eyes of so many. As she approached the forest, she wondered if it would be just another lens--or if, just this once, she'd found a mirror.
05IO004.name: Ahri

05IO004T2.description:
When you Recall an ally, reduce its cost by 1.
Attack: Each time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
05IO004T2.flavorText: "I can remember a thousand memories I've never had. From now on, I'll make my own." - Ahri
05IO004T2.name: Ahri

05IO004T1.description:
Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create an Ahri in your deck.
05IO004T1.name: Ahri's Charm

05IO023.description: Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
05IO023.name: Charm

05IO020.flavorText: Chaos gives claws to the meek. A wolf hounds its prey and is stalled by a felled branch. A hawk dives and tumbles amidst a sudden gale. We are the branch. We are the wind.
05IO020.name: Windsinger

05IO020T1.flavorText: The wind moves all, in its own time.
05IO020T1.name: Gust

05IO007.description: When I'm summoned, draw 2 and give all allies +1|+1 this round.
05IO007.flavorText: The forest offers its secrets freely... but few bear the courage to ask questions of it.
05IO007.name: Sai'nen Thousand-Tailed

05IO021.description:
Play: Recall an ally to summon an Ephemeral copy of it.
Countdown 3: Summon another Ephemeral copy of it.
05IO021.flavorText: Once, the God-Willow grew within Omikayalan. What springs forth from that place now may be stronger, may be weaker. What matters is that it is new.
05IO021.name: God-Willow Seedling

05IO001.description: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and Elusive this round.
05IO001.flavorText: "They say you don't speak to save others from the weight of your knowledge. Hmm... I bet you just got tired of answering questions." - Ahri
05IO001.name: Woodland Keeper

05IO024.description: Summon Ephemeral copies of the 3 strongest followers you've Recalled this game.
05IO024.name: Children of the Forest

05IO025.description: Each round, the first time you Recall a follower, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
05IO025.flavorText: Mystery is a greater thing than its conclusion.
05IO025.name: Tail-Cloak Matriarch

05IO026.flavorText: If one is to venerate the hunt, one must pause to weep for the hunted.
05IO026.name: The Mourned

05IO006.flavorText: The forest needed a guardian, someone who could stand sentry at its borders for years, maybe centuries, without moving. Gai'sh was an eager volunteer and promptly proved his dedication with a ten-year nap.
05IO006.name: Nine Lives

05IO006T1.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower from your regions.
When I'm Recalled, transform me into Nine Lives.
05IO006T1.flavorText: "My best quality? I sleep like a rock."
05IO006T1.name: Liminal Guardian

05IO002.description: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills with only 1 allied target. Stop them.
05IO002.flavorText: An arrow knows neither the intent of the hunter, nor the worth of its prey.
05IO002.name: Memory's Cloak

05SH014.description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the weakest enemy.
05SH014.levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
05SH014.flavorText:
"The two were once friends, but time and affinity made them into brothers. Certainly Azir could not have achieved all that he was able without Xerath by his side." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
05SH014.name: Xerath

05SH014T3.description:
Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Xerath in your deck.
05SH014T3.flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
05SH014T3.name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

05SH014T4.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
05SH014T4.name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

05SH014T5.description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
05SH014T5.name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

05SH014T1.description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 3 to the weakest enemy.
05SH014T1.flavorText:
"If only Xerath had known that Azir planned to free him of his bondage, it might have prevented Shurima's demise... but some part of a mortal's humanity is lost when they Ascend, and any forgiveness or leniency was quickly erased from Xerath's mind." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
05SH014T1.name: Xerath

05SH014T2.description:
When an allied landmark is destroyed or Round Start: Deal 5 to the weakest enemy or the enemy Nexus if there are none.
If an enemy unit would die, Obliterate it instead.
05SH014T2.flavorText:
"For years he sowed seeds of revenge, plotting against Azir in the dark of the Emperor's Tomb. Xerath would see a new Shurima made in his own image, gathering the acolytes who had studied his arcane magics to serve as his army. Now, he marches on Shurima just as Azir has revived it." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
05SH014T2.name: Xerath

05SH017.description: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions everywhere +2|+2 and Overwhelm.
05SH017.flavorText: The Herald spread her arms wide as she lifted her face to the sun, which hung bloody and red above Shurima. "Hail, the Magus Ascendant," she breathed beatifically, her voice echoing off the ring of ruined columns. "Hail, Xerath!"
05SH017.name: Herald of the Magus

05SH011.flavorText: As richly appointed as the tomb was, it did little good for the banished and the dead.
05SH011.name: Endless Devout

05SH011T1.flavorText: Xerath's new army would make better use of the tomb's many artifacts, turning useless extravagance into a powerful conduit for the Magus Ascendant's magic.
05SH011T1.name: Restored Devout

05SH011T2.description: Countdown 3: or when I'm destroyed: summon a Restored Devout.
05SH011T2.flavorText: The Tomb of Emperors is no less lavish for serving as Xerath's prison. Indeed, the beauty of the place and its trappings is nothing if not a reminder of the inhabitants' fall from grace - a gilded prison.
05SH011T2.name: Sarcophagus

05SH022.description: Give an enemy -2|-0 this round. An ally and that enemy strike each other.
05SH022.flavorText: "A traveler who does not fear the desert, does not know the desert." - Shuriman adage
05SH022.name: Desert Duel

05SH003.description: Countdown 3 or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the strongest ally +2|+0.
05SH003.flavorText: Sparking, crackling pillars rose from the sands, subverted places of power that would reinforce Xerath's already powerful army.
05SH003.name: Obelisk of Power

05SH016.description: Play: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied Ruinous Acolytes everywhere +1|+1.
05SH016.flavorText: All of Xerath's acolytes gave something of themselves in exchange for power, but his most powerful devotees were hardly more than husks of their former selves, serving as both conduit and power source for their new emperor's energy.
05SH016.name: Ruinous Acolyte

05SH018.description: Summon a Stasis Statue to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
05SH018.flavorText: Magical energy does not dissipate. It is merely repurposed.
05SH018.name: Servitude of Desolation

05SH012.description: Countdown 3: or when I'm destroyed: Summon a Dami'yin the Unbound.
05SH012.flavorText: "At each place of power shall an obelisk be raised, an instrument through which the Magus Ascendant may draw the power from beneath the sands." - Herald of the Magus
05SH012.name: Risen Altar

05SH012T1.flavorText: "At each place of power shall we draw forth the magical energy of the land, and in so doing, bolster our great emperor's armies!" - Herald of the Magus
05SH012T1.name: Dami'yin the Unbound

05SH020.description: Create a Ruinous Acolyte or an Obelisk of Power in hand.
05SH020.flavorText: "I will fashion Shurima in MY image." - Xerath
05SH020.name: Construct of Desolation

05SH015.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
05SH015.flavorText: The horizon before her sang with energy. Where others saw sand and silt, she saw the ley lines, blinding lattices of pure energy that were hers for the taking.
05SH015.name: Sandseer

05SH004.description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
05SH004.flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
05SH004.name: Unleashed Energy

05SH004T2.flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
05SH004T2.name: Unleashed Energy

05SH004T1.description: Destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
05SH004T1.flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
05SH004T1.name: Unleashed Energy

05SH002.description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
05SH002.flavorText: The acolytes had been accomplished before they sought out Xerath. Now that they had studied what he had once studied himself, they were unstoppable.
05SH002.name: Waste Walker

05SH007.description: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
05SH007.flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
05SH007.name: Rite of the Arcane

05SH007T1.description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
05SH007T1.name: Rite of the Arcane

05SH007T2.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
05SH007T2.name: Rite of the Arcane

05NX009.description: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a Twinblade Revenant in hand.
05NX009.flavorText: The Demacians crawled to their ramparts to find death itself descending upon their walls. Though they were able to fell some of the Gray Legion, the dark tide of war soon proved unstoppable.
05NX009.name: Lost Soul

05NX006.description:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
05NX006.flavorText:
"We have an irregularity in our midst. Though most of those we revive abhor their return to life, this fellow seems to both understand his lot, and revels in the subsequent opportunities. Curious."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
05NX006.name: Reborn Grenadier

05NX017.description: When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
05NX017.flavorText:
"It was the good Lady's suggestion that finally woke the creature. A small dose of iodine salt into the bloodstream, lethal to any mortal, but simply agonizing to our patient. To the risen, there is no greater motivator than pain."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
05NX017.name: Risen Reckoner

05NX005.description: When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally +2|+0.
05NX005.flavorText: As Lady Noradi's powers grew, she pondered whether her powers would take root in the corpses lining Noxus's oldest tombs. She found the light of life a mere flicker in the husks, but from those wilting flames, the shadows of war still danced.
05NX005.name: Ancient Warmonger

05NX001.description:
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
05NX001.flavorText: Sion glimpsed fleeting flashes of opaque memories. Legions standing before him. Accolades. Crowns. War. A king's deathrattle. The Great Nothing. Blood. But just as soon as they floated by, they floated past, pale ribbons in the wind.
05NX001.name: Sion

05NX003.description:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a Reborn Grenadier and give it +2|+0 this round.
05NX003.flavorText: "Rise again, my child..." - Dr. Esslanger, Pensive Physician
05NX003.name: Salt And Stitches

05NX015.description:
When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
Last Breath: Create a Risen Reckoner in hand.
05NX015.flavorText:
"The first minotaurs I revived were docile, useless beasts. Neither the thrum of war nor the threat of death could stir their senses."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
05NX015.name: Fallen Reckoner

05NX019.description: Reputation: I cost 3.  Summon 2 Trifarian Gloryseekers.
05NX019.flavorText: Those seeking glory will stop at nothing to find it.
05NX019.name: For Glory!

05NX013.description: When I'm discarded, create a Risen Rider in hand.
05NX013.flavorText:
"It was only after rubbing the rider's armor with Blackshade leaves that they were spared from the basilisk's viciousness. The plants are native to the hinterlands, just as the beasts, and are as pungent as they are poisonous."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
05NX013.name: Fallen Rider

05NX018.flavorText: "Upon the night, death rode." - The Lady of Blood
05NX018.name: Risen Rider

05NX001T1.flavorText:
"Though the fog lingers as we first wake Sion, the full spectrum of war stirs a life within him that is both furious and reluctant to end."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
05NX001T1.name: Sion Returned

05NX001T3.description:
Last Breath: Summon Sion Returned. 
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
05NX001T3.flavorText: Through the din of battle, he remembered. He remembered his life, a proud servant of Noxus. A revered general who gave his life felling Demacia's king. He remembered his death, and the empty expanse that followed. His was a good life, and a good death. But this... this was madness.
05NX001T3.name: Sion

05NX001T2.description:
To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
Create a Sion in your deck.
05NX001T2.name: Sion's Roar of the Slayer

05NX012.description: To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
05NX012.name: Roar of the Slayer

05NX014.description: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a Trifarian Shieldbreaker.
05NX014.name: Weapons of the Lost

05NX007.description: Last Breath: Create a Lost Soul in hand.
05NX007.flavorText:
"The Demacians palpably lost their will to fight upon seeing our fallen--who were so selflessly cut down by those brave Vanguard--rise once more. Victory was never in question."
- Excerpt from the Lady of Blood's field report, recipient unknown
05NX007.name: Twinblade Revenant

05NX004.description: Play: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
05NX004.flavorText: Dr. Esslanger was once a respected and retiring physician who garnered his credible reputation through years of hard work. But it wasn't until a young noblewoman was brought to his study, her blood blackened by betrayal, that he truly began serving Noxus.
05NX004.name: Grave Physician

05NX016.description: When a non-Fleeting ally in hand is discarded, create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
05NX016.flavorText: Under cover of night, Lady Faris Noradi led her Gray Legion out of the Noxian capital. It took three hard, bloody weeks, but they finally neared the small Demacian outpost her scouts had identified. It was time for the demonstration.
05NX016.name: The Lady of Blood

05NX002.description: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game.
05NX002.flavorText: "What could better instill loyalty in a would-be traitor than the sight of a butchered conspirator, brought back to fight under the Noxian banner? They will all serve, one way or another." - The Lady of Blood
05NX002.name: Noble Rebel

05BW005.description: When you play a spell, grant +1|+0 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
05BW005.levelupDescription: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.
05BW005.flavorText:
"Have you said your goodbyes, young Tidecaller?"
"Yes, greatmother."
"Are you afraid?"
"...Yes, greatmother."
"Good. To be afraid is to be cautious. But trust yourself, as we trust you. Now, go. And may the currents keep you."
05BW005.name: Nami

05BW005T2.description:
Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
Create a Nami in your deck.
05BW005T2.name: Nami's Ebb

05BW005T1.description: When you play a spell, grant +2|+1 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
05BW005T1.flavorText:
"Do you think she's far along in her journey?"
"We can only hope, Tama."
"I can see her now... Beautiful eyes glowing in the light of the moon, the shine of saltwater glistening on her scales."
"This burden... the fate of our people. It should not be hers alone."
"She is doing her part, as we are doing ours, Loto. All we can do is believe in her, and love her with all our hearts."
05BW005T1.name: Nami

05BW006.description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
05BW006.name: Ebb

05BW006T2.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2, and create an Ebb and Flow in hand.
05BW006T2.name: Flow

05BW006T1.description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
05BW006T1.flavorText: "I decide what the tide will bring." - Nami
05BW006T1.name: Ebb and Flow

05BW002.flavorText: "Sure, a few of 'em hunt us, like they hunt everything. But y'know, most landwalkers I meet are just looking to enjoy their time in the big blue, same as us. We're all just people."
05BW002.name: Journeying Sandhopper

05BW008.description: When you play a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
05BW008.flavorText: "Many of our tribe find Loto somewhat unnerving. They see only a tireless fighter, and the distance in his troubled gaze. But I know what's truly in his heart--fear that he is not strong enough to save us... and extraordinary love." - Tama, Marai Songstress
05BW008.name: Abyssal Guard

05BW011.description: When you play 2 spells each round, grant other allies +1|+1.
05BW011.flavorText: "LISTEN HERE, SOWDIER. I'LL HAVE YOU KNOW I HAVE OVA FWEE-HUNDWED CONFIRMED KWILLS AND I'M DA TOP ADMIWAL IN ALL DA MAWINE'S FORCES SO WHEN I SAY SWIM, YOU BETTA SWIM, OKAY? OKAY THANK YOU!"
05BW011.name: Fleet Admiral Shelly

05BW003.description: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a Crashing Wave in your deck.
05BW003.name: Tidal Wave

05BW003T1.description: Deal 2 to four different randomly targeted enemies and create a Colossal Wave in your deck.
05BW003T1.name: Crashing Wave

05BW003T2.description: Deal 4 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
05BW003T2.name: Colossal Wave

05BW004.description:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you play a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it Fleeting.
05BW004.flavorText: To the Marai, the Leo'lei is a herald of great change. It is said each flourish of its graceful wings influences the flow of the tides.
05BW004.name: Avatar of the Tides

05BW001.description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
05BW001.flavorText: The Marai rarely desire to venture far from home. But Ai'la was born with curiosity in her heart--and though she is bound by duty to her tribe, she spends each waking moment dreaming of the day she can truly be free.
05BW001.name: Marai Warden

05BW010.description: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
05BW010.flavorText: The Marai's ancestral home is protected by the celestial light of a moonstone. Every hundred years, its light begins to wane, and a new Tidecaller is tasked with finding another--for without it, the Marai people would be plunged into darkness, and fall prey to the horrors that lurk in the depths.
05BW010.name: Marai Greatmother

05BW013.description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a spell this round, grant me Elusive.
05BW013.flavorText:
"The ocean believes that the wave will return,
gives trust to the ebb, to the flow, to the churn.
So 'ere the wave crashes against the shore, 
the ocean delights in the crest's bold roar."
- A verse from 'Serenade for the Tidecaller'
05BW013.name: Marai Songstress

05PZ015.description: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
05PZ015.flavorText:
"Officer was witnessed pursuing suspect at a high speed into a trap of her own making. Following the arrest, officer proceeded to submit her own speeding citation and fine, claiming (somewhat dramatically) 'Justice is a two-way street.'" 
- Excerpt from a Warden beat report
05PZ015.name: Justice Rider

05PZ012.description: Play: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact Fleeting copy in hand, then shuffle those top 5 cards into your deck
05PZ012.flavorText: Detectives are nothing without leads. An archivist's job is to collect every scrap of intel and create new possibilities where none previously existed.
05PZ012.name: Station Archivist

05PZ019.description: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
05PZ019.name: Most Wanted

05PZ023.flavorText: "Yeah so I've been 'elping Jayce an' them lot 'tinker around with this new thing. Powerformative technology, we call it. Truth be told, Jayce said I'll be listed as co-inventor once the documentation's done! Them bigwigs know where the real smarts is, eh?"
05PZ023.name: Forge Worker

05PZ031.description: When I'm summoned, draw Jayce. Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've played this game, increase it by 1.
05PZ031.flavorText:
"The magnanimous Albus Ferros has once again THRUST himself into the spotlight, dramatically outbidding Clans Cadwalder and Giopara for the rights to sponsor Jayce's Hexgate research. 'A fine day for Ferros is a fine day for Piltover', as the saying goes, and yesterday was a very fine day for Clan Ferros, indeed!"
- Excerpt from a sponsored spread in the Piltover Daily
05PZ031.name: Albus Ferros

05PZ031T1.flavorText: "First, the investment. Then, the dividend." - Albus Ferros
05PZ031T1.name: Ferros' Dividend

05PZ027.description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
05PZ027.name: Shock Blast

05PZ022.description: Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
05PZ022.levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
05PZ022.flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
05PZ022.name: Jayce

05PZ022T8.description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
05PZ022T8.flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
05PZ022T8.name: Jayce

05PZ022T1.description:
Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
05PZ022T1.flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
05PZ022T1.name: Jayce

05PZ022T2.description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another. Create a Jayce in your deck.
05PZ022T2.name: Jayce's Shock Blast

05PZ022T7.levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
05PZ022T7.flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
05PZ022T7.name: Jayce

05PZ022T6.levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
05PZ022T6.flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
05PZ022T6.name: Jayce

05PZ022T9.description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
05PZ022T9.flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
05PZ022T9.name: Jayce

05PZ022T3.description: Give your allies +2|+0 and Quick Attack this round. If they already have it or Double Attack, give them a random keyword instead.
05PZ022T3.name: Acceleration Gate

05PZ017.description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
05PZ017.flavorText: "Better let 'em air out a minute. Greenies can't take the smell. But lemme tells ya... once you're accustomed, nothin' like it!" - Puffcap Peddler
05PZ017.name: Sump Fumes

05PZ024.description: Play: Manifest a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
05PZ024.flavorText:
"About the only good part of Ferros financing my work was getting to team up with Reggie. Not only is the man one of the most competent people I've ever worked with, he's a heck of a guy, too."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
05PZ024.name: Ferros Financier

05PZ013.description: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
05PZ013.name: Piltover Peacemaker

05PZ020.description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it Elusive this round.
05PZ020.flavorText: "We'll surround the location while using smokespinners to mask our movements..." - Caitlyn
05PZ020.name: Ambush

05PZ010.description: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
05PZ010.name: Advanced Intel

05PZ014.description: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
05PZ014.flavorText: Corina smiled as the Piltover Wardens burst down her door, as they trampled her precious flowers underfoot, as they sent up clouds of toxic pollen. All as planned.
05PZ014.name: Corina, Mastermind

05PZ014T1.description: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
05PZ014T1.name: Beguiling Blossom

05PZ014T2.description: Play: Activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
05PZ014T2.flavorText: "Right where I want you." - Corina Veraza
05PZ014T2.name: Volatile Bloom

05PZ002.flavorText: "This a popular case, you know. Just had a chap in here earlier looking at it. Enjoy!" - Station Archivist
05PZ002.name: Insider Knowledge

05PZ008.description: Deal 1 damage to a random ally.
05PZ008.name: Flashbomb Trap

05PZ021.description: When I am summoned, summon a Forge Worker. When you play a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
05PZ021.flavorText: If Piltover is a city driven by invention, then its forges are its engines.
05PZ021.name: The Forge Of Tomorrow

05PZ025.flavorText: "Takes two things to get an idea off the page and into your hands. Funding's one half of the equation, the other's a good forge. And it's not just the tools or the hardware in the forge; if your chief doesn't have what it takes to run things, well, your idea's staying on paper." - Jayce
05PZ025.name: Forge Chief

05PZ006.description: Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
05PZ006.levelupDescription: 5 of your traps have been activated.
05PZ006.flavorText: Caitlyn was always a dogged and thorough investigator, a quality that helped propel her fast through the ranks of Piltover enforcement. But when a case concerning a certain 'C' came along, one that countless other enforcers had abandoned, it seemed almost as though Caitlyn had finally met her match. Almost.
05PZ006.name: Caitlyn

05PZ004.description: When I’m summoned, create a Most Wanted in hand.
05PZ004.flavorText: From unloading silently into the street to prepping the ram, setup didn't take long. It was just a matter of waiting on Caitlyn's cue.
05PZ004.name: Officer Squad

05PZ009.description: Nexus Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
05PZ009.flavorText: Zayne Asako, like all Zaunite kids, had to grow up fast on those violent and dark understreets. After losing his brother to yet another senseless gang crime, he committed himself to Piltover enforcement, hoping reason and law would make his home finally safe.
05PZ009.name: Sting Officer

05PZ016.description: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
05PZ016.flavorText: The grand city of Piltover is home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra. Piltover's jails are also home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra.
05PZ016.name: Coup de Grace

05PZ030.description: When you draw or create me in hand or each Round Start: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
05PZ030.flavorText:
"...configuring hextech into a stable state was the most difficult hurdle I faced. Most nights, it felt like the crystals and hexite were actively conspiring to trip me up, and it was only through extensive trial and error that I was able to get the component parts working in harmony..."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
05PZ030.name: Hextech Anomaly

05PZ028.description: Grant me +2|+0 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
05PZ028.flavorText: "The people of this city worship at the feet of 'intelligence'. But what good is the greatest mind without the means to express itself? No. I will show Piltover true greatness. It will tower over them. It will blot out the sun. And it will carry my name." - Albus Ferros
05PZ028.name: Ferros Skycruiser

05PZ038.description: Deal 3 to an enemy and 1 to all other enemies.
05PZ038.flavorText: "They're supposed to go up, not EVERYWHERE! Oh, my!" - Heimerdinger
05PZ038.name: Rocket Barrage

05PZ035.description: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 Poison Puffcaps attached.
05PZ035.flavorText: The stink of a whump in the height of puffcap season is unlike any other. Imagine an open sewer full of week-old fish and rotten eggs, and you're halfway there.
05PZ035.name: Stinky Whump

05PZ006T2.description: Strike: Plant 4 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck and deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to the number of your traps activated this round.
05PZ006T2.flavorText: She burst in, leveled her rifle at the culprit, and looked down the scope. There, smiling through the looking glass, was a familiar face.
05PZ006T2.name: Caitlyn

05PZ006T1.description:
Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Create a Caitlyn in your deck.
05PZ006T1.name: Caitlyn's Piltover Peacemaker

05PZ029.description: Grant Tech allies everywhere +1|+1 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
05PZ029.flavorText: The Hextech Handler was initially constructed to transport raw materials through Piltover, but as time went on, the locals apparently developed a soft spot for him. Jayce's forge crew nicknamed him Nugget, a Piltovan lord reportedly donated a hat, and passing kids now adorn him with whatever they have to hand.
05PZ029.name: Hextech Handler

05SI014.description: Round Start: Create in hand a Fleeting copy of a non-Fleeting spell you played last round.
05SI014.flavorText: The Blessed Isles forget. The Shadow Isles remember. The Shadow Isles forget. The Blessed Isles remember.
05SI014.name: Catalogue of Regrets

05SI013.description: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, summon an Ephemeral Mistwraith.
05SI013.flavorText: The Black Mist traps its victims in endless cycles of self-imposed torment. Through the Mistcatchers, Tek and Kana give those souls a chance to break that cycle for themselves.
05SI013.name: Mistkeepers

05SI009.description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast.
05SI009.levelupDescription: I've seen you kill 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.
05SI009.flavorText: "To be a Sentinel is to fight. To lose yourself or to lose the ones you love. But more than that? It means to live. For yourself... and for the ones you love."
05SI009.name: Senna

05SI016.description: Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
05SI016.flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
05SI016.name: Dawning Shadow

05SI004.description: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
05SI004.flavorText: "Pups is pups." - Wisdom scrawled upon the soul
05SI004.name: Watcher on the Isles

05SI012.description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
05SI012.flavorText: "I can feel the sun no longer. Even so, I wield its memory--and that is enough."
05SI012.name: Solari Sentinel

05SI008.description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next Darkness this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
05SI008.flavorText: "You asked me, Senna, what brought me to this fight. I have lost nothing to the Mist, it does not threaten my home. It exists, and it should not. I am here to discover why. Do I need sentiment to join your cause?"
05SI008.name: Ixtali Sentinel

05SI029.flavorText: There is a little of fear in everything. It lays quietly at the heart of mystery. It is the spark of joy in awe and wonder. It grants life its purpose - death, its power. It is everything. It is nothing.
05SI029.name: Darkness

05SI010.description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your next Darkness this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
05SI010.flavorText:
"Another nightmare?"
"Wasn't all bad. You weren't there."
"Dolt. What was the bad part?"
"You weren't there."
05SI010.name: Dess & Ada

05SI009T1.description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast and cost 1 less.
05SI009T1.flavorText: "We were wrong. The Black Mist isn't heartless. It's not random. It has a goal. But that means we can track it. Means it can bleed."
05SI009T1.name: Senna

05SI009T2.description:
Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
Create a Senna in your deck.
05SI009T2.flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
05SI009T2.name: Senna's Dawning Shadow

05SI011.description: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
05SI011.flavorText: What must the Mist see when it looks upon Maeve? Exuberance, confidence--irrepressible optimism. How it must long to snuff that taunting flame. For what can death fear, but life?
05SI011.name: Burgeoning Sentinel

05SI015.description: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
05SI015.flavorText: The Buhru and Sentinel philosophy align on a single crucial point: all things must end, and some must be made to end.
05SI015.name: Buhru Sentinel

05MT004.description: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies in 4 different rounds, grant me Spellshield, Overwhelm, and Challenger.
05MT004.flavorText: For centuries, the demon Camphor stalked the lands of Targon, pulling from her victims the very strengths that defined them. From the mighty, she would take strength; from the wise, wisdom. But she had no interest in these boons. Instead, she feasted on the suffering, doubt, and misery she inflicted. Camphor was a monster in every sense of the word.
05MT004.name: Camphor, the Doubt

05MT006.flavorText: "Targonians need no further proof of the gods' cruelty. Look at what they have done to us. Look at what they have done to our most cherished companions." - Pantheon
05MT006.name: Wounded Whiteflame

05MT008.description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
05MT008.flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
05MT008.name: Shield Vault

05MT014.flavorText: "Targon's night sky is a wondrous thing of unimaginable beauty. It is all too easy to lose oneself gazing at that expanse, not knowing how far the stars stretch, and what manner of being might be looking back..." - Targonian climber
05MT014.name: Celestial Wonder

05MT003.levelupDescription: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds.
05MT003.flavorText: Here stands Atreus, who had his freedoms stripped from him by the very Aspects he revered. Here stands the embers of War, who left Atreus with gifts few mortals can comprehend. Here stands a man, ready to fight and die for those he cherishes.
05MT003.name: Pantheon

05MT013.description: Play: Give an ally Spellshield and Overwhelm this round.
05MT013.flavorText: Iula still remembers the burning grief that coursed through her after she learned of her husband's death. When Pantheon came to her, asking if she would help him destroy a creature that feasted on this very pain, her answer was swift.
05MT013.name: Iula

05MT009.flavorText: Warring against the gods seemed a fool's errand, but through the scars and through the screams, those brave few learned lessons. The gods thought singularly, selfishly, and had lost the gift of camaraderie. This would be their weapon. This would be their armor.
05MT009.name: Battle Bonds

05MT003T2.description: Once a Pantheon has leveled up, grant me a random keyword for each round you've targeted allies this game.
05MT003T2.flavorText: Here stands Pantheon, who took up his spear and swore to drive all gods and demons from this land we call home.
05MT003T2.name: Pantheon

05MT003T1.description:
Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
Create a Pantheon in your deck.
05MT003T1.flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
05MT003T1.name: Pantheon's Shield Vault

05MT010.description: Play: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Silence an enemy follower.
05MT010.flavorText: Eshiyme was once a revered oracle who used her Sight to guide those in need. But this gift was stolen from her by Camphor, who intended to feast on her inevitable anguish. How sorely the demon underestimated brave Eshiyme.
05MT010.name: Blinded Mystic

05MT002.flavorText: "It is in the bonds of kinship that we must find our strength." - Pantheon
05MT002.name: We Stand Together

05MT012.description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Gem in hand.
05MT012.flavorText: The colossi are ancient and venerated protectors of Targon's most revered sites. To harm them is to insult the mountain itself. To torture them is a crime no Targonian can forgive.
05MT012.name: Freed Colossus

05MT011.description: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
05MT011.flavorText: These brave few knew they were stepping into warfare with beings of unimaginable power. They knew death was likely. But still, they stepped.
05MT011.name: Against the Odds

05MT005.flavorText: Tor felt his life fading with every heartbeat, but in that grave and looming darkness, where he was expected to embrace dread, he instead found purpose. He would not only face death willingly, but would bring with him the very demon who had dared to cut his life short. This is how he would be remembered. This would be Tor's saga.
05MT005.name: Saga Seeker

05DE003.description:
When I'm summoned, swap my Health and your Nexus' Health. 
I can't be blocked by enemies with less Health than me.
05DE003.flavorText:
"An honorable tribute to those gone, but never forgotten: When the people of Demacia see the sun's rays shining off his form, they will know hope, and the indomitable spirit that inspired his construction will live on through him." 
- Durand workshop plaque
05DE003.name: Gorlith the Unscalable

05DE009.description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3.
05DE009.levelupDescription: Round End: Your allies have 25+ total Health.
05DE009.flavorText: For many years after his creation, Galio lay dormant, unfeeling, unknowing. It wasn't until magic brought him to life and he experienced the resulting thrill of battle that he knew the joy of being among the living. Now, when he slept, he missed such wonderful things!
05DE009.name: Galio

05DE009T3.description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2. Create a Galio in your deck.
05DE009T3.flavorText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.
05DE009T3.name: Galio's Shield of Durand

05DE009T1.description:
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3. 
Each round, the first time an ally takes damage, Rally.
05DE009T1.flavorText: When he awoke, Galio was overjoyed to find a whole family had been crafted for him, a facsimile of the same family that would carry on the legacy of his maker for years to come. They were just like him - they wouldn't break.
05DE009T1.name: Galio

05DE020.description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2.
05DE020.flavorText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.
05DE020.name: Shield of Durand

05DE021.description: To play, spend all of your mana. Summon a Dauntless Vanguard and grow its stats to that amount. If 9+ mana was spent, grant other allied Elites +2|+2.
05DE021.flavorText: When it seems all hope is lost, the soldiers of Demacia look to the Vanguard.
05DE021.name: Might of the Vanguard

05DE017.description: Fully heal an ally. Then, that ally and an enemy strike each other.
05DE017.name: Winds of War

05DE010.description: When you summon another ally, grant it +0|+1.
05DE010.flavorText: "It may not be evident to the untrained, but the work of a great artist is in one chip of the chisel to the next."
05DE010.name: Durand Sculptor

05DE013.description: Support: I take all damage for my supported ally this round.
05DE013.flavorText: Following the stag-mounted Ranger's lead, the petricite guardian dwarfed the very creature that had inspired its elegant design.
05DE013.name: Petricite Stag

05DE015.flavorText: The placid mountain drakes are slow to anger despite their appearance, and their stoicism around other mountain beasts makes them natural protectors of otherwise vulnerable flocks.
05DE015.name: Mountain Drake

05DE019.description: Support: Give my supported ally +0|+2 and Formidable this round.
05DE019.flavorText: "The Ranger Elmheart has brought us grim news," the architect said calmly, focusing on rerolling the parchment to hide how his hands shook. He turned to the waiting sculptors and gave them a stiff nod. "It seems the time has come for Demacia's unseen protectors to come out of hiding."
05DE019.name: Durand Architect

05DE014.description: Play: Grant an ally +0|+1 and Tough.
05DE014.flavorText: Shireen looked up from her work at the sound of pounding hoofbeats. The ranger's haste left her uneasy, but curious. She urged her petricite bird to take flight, and followed in the ranger's wake.
05DE014.name: Durand Protege

05DE012.description: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
05DE012.flavorText: As the Broadwing passed overhead, the battered Demacian soldiers below let out a cheer, inspired by its enduring form.
05DE012.name: Petricite Broadwing

05DE018.flavorText: "It's always a joy to see them come to life. You forget how distinct each is, their personalities reflections of the artist who made them." - Durand Sculptor
05DE018.name: Petricite Hound

06NX030.description: I gain all allied everywhere buffs.
06NX030.flavorText: "Act One: An ex-soldier, having abandoned his post following the theft of an ancient Kashuri artifact, hides at a Qayanvi bar, full of arrogance and too much drink. Little does he know, his stolen treasure whispers of all it sees to its true owner! His life pours away like so much wine, Noxian crimson on Ionian gold."
06NX030.name: Legion Deserter

06BW045.flavorText: Not much keeps the circling sharks of Ripper's Bay away. Once they've had a taste of blood, they're eager for more.
06BW045.name: Blood in the Water

06SI040.description: Revive an Ephemeral copy of the strongest dead allied follower and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
06SI040.flavorText: Spirits can be banished for a time, but they always return.
06SI040.name: Harrowing Return

06FR033.description: Last Breath: Get an empty mana gem.
06FR033.flavorText: The cycle of life and death looks different in the Freljord. The harsh environment ensures that little goes to waste.
06FR033.name: Hunting Boar

06NX024.description:
Play: Deal 2 to an enemy.
Your Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills have "When I damage a Stunned or damaged enemy, kill it."
06NX024.flavorText: "Act Two: A duplicitous lord with little to his name but a pilfered Kashuri gauntlet charms an audience of Ionians. However, his mask is crude, and easily seen through. He begs for his life, claiming ignorance. The iron hand he sought to rule with lies empty."
06NX024.name: Lord Broadmane

06PZ032.description: Pick one of two new 2 cost spells to create in hand and set its cost to 0 this round. Repeat two more times.
06PZ032.flavorText: Zaun's first songspinner was surprisingly reliable. The only downside was that nobody could figure out how to control the volume.
06PZ032.name: Sputtering Songspinner

06BW038.description: Once you're Deep, heal your allies and Nexus 3.
06BW038.flavorText:
"What does it want?!"
"It... it's after the oranges!"
"By the Bearded Lady, JUST GIVE IT THE WHOLE BUSHEL!" - Unlucky sailors
06BW038.name: Megatusk

06IO033.description:
For the rest of the game, when you Blade Dance, summon another attacking Blade.
Blade Dance 1.
06IO033.flavorText: "Lead the dance, and I'll follow!" - Ribbon Dancer
06IO033.name: Storm of Blades

06NX009.description: Attack: I deal 3 damage to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 damage to the enemy Nexus instead.
06NX009.flavorText: "Act Three: A cruel keeper and her pet. The greyback is innocent even in grisly purpose - the artifact it bears forces subservience. The keeper refuses to scream as she is fed to her pet. If only all Noxians were so noble in their demise."
06NX009.name: Captive Greyback

06NX009T1.description: Deal 3 to Captive Greyback's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
06NX009T1.flavorText: "Let that be a lesson. Subjugators live only until the first revolt." - Jhin
06NX009T1.name: Obeyed Order

06FR028.description: When I'm summoned, grant units in your deck my stats, then draw a unit with 5+ Power.
06FR028.flavorText: Avarosan lorekeepers are often seasoned elders of the tribe, protectors of the people and seasoned storytellers. They keep the tradition of both the hunt and fight alive through story and song.
06FR028.name: Revna, the Lorekeeper

06SH036.description: When you summon a champion, destroy me to grant it +2|+1 and SpellShield.
06SH036.flavorText: Nasus emerged from the sarcophagus, his mind clear and his wounds fully healed. He scribbled a few notes and peered at the sarcophagi hanging high above, pondering the mental state of the beastly aberrations resting within. Time would tell if this magic could bring the baccai back from their insanity, a magic the other Ascended had once protested. But they were gone now and Renekton and his madness were not. Nasus scribbled a few more words, hoping he had finally found a way to save his brother.
06SH036.name: Chamber of Renewal

06MT038.description: Nightfall: Give other allies +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round.
06MT038.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, lend us your strength,
Though darkness surrounds us,
With your light, we shall overcome."
- Lunari prayer
06MT038.name: The Winding Light

06IO003.flavorText: "Act Four: A young priestess enters our story. Her tale is one of tragedy, conveyed on the pale lips of those she betrayed. Desperate to repent for her transgression, she carries in her arms a great burden, a gilded gift for the Noxians she welcomed to her land. We are left to wonder: was it sorrow or the bullet that broke her heart?"
06IO003.name: The Stagehand

06IO003T1.flavorText: "An actor must not shy from the spotlight." - Jhin
06IO003T1.name: Stunning Performance

06DE036.description: Attack: Draw a unit. If it's a Dragon, summon it attacking.
06DE036.flavorText: "Luckily, my research suggests that broodfathers spend most of their time hunting a good distance from their young. It goes without saying that if the male should return, we would all be dragon food! Ha ha!" - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
06DE036.name: Protective Broodfather

06IO012.description: Summon a Keeper of Masks now or at the next Round Start. Draw 1.
06IO012.flavorText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks
06IO012.name: Kinkou's Call

06FR030.description: Play: Summon a Frozen Thrall or advance all your Frozen Thralls 1 round.
06FR030.flavorText: The strange, whistling cry of the creature overhead was barely audible, but as it rung off the ravine's stone walls, the scouts felt it vibrate along their bones. Before their very eyes, cracks rapidly formed along the surface of the ice, disproportionate and quick.
06FR030.name: Harbinger of Thralls

06IO004.description: Play: Recall a unit with less Power than me.
06IO004.flavorText: "An extraordinary creator, The Maker. A legendary artisan! Her art, peerless! Her execution, flawless! It is a great honor to be in her presence, let alone wield an instrument of her making." - Kashuri Witness
06IO004.name: The Maker

06IO004T1.description: Recall a unit with less Power than me.
06IO004T1.flavorText: "Training is a path, and at its end lies perfection." - The Maker
06IO004T1.name: Peerless Artistry

06RU002.description:
Origin: The Virtuoso. 
Attack: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
06RU002.levelupDescription: You've played 12+ Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills.
06RU002.flavorText: "Overture: We open on the city of Qayanvi, where an old master summons a young pupil. He is tasked with disposing a group of nefarious villains and recovering stolen sacred artifacts. The actor is keen, but he does not as yet take his place. For now he simply prepares, waiting in the wings."
06RU002.name: Jhin

06RU002T1.description: Attack: Deal 4 to all Stunned enemies and the enemy Nexus.
06RU002T1.name: Jhin

06RU002T5.description:
If a Jhin started in your deck, for every 3 Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills you play while you Behold Jhin, play Lotus Trap.
You may put any follower that has a Skill into your deck during deckbuilding.
06RU002T5.flavorText: "The gun, my instrument; the bullet, my song." - Jhin
06RU002T5.name: The Virtuoso

06RU046.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Second Bounce in hand at the next Round Start.
06RU046.name: Dancing Grenade

06RU002T2.description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Second Bounce in hand at the next Round Start.
Create a Jhin in your deck.
06RU002T2.name: Jhin's Dancing Grenade

06RU002T12.description: Deal 4 to all Stunned enemies and the enemy Nexus.
06RU002T12.name: Curtain Call

06RU002T4.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If Jhin is in play, Stun the weakest enemy.
06RU002T4.name: Lotus Trap

06IO005.description: Recall a unit with 3 or less Health.
06IO005.name: Gruesome Theater

06BW036.description: I have +1|+0 for each different round you've damaged the enemy Nexus.
06BW036.flavorText: "Ain't no place bloodier in Bilgewater than the bay. Just look at them rats. Reared on blood, they are. Can't get enough o' the stuff. Creepy little scrits." - Jagged Butcher
06BW036.name: Wharf Rat

06DE045.flavorText: "No more hiding! Step into the light, and shine brightly with me!" - Lux
06DE045.name: Inspiring Light

06SI043.flavorText: Even in the Shadow Isles, old growth still finds new purpose.
06SI043.name: Undergrowth

06SH050.description: Give enemies -2|-0 this round. Create a Fleeting Instant Century in hand.
06SH050.flavorText: The sands of time flow without thought or consideration. Theirs is a scheme of cruel indifference, but not all are slave to its callous machinations...
06SH050.name: Sands of Time

06PZ027.description: Create a Fleeting Shady Character or Chempunk Shredder in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
06PZ027.flavorText: Zaun's best night life is invite-only. If you're not in the band, you've gotta really be somebody to snag a spot. Or find a ticket on the ground.
06PZ027.name: Discreet Invitation

06MT036.description: Fully heal an ally, then grow its Power equal to its Health.
06MT036.flavorText: "We must show ourselves compassion first of all. The rest will follow." - Soraka
06MT036.name: Consult the Heavens

06BW006T3.flavorText: There is no greater symbol of what lurks below. Whether it means you harm or not is irrelevant to the fear--the panic that rises in your chest. Nature supplies spectacle, but your mind supplies intent.
06BW006T3.name: Tentacle

06BW009.description: Play: A 1 cost ally starts a free attack.
06BW009.flavorText: "Recall the ocean's wisdom! If you do not move, you will be moved! Follow my voice if you've lost your way--for your foe surely knows their own."
06BW009.name: Buhru Leader

06BW007.description: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and Spawn 1.
06BW007.flavorText: When terrors swarm out from the Shadow Isles, the idol glows bright--a blazing beacon on the horizon.
06BW007.name: Watchful Idol

06BW016.flavorText: Life is sweetest in simplicity. Salt spray in your face, birdsong in your ears... and an uncomplicated foe on the horizon.
06BW016.name: Buhru Lookout

06BW035.description: Attack: Spawn 1 and give your strongest Tentacle Overwhelm this round.
06BW035.flavorText: Summoning Nagakabouros involves little in the way of ritual or rite. She answers the call of those whose soul can rise to match the ocean's, every swell, every thrash. It is a battle few can withstand.
06BW035.name: The Sea's Voice

06BW015.description: Spawn 2, or spend 5 mana to Spawn 4 instead.
06BW015.flavorText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.
06BW015.name: Answered Prayer

06BW015T5.flavorText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.
06BW015T5.name: Answered Prayer

06BW006.description: Attack: Spawn 1, then I gain Power equal to your strongest Tentacle's Power this round.
06BW006.levelupDescription: I've seen Tentacles or I deal 15+ damage.
06BW006.flavorText: The "Eye of Nagakabouros" is merely a name, but Illaoi takes it as a challenge to live as if her god is a constant--and easily-bored--companion.
06BW006.name: Illaoi

06BW006T1.description:
When you Spawn, increase its value by 1.
Attack: Spawn 1, then fully heal your strongest Tentacle and I gain stats equal to its stats this round.
06BW006T1.flavorText: A life lesson: If ever you have the chance to leap from the rigging of a fine ship and crash like thunderous repentance upon your foes, do so. It is most invigorating.
06BW006T1.name: Illaoi

06BW006T2.description:
Spawn 2, then your strongest Tentacle and an enemy strike each other.
Create an Illaoi in your deck.
06BW006T2.flavorText: "Life is a test. And pain is the teacher more often than we might like." - Illaoi
06BW006T2.name: Illaoi's Tentacle Smash

06BW028.description: Spawn 2, then your strongest Tentacle and an enemy strike each other.
06BW028.flavorText: "Life is a test. And pain is the teacher more often than we might like." - Illaoi
06BW028.name: Tentacle Smash

06BW030.flavorText: Nagakabouros is a god of providence--provided one survives the act of worship.
06BW030.name: Eye of Nagakabouros

06BW011.description: Round Start: Spawn 2. Then, if your strongest Tentacle has 12+ Power, create a Nagakabouros' Tantrum in hand.
06BW011.flavorText: "The Mother Serpent. The Great Kraken. The Bearded Lady. Nagakabouros cares little for names, and less for the restless dead." - Illaoi
06BW011.name: Nagakabouros

06BW011T2.description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
06BW011T2.flavorText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess
06BW011T2.name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle

06BW011T1.description: Nagakabouros starts a free attack with 4 Nagakabouros' Tentacle.
06BW011T1.flavorText: It is a common Buhru story that the land was once whole, and Nagakabouros shattered it into islands to provide greater challenge for navigators. It's a story, of course. Nagakabouros didn't shatter the land. Nobody questions, however, whether she could if she felt like it.
06BW011T1.name: Nagakabouros' Tantrum

06PZ043.description: Create a Fleeting Aftershock, Hextech Transmogulator, or Progress Day! in hand.
06PZ043.flavorText: "You won't find a finer set of pieces anywhere in the world, good sir. My daughter put her heart into every last detail." - Corin Reveck
06PZ043.name: Piltovan Tellstones

06SI037.description: Create a Fleeting Mark of the Isles, Spirit Journey, or Crumble in hand.
06SI037.flavorText: "Polished... decorations. Tokens... learn rules. Curious game. Breathtaking... unparalleled craftsmanship... unforgettable." - Recovered journal
06SI037.name: Shadow Isles Tellstones

06BW043.description: Create a Fleeting More Powder!, Playful Trickster, or Chum the Waters in hand.
06BW043.flavorText: "Don't try to catch someone bluffin' in a match of 'stones. Bilgewater's full of good liars. If you really wanna win, you gotta watch the hands." - Twisted Fate
06BW043.name: Bilgewater Tellstones

06BC040.description: Create a Fleeting Heroic Refrain, Yordle Contraption, or Keeper's Verdict in hand.
06BC040.flavorText: Yordles are always down for a game... but don't be surprised if the rules change in the middle of one!
06BC040.name: Bandle Tellstones

06IO036.description: Create a Fleeting Health Potion, Homecoming, or Stand United in hand.
06IO036.flavorText: "Learning to read your opponent is an essential skill, even outside of a fight. But most importantly, the purpose of a game is to have fun. Now, fetch me my footbath!" - Inspiring Mentor
06IO036.name: Ionian Tellstones

06DE042.description: Create a Fleeting Prismatic Barrier, Detain, or For Demacia! in hand.
06DE042.flavorText: "Why do they call it 'King's Gambit'? Queens take risks, too!" - Cithria of Cloudfield
06DE042.name: Demacian Tellstones

06MT043.description: Create a Fleeting Wish, Paddle Star, or Blessing of Targon in hand.
06MT043.flavorText: "It's the strangest thing, Shorin... Even without turning the stone over, I know exactly what constellation is painted on it." - Tyari the Traveler
06MT043.name: Targonian Tellstones

06NX037.description: Create a Fleeting Sharpened Resolve, Whirling Death, or Weapons of the Lost in hand.
06NX037.flavorText: "Clara darling, you have to clean the blood from the tokens." - Ophelia Noradi, Crimson Aristocrat
06NX037.name: Noxian Tellstones

06SH042.description: Create a Fleeting Ruthless Predator, Weight of Judgment, or Spirit Fire in hand.
06SH042.flavorText: "A game of Tellstones is never about who wins--it's about how great you look while playing!" - Akshan
06SH042.name: Shuriman Tellstones

06RU001T3.description: Grant a random ally in hand +1|+1.
06RU001T3.flavorText: On still windless nights, cast your eyes to the heavens and listen for the soft symphony of tinkling chimes. In that moment you will know that He is watching.
06RU001T3.name: Chime

06BC026.description: When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
06BC026.flavorText: "..second time was the big 'un. I was sweepin' the floors, when all a sudden I spot me dinner spilt on the table and me pots 'n' pans waddlin' on two legs, hurryin’ out the door! I followed fast as these knees’d go, and I found ‘em at that temple, rummagin’ through the shelves like they was lookin’ for somethin’.” - Old Gaff’s tale, part 2
06BC026.name: Byrd, The Bellringer

06MT029.description:
When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
06MT029.flavorText:
"...but I heard Esmus was created by the Caretaker himself, and with her birth, sound came to the world!"
"I say lies! It is known that Esmus bears the face of an old singer who had the heart of an angel but the voice of the dead... until Bard himself granted her a voice of pure beauty!"
"I say lies! Esmus is..."
- An instance of the Birth of Esmus, a popular bard's game
06MT029.name: Esmus, Breath of the World

06MT047.description: When I'm summoned or when I count down, plant 3 Chimes on random cards in your deck. Countdown 2: Draw 1.
06MT047.flavorText: "Then I seen it--thousands of 'em, all singin' and dancin' this way and that-un. Next thing I know, I seen a flash o' light, and they’re all gone, the temple with 'em–not a stone to see. And in me hands? Well Old Gaff was left there holdin' a chime." - Old Gaff’s tale, part 3
06MT047.name: Mystic Vortex

06BC030.description: Deal 1 to a unit. If one of your traps or boons activated this round, deal 3 to it instead.
06BC030.flavorText: "If it starts to glow, it's gonna blow!" - Bandle Scout rule number 463
06BC030.name: Proximity Puffcap

06RU001.description:
Origin: The Wandering Caretaker.
Attack: Plant 3 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
06RU001.levelupDescription: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by 20+.
06RU001.flavorText: "Aye, Old Gaff's seen his share o' strange! First time was the Caretaker 'imself, I reckon. Like a star streamin' 'cross the sky, he was. Felt like the whole world stopped a minute, and it was just me 'n' him…" - Old Gaff’s tale, part 1
06RU001.name: Bard

06RU001T4.description:
Attack: Plant 6 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
When you activate a Chime, grant +1|+1 to a random ally in play.
06RU001T4.flavorText:
"Sound the horn for the young and old
Sound it loud for all to behold. 
Kings bow down and sing their praise
To The Caretaker and his curious ways." - Runeterran Ballad
06RU001T4.name: Bard

06RU001T9.description:
You may put any cards that plant Chimes into your deck during deckbuilding. 
Round Start: If you have 3+ mana gems, plant a Chime in your deck for each Bard that started the game in your deck.
06RU001T9.flavorText: A mysterious traveler from beyond the cosmos, Bard is a being of harmony and balance, whose ear is attuned to the symphony of creation and the discord within. Surrounded by a choir of peculiar creatures, known as meeps, the Wandering Caretaker's curious works are celebrated in songs and stories across Runeterra.
06RU001T9.name: The Wandering Caretaker

06RU001T8.description:
Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Bard in your deck.
06RU001T8.flavorText: Songs tell of Bard hiding chimes amongst the towns of Runeterra, said to raise spirits and inspire spontaneous bouts of joyful dance.
06RU001T8.name: Bard's Traveler's Call

06RU045.description: Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
06RU045.flavorText: Songs tell of Bard hiding chimes amongst the towns of Runeterra, said to raise spirits and inspire spontaneous bouts of joyful dance.
06RU045.name: Traveler's Call

06BC031.description: When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck, then double the boons in your deck.
06BC031.flavorText:
"Gave me a right fright, it did. Arms sproutin' all over. Teeth big as boulders. Oh, and when that creature ran that mallet 'cross its teeth, made a song so eerie, thought I'd die. Ran for my life, I did. But not before I seen it... holes in the sky! Musta been hundreds of 'em!"
- Old Gaff’s tale, part 4
06BC031.name: Maduli, The Gatekeeper

06BC044.description: Deal 2 to an enemy and Stun another. Plant 6 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
06BC044.flavorText:
"Mama, where does the Caretaker go?"
"He goes everywhere, love. As far as the eye can reach."
"Why?"
"Ah, my sweet. Do not think on why. Not even our wisest elders can understand the Caretaker's ways..."
- A mother and child
06BC044.name: Cosmic Binding

06SI033.description: Countdown 2: Revive the strongest dead ally.
06SI033.flavorText: The sound of sword on shield was like a death knell, and it drew forth spirits whose tethers to the world had not quite been cut, whose will could not be quelled even in death.
06SI033.name: Haunted Tomb
