06SH037.description: When an enemy is Challenged, give it -2|-0 this round.
06SH037.flavorText: Their sanity withered away like dunes in the wind--and in its place, a seed of anger flourished into a fury no desert waters could quench.
06SH037.name: Baccai Witherclaw

06IO009.description: Start a free attack with 2 Dragonlings.
06IO009.name: Dragon Ambush

06MT039.flavorText: "It is said the celestial dragons are born from the nebulae themselves, springing forth fully formed from hazy cosmic dust. But how would we mere mortals know? From far away, all we see is their light." - Herald of Dragons
06MT039.name: Dragon Roost

06MT045.description: Invoke a low, medium, and high cost Celestial card.
06MT045.flavorText: "The stars, they are foretelling great potential. Something is coming. What shape will they take? It is not for me to know! What do you think, Kulun?" - Moondreamer
06MT045.name: Celestial Trifecta

06FR038.description:
Deal 3 to ALL units.
Enlightened: Heal your Nexus 3.
06FR038.flavorText: In the shadow of the great Cryophoenix's wings, her followers rejoiced, and her enemies shuddered.
06FR038.name: Wings of the Cryophoenix

06NX033.description: Stun 2 enemies or spend 6 mana to summon a Legion General.
06NX033.flavorText: Assignment is one of the first great decisions that lies before every battle. A good commander knows that the key to victory...
06NX033.name: Strategic Execution

06NX015.description: Each round, the first time you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, I play Magic Embers.
06NX015.flavorText: "First time I met Daani must've been a couple years ago. Lovely lad. Lovely family, too. Then, on my last trip, I stopped by his village and found poor Daani sat in the square, alone. Said he was waiting for his family to come home. Poor lad must've been sat there months. Didn't have the heart to tell him what I'd seen down the way..." - Fynn Retrick
06NX015.name: Manasoul Student

06NX015T1.flavorText: "Whoa... I can SEE the magic!" - Manasoul Student
06NX015T1.name: Magic Embers

06NX013.description: Play: Stun an enemy or if it's already Stunned deal 2 to it instead.
06NX013.flavorText:
"Student: Sydell Kythera
Teacher: J. Willough
Report: I am spiderbit on left forearm. Sydell claims a misunderstanding, but his smirk belies his innocence. He is ordered to two weeks additional chores (refectory)."
- Ravenbloom discipline card
06NX013.name: Spell Slinger

06NX013T1.description: Stun an enemy or if it's already Stunned deal 2 to it instead.
06NX013T1.name: Stiffened Sinews

06NX008.description: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, grant me +1|+0.
06NX008.flavorText: "Many of the children are of an age where their natural inclinations lead them to rebel against formal direction. Fortunate, then, that the eldest of them is both favored by the rest, and malleable to our cause. If the students choose to ignore our lessons, then we will teach through her." - Headmistress Telsi
06NX008.name: The Prefect

06NX012.description: Attack: I deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
06NX012.levelupDescription: I've seen you play 6+ Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills. When I level up, create Tibbers in hand.
06NX012.flavorText: Over a decade ago, Amoline Kiosar fled the Ravenbloom Conservatory with an invaluable and incandescent asset in her control. Ravenbloom's scouts searched for her in every corner of the empire, but none of the rumors they heard led them to Amoline. And so, years later, when news arrived of a lost girl burning with rage in the northern Ironspike Mountains, Fynn Retrick reluctantly gathered his things and left to investigate. He expected to find nothing. How wrong he was.
06NX012.name: Annie

06NX012T7.description: Attack: I deal 3 to my blocker and Stun it. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
06NX012T7.flavorText:
"I've found her. She's Amoline's, no doubt. Same eyes, same giggle. I'll bring her back within the fortnight. Having spoken to the girl, I ask that you be kind to her. I believe there's good in there, along with the dark."
- Excerpt of a letter from Fynn Retrick
06NX012T7.name: Annie

06NX012T6.description: Deal 2 to Annie's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
06NX012T6.name: Molten Shield

06NX012T8.description: Deal 3 and Stun Annie's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
06NX012T8.name: Molten Shield

06NX012T1.description: Play: Stun an enemy, then deal 2 to all Stunned or damaged enemies.
06NX012T1.flavorText: The demon Tybaulk had infested the minds of countless victims over the centuries. Slowly, inexorably, he would lead them to the fire, and watch his flames feast on scorched flesh. But in young Annie, Tybaulk found a will completely indomitable, and a talent for magic that rivaled even his own.
06NX012T1.name: Tibbers

06NX012T5.description: Stun an enemy, then deal 2 to all Stunned or damaged enemies.
06NX012T5.name: Pyroclastic Arrival

06NX012T3.description:
Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
Create an Annie in your deck.
06NX012T3.flavorText: Headmistress Telsi spoke at length about the Noxian tenets, leaving the children before her increasingly bored and restless. But, while most students largely contained their outbursts, Annie acted. First with smoke, then with fire.
06NX012T3.name: Annie's Disintegrate

06NX014.description: Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
06NX014.flavorText: Headmistress Telsi spoke at length about the Noxian tenets, leaving the children before her increasingly bored and restless. But, while most students largely contained their outbursts, Annie acted. First with smoke, then with fire.
06NX014.name: Disintegrate

06NX028.description:
Countdown 12: Create a Tybaulk in hand.
I advance 1 round for each Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill you've played this game.
06NX028.flavorText:
"...by now, word has no doubt reached you of the Roseguard Academy's dismal failure. I expect you will learn from your sister school's failings. I expect you will manage your facility in a manner that benefits the empire."
- A scorched letter found in the conservatory's rubble
06NX028.name: Ravenbloom Conservatory

06NX028T1.description: When I'm summoned, grant allies everywhere +1|+0 and for the rest of the game, all of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
06NX028T1.flavorText:
"...it burns in me. This dark presence. It whispers to me. Fire. FIRE. In the flames, I see its eyes. Black and unblinking. Staring. Smiling. Urging me to step in. Urging me to join the rest. Silhouettes in the inferno. Reaching out. Come home. Come home."
- Remains of a decrepit Nockmirchian diary
06NX028T1.name: Tybaulk

06DE035.flavorText: Mageseekers place towering petricite obelisks throughout their compounds, ensuring that even the strongest mages are rendered completely powerless.
06DE035.name: Petricite Pillar

06NX032.description: When an ally attacks, I attack with it.
06NX032.flavorText: "Drakehounds are a delight, aren't they? So eager to please. So malleable. If only my enemies held the same qualities." - Thorn of the Rose
06NX032.name: Obedient Drakehound

06BC036.description:
When I'm summoned, create a random Yordle in hand.
Attack: Grant other allied Yordles +1|+0.
06BC036.flavorText: "EVERYONE loves Paparo! Every summer, he brings us trinkets from all across the world, and they're always either tasty, pretty, or topsy-turvy! Sometimes, all three!" - Ava Achiever
06BC036.name: Paparo the Great

06NX029.description: When an ally with 5+ Power dies, create a random follower with 5+ Power in hand.
06NX029.flavorText:
"Today I found myself thinking back to my small infirmary in Penrose Hill, and the years I spent there trying to unlock the secrets of physiology. Years! I've now been in Lady Noradi's employ for just a few short months, but I know now that I learned nothing. How simple I was. How fortunate."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
06NX029.name: The Gray Apothecary

06SH009.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Second Skin in hand.
06SH009.flavorText: Just a few days prior, Kai'Sa noticed her second skin bristling with new excitement, pulling her with ever-increasing vigor toward the Shuriman coast. Something was wrong, and as Kai'Sa neared Belveth, she soon realized the scale of the horror unfolding before her.
06SH009.name: Kai'Sa

06SH009T2.description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Second Skin in hand.
Attack: Deal 1 for each positive keyword I have to enemies or the enemy Nexus (lowest health first).
06SH009T2.flavorText: Kai'Sa worked as fast as she could. Another salvo tore through another abomination, sending it crashing to the ground. She had learned how to fight the Void long ago, but these creatures... they were different.
06SH009T2.name: Kai'Sa

06SH009T3.description: Grant allied Kai'Sas everywhere another ally's positive keywords.
06SH009T3.name: Second Skin

06SH009T1.description:
Grant an ally Overwhelm and SpellShield.
Create a Kai'Sa in your deck.
06SH009T1.flavorText: "I'll show you how to fight." - Kai'Sa
06SH009T1.name: Kai'Sa's Supercharge

06SH011.description: Grant an ally Overwhelm and SpellShield.
06SH011.flavorText: "I'll show you how to fight." - Kai'Sa
06SH011.name: Supercharge

06SH009T4.description: Deal 1 for each positive keyword Kai'Sa has to enemies or the enemy Nexus  (lowest health first).
06SH009T4.name: Icathian Rain

06SH007.description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
06SH007.flavorText: Dharna remembered throwing open the windows that morning and smelling the freshly baked loaves. Down the way, fishermen had already began hauling the day's catch up to the noon markets. She remembered smiling, thinking it would be a fine day.
06SH007.name: Voidling

06SH010.flavorText: The Void eruption in the city of Belveth was both sudden and terrifying. Most of the civilians were terrified by the chaos that quickly enveloped the city, and fled for safety as fast as they were able. Most, but not Koyemi.
06SH010.name: Void Blaster

06SH014.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me all positive keywords allies have had this game.
When I see an ally with a new positive keyword, grant it to me.
06SH014.flavorText: "We had heard tales of Void breaches before, and the devastation that came with them. But to see it myself... I don't know that I will ever rid my eyes of that sight, or my heart of that horror." - Belveth survivor
06SH014.name: Void Abomination

06SH008.flavorText: Shalatai reeled at the horror before her. There lay Ferai, the kind butcher's daughter, crushed to death. Beside her was Gorrub, the fisherman's son, still reaching toward his love with lifeless hands. So many memories gone. So many lives lost. With a grimace, Shalatai turned to the evil, ready to give her life to save the rest of her people.
06SH008.name: Belvethi Elder

06SH016.description: Play: Grant a unit and me each other's positive keywords.
06SH016.flavorText: "It spoke to me as... as if it knew me. Like it wanted me to meet... something..." - Kai'Sa
06SH016.name: Hive Herald

06SH017.description: Deal 1 to a follower. If you've Evolved, deal  3 instead.
06SH017.name: Void Seeker

06FR039.description: Transform an allied follower into an Alpha Wildclaw.
06FR039.flavorText: "Great wildclaw spirit, grant us your power!" - Udyr
06FR039.name: Wildclaw's Ferocity

06NX040.description: Each round, the first time an ally with 5+ Power attacks, Rally.
06NX040.flavorText: "At my command, you will fight! If you kill your sparring partner, find another! If you fall, then die knowing your death made Noxus stronger! Trifarian soldiers... begin!" - Trifarian Assessor
06NX040.name: Trifarian Training Pits

06DE038.description: Other allies and your Nexus have Tough.
06DE038.flavorText: "I couldn't help but overhear your fervent whispering, dear wife. I advise you to exercise more caution when discussing family matters in so public a place. You can never be certain who might be listening."
06DE038.name: Lord Eldred, Mageseeker Leader

06IO010.description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Yasuo and Stun the strongest enemy.
When you gain the attack token, Stun the strongest enemy.
06IO010.flavorText: For most, peace is a happy home and the warm quiet found in a loved one's hold. For Yasuo, it is that rare moment when the winds calm and offer promise instead of remembrance.
06IO010.name: Windswept Hillock

06MT041.description: My Fated buffs are granted to allied Starhound Packs everywhere.
06MT041.flavorText: The starhounds could not be beckoned or persuaded by climbers on their journey. They were aloof, seemingly inured to the mountain's magics.
06MT041.name: Starhound Pack

06RU025T8.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T8.flavorText: "Look at you. You are a pathetic, useless worm." - Domination
06RU025T8.name: Warded Husk

06FR029.description:
Frostbite an enemy.
Summon a Rimefang Pack. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you've Frostbitten enemies this game.
06FR029.flavorText: With the cold, so too come the rimefangs, and they don't have to outpace their prey... merely outwait them.
06FR029.name: Frozen in Fear

06FR037.description: Grant an enemy "Frostbite me at the next Round Start."
06FR037.flavorText: One must always test the ice before stepping onto it, no matter how thick it may look.
06FR037.name: Cracking Ice

06NX031.flavorText: The crowd gasped as the two shackled yetis were brought into the Bordent's legendary fighting pit. No one thought the beasts strong enough to break their chains, because none of them had ever faced a yeti's might before.
06NX031.name: Captive Yeti

06MT044.flavorText: Stellacorns are born of stars, with some burning hotter than others.
06MT044.name: Solari Stellacorn

06RU025T1.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T1.name: Desperate Husk

06RU025T2.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T2.flavorText: "Flesh. Bone. Screams. I want it all." - Vora
06RU025T2.name: Stubborn Husk

06RU025T9.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T9.flavorText: "I wore you out? Already? Shame." - Evelynn
06RU025T9.name: Enraged Husk

06DE037.description: Give an ally +2|+2 and Challenger this round or summon an Honored Lord.
06DE037.flavorText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord
06DE037.name: Royal Decree

06IO038.description: Costs 2 less if you have supported an ally this game.Give an ally Barrier this round.
06IO038.flavorText: "Trust the balance. Walk the divide." - Shen
06IO038.name: Moral Support

06IO035.description: When another ally gets Barrier, give me Barrier this round if I don't have it.
06IO035.flavorText: "Embrace the Balance on every level. Mind, body, spirit. Resist the impetuous urges of youth. Elevate your perspective." - Shen
06IO035.name: Kinkou Student

06PZ038.description: Grant an ally Elusive and "Nexus Strike: Draw 1."
06PZ038.flavorText: "You guys won't BELIEVE what I found today!" - Sumpsnipe Scavenger
06PZ038.name: Scavenged Camocloaker

06MT049.description: Grant an ally +1|+2 and remove all negative keywords from it.
06MT049.flavorText: Those that hear the bell ring are struck by the purity of its tone.
06MT049.name: Mikhael's Blessing

06RU025T11.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T11.flavorText: "Told you it'd be a good time. Didn't say whose." - Sultur
06RU025T11.name: Hardy Husk

06RU025T12.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T12.name: Fading Husk

06SI012.description: Attack: When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so do I. Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
06SI012.flavorText: Gwen snip-snip-snipped her way through the Black Mist, thinking it strange how completely it enveloped the area, and once she had, the enchanted manse stood out amongst the bleak woods like a beacon. Little wonder Gwen was drawn to it. How curious it was--but also, how grand!
06SI012.name: Gwen

06SI012T1.description: Attack:  When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so do I. Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 Power I have.
06SI012T1.flavorText: She knew that the Black Mist must be driven back from wherever it had spread to, and the joy and light these spirits lent her efforts cut through it readily. If she could help their celebration in the meantime, all the better!
06SI012T1.name: Gwen

06SI012T5.description: Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 power Gwen has. (max 50 times)
06SI012T5.name: Snip Snip Snip!

06SI012T2.description:
Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
Create a Gwen in your deck.
06SI012T2.name: Gwen's Thread the Needle

06SI027.description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
06SI027.name: Thread the Needle

06SI016.flavorText:
"We CORDIALLY INVITE you to the party of a lifetime at THE MIDNIGHT REVEL. Join us in celebration at PORCELAIN MANSE for drink, dance, and delight! (Celebrations to end promptly at the 13th hour)" 
- An invitation written in elegant cursive
06SI016.name: Boisterous Host

06SI013.description: Attack: Revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the  strongest dead ally other than Eternal Dancers with my power or less.
06SI013.flavorText: It's always easier to join someone on the dance floor than be the first person on it. The twins, however, are always delighted to show others how it's done.
06SI013.name: Eternal Dancers

06SI022.flavorText: Whether he was a ghost, a memory, or a dream, something about him was familiar...
06SI022.name: Ghostly Paramour

06SI026.description: Last Breath: Create a Ghastly Band in hand.
06SI026.flavorText: "Play on, my friends! We will have a livelier concert than ever before!"
06SI026.name: Conductor Of The Mists

06SI015.flavorText: "Keep it lively! Double-time!" - Conductor of the Mists
06SI015.name: Strike Up The Band

06SI009.flavorText: Their repertoire was impressive, from minuets and waltzes to ballads and folk songs, but truth be told, the party's guests were dying for something new.
06SI009.name: Ghastly Band

06SI028.flavorText: What would a fancy party be without fancy refreshments?
06SI028.name: Phantom Butler

06SI030.description: Create copies in hand of 2 allied followers that have died this game.
06SI030.flavorText: "Here we are, dear. I hear tonight will be quite a splendid affair, and I suspect we'll see many familiar faces!" - Ghostly Reveler
06SI030.name: Formal Invitation

06RU025T7.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T7.name: Haunted Husk

06SH048.description: Manifest an allied landmark that has been destroyed this game and summon it.
06SH048.name: Rite of Passage

06BC039.description: Deal 2 to a unit and summon a Scrappy Bomb.
06BC039.flavorText: "Well, that's not good," Giselle said quietly, ducking behind cover.
06BC039.name: Drop the Bomb

06BC035.description: When an ally with an attachment attacks, grant that ally +1|+0.
06BC035.flavorText: The leaves of the papertree shimmer with the same fae magic that created the tree itself. And, just like the birds that inspired their form, they find the allure of shiny things impossible to resist.
06BC035.name: The Papertree

06BW021.description:
Deal 4 to an enemy unit.
Spawn 3.
Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
06BW021.flavorText: "We learn as children to ride the dangerous waters. To struggle is to die. It is natural that the first trial a priestess must overcome is forgetting this lesson; to battle the undertow with all her might. For a Truth Bearer is not the swimmer--she is the current." - Illaoi
06BW021.name: Riptide Sermon

06RU025T3.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T3.flavorText: "Oh, the look on your face!" - Solitude
06RU025T3.name: Scattered Husk

06RU025T10.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T10.name: Thrashing Husk

06PZ042.description: Play: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck and reduce their costs by 1.
06PZ042.flavorText:
"Well, all I'm gonna say about today is that things could have gone better. Gonna leave it at that. Future me... you know what we did."
- Kay's diary
06PZ042.name: Evil Imperfectionist

06PZ039.description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Create that many followers from your regions that cost 1 more and reduce their costs by 1.
06PZ039.flavorText: Down in the depths of Zaun, the locals are forced to turn the scraps and the dregs they salvage into workable material. After decades of practice, they've become rather good at it.
06PZ039.name: Salvaged Scrap

06BW037.description: Manifest a follower you can afford.
06BW037.flavorText:
"Alright, Baz. You sure you wanna try again?"
"Third time's a charm, Gav. Besides, I reckon we've fought everything this stinkin' city's got goin' for it."
"Fought, and lost, Baz." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
06BW037.name: Ransom Riches

06BW041.description: Manifest a non-champion card from the opponent's hand. Plunder: I cost 1 less.
06BW041.flavorText: "FIVE aces? Looks like I win again!" - Pool Shark
06BW041.name: Swindle

06SH049.description:
Costs 2 less for each different Ascended ally you've played this game.
Manifest a card from the Emperor's Deck with cost 9 or less.
06SH049.flavorText: “Look upon our work--look what we have built!” - Azir
06SH049.name: Glory's Call

06BC045.description: Give allies +1|+1 this round. If they're created, give them +2|+2 instead.
06BC045.flavorText: "HELLO. I MUSHROOM I TALKING I DON'T KNOW WHY OR HOW OR WHAT IS HAPPEN PLEASE LET ME BE MUSHROOM. PLEASE. THANK. BYE." - Mushroom
06BC045.name: Sneezy Biggledust!

06RU025T4.description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
06RU025T4.flavorText: "Look me in the eye. Tell me I hurt you." - Solitude
06RU025T4.name: Breakneck Husk

06RU025.description:
Origin: Agony's Embrace.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
06RU025.levelupDescription: When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
06RU025.flavorText: The priestess' pupils were blown wide, and her hand trembled with nervous excitement. She was ready. This was the single moment Evelynn craved more than any other. She grinned, and slowly shed her visage. Then, as always, the screaming began.
06RU025.name: Evelynn

06RU025T5.description:
When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round.
Round End: Summon a random Husk. If fewer than 6 allies have died this game, transform me back into Evelynn.
06RU025T5.flavorText: As Evelynn stalked Runeterra, she attracted the attentions of lesser demons, each hoping to destroy the Widowmaker and feast on her power. She butchered most, of course, but a few talented individuals caught her eye. Today, they live on, bound to their mistress, and when the mood strikes, Evelynn lets them out to play.
06RU025T5.name: Evelynn

06RU025T14.description: You may put any cards that summon Husks into your deck during deckbuilding.
06RU025T14.name: Agony's Embrace

06RU025T6.description:
Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting Evelynn and she strikes an enemy.
Create an Evelynn in your deck.
06RU025T6.name: Evelynn's Last Caress

06RU044.description: Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting Evelynn and she strikes an enemy.
06RU044.name: Last Caress

06SI019.description: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
06SI019.flavorText:
"Beware those who smile on these haunted isles. Perhaps they are too newly arrived to understand the brutality of this place. Perhaps they are crazed. Perhaps they are something else entirely. But beware."
- Notes from Jens Tommen
06SI019.name: Sultur

06SI018.description: When I'm summoned,  summon a random Husk.
06SI018.flavorText: Unlike other demons, who lure their victims in with false pretenses, Vora is too single-minded in her craving, too overwhelmed by desire. Rather than a predator who stalks her food, she is a wild beast who must be fed.
06SI018.name: Vora

06BW018.description: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
06BW018.flavorText: Evelynn's first encounter with Steem was a violent, thrilling affair. Evelynn remembered how he smiled with unbridled pleasure as she flayed him, and how he returned the suffering just as eagerly when it was his turn. After finally overpowering Steem, Evelynn chose then not to destroy the lesser demon, but to bind him to her forever. Perhaps, she thought, they could share their mutual love for butchery with the world.
06BW018.name: Steem

06PZ025.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it a random keyword.
06PZ025.flavorText:
"On my walk home from the Entresol, I saw again that poor vagabond sobbing in a small alleyway. That so many veer around her so pointedly breaks my heart as much as her own palpable dismay. So, tomorrow, should we cross paths again, I will endeavor to help her in any way I can."
- Notes from Lady Sempescu's diary
06PZ025.name: Solitude

06SH034.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +1|+0.
06SH034.flavorText: Sometimes, all the powerful want is to feel powerless.
06SH034.name: Domination

06SI020.description: Kill an ally to deal 2 to a unit and summon a random Husk.
06SI020.flavorText: "Be as loud as you like." - Evelynn
06SI020.name: Hate Spike

06DE030.description: Summon a random Husk and grant it +1|+0.
06DE030.name: Allure

06RU005.description:
Origin: The Shadow Reaper.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
06RU005.levelupDescription: I've struck twice . When I level up, Recall me.
06RU005.flavorText: As another body fell, Kayn let out a gleeful laugh, knowing that he would soon unleash the second Darkin weapon that lay below. Within him, Rhaast's anticipation grew, knowing that Kayn’s undoing was finally near.
06RU005.name: Kayn

06RU005T6.description: You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you have summoned 3+ Cultist units, draw a Kayn.
06RU005T6.flavorText: Only two outcomes are possible: either Kayn bends Rhaast to his will, or he is consumed by it.
06RU005T6.name: The Shadow Reaper

06RU005T8.description: Play: Transform me and all copies of me into Rhaast or The Shadow Assassin.
06RU005T8.flavorText: A fierce and sudden flash of anger overwhelmed Kayn, and a terrible, searing pain passed behind his eyes, bringing him to his knees. Rhaast’s triumphant laughter echoed all around him, mocking and merciless. He had known this day would come--the day he would finally prevail or lose himself to the Darkin...
06RU005T8.name: Kayn

06RU005T1.flavorText: Tremendous power flowed through his veins. Freed from the Darkin’s influence, the full power of the shadows was his to command. Kayn laughed, slipping into darkness, and emerged a moment later only to silently slit the throat of the guard before him.
06RU005T1.name: The Shadow Assassin

06RU005T10.flavorText: Kayn’s anger grew into a fearsome blaze amidst Rhaast's furious screams. The Darkin's hold on the shadow warrior burned away, and when Kayn rose to his feet, he knew the full power of the Darkin was his to command.
06RU005T10.name: Shadow Scythe

06RU005T2.description:
Auto-Equip: Corrupted Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, fully heal me and heal your Nexus 2.
06RU005T2.flavorText: Rhaast let out a triumphant howl. Years of waiting, yearning, and now... he was finally free. He lifted Xolaani’s blades and put them to his tongue, savoring the taste of fresh blood. He closed his eyes in bliss, and a smile crept across his face for the first time in millennia. The reaping had begun.
06RU005T2.name: Rhaast

06RU005T11.flavorText: As Kayn yielded his spirit to the Darkin, his anger subsided and an unbearable emptiness was left in its place. The young warrior was gone. Only Rhaast remained.
06RU005T11.name: Corrupted Scythe

06RU005T4.description:
Give Kayn Quick Attack this round. He starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Kayn in your deck.
06RU005T4.name: Kayn's Shadowstep

06BW023.flavorText:
"Like the saying goes, nothin' ends a Bilgewater quarrel faster than a cutlass."
"Except maybe a pistol."
"Shut up, Baz."
- Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
06BW023.name: Jagged Cutlass

06NX026.flavorText: Vessid isn't the Bordent's fastest Reckoner, but when his great hammers find their target, there's never much of an opponent left to fight back.
06NX026.name: Great Hammers

06SH032.description: Countdown 2: Create a Treasure of the Sands in hand.
06SH032.flavorText:
"Why must you touch everything?"
"What, you think it's booby-trapped? You think some boulder's just gonna come rollin' outta–"
"RUNNN!"
- Argus and Silvio, tomb robbers
06SH032.name: Buried Armory

06SH031.flavorText:
"Put those down, Silvio!"
"Why? It ain't like the poor bugger's coming back for 'em!"
"Some things should stay buried." 
- Argus and Silvio, tomb robbers
06SH031.name: Treasure of the Sands

06MT033.flavorText: Many call upon the might of dragons, though it manifests differently across Runeterra. Those that invoke the power of a celestial dragon may discover they possess an inner strength that burns as bright and hot as a star.
06MT033.name: Draconic Bands

06SH040.description: Once you have equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less. Revive the Strongest dead allied champion.
06SH040.flavorText:
“You’ll never die, because I’ll never let you.”
- Xolaani
06SH040.name: Heedless Resurrection

06SH005.description: Play: Predict. If you pick a Darkin or an equipment, grant me +1|+1.
06SH005.flavorText: In his hand he clutched a braided belt, a gift from his friend Rhaast before their Ascension ceremony - but even as he revered the Darkin’s power, he harbored a secret resentment in his beastly heart.
06SH005.name: Forsaken Baccai

06DE010.description: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, grant me Scout.
06DE010.flavorText: Years of suppressing her magical abilities bred within her a fathomless self-hatred she maliciously unleashed on her victims. Once she had defected from the ranger-knights, her anger was aimless until a voice called in the darkness. It spoke of a new order, one where she could practice her cruelty unfettered.
06DE010.name: Ranger-Knight Defector

06DE040.description: Pick a follower or equipment from the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw it, place the rest into your deck.
06DE040.flavorText: Soft, enticing whispers plant desire deep within the heart. Like a splinter, this festers and grows into hunger. Hunger gives way to transgression, which in turn brings death. And so the cycle continues.
06DE040.name: Tempting Prospect

06IO034.description: Give an ally +1|+0 or +0|+1 this round. If you have Equipped an ally this game, play a copy of me on the same target.
06IO034.flavorText: Angry tears streamed down Jun’s face as she surveyed the bodies littering the ground. She had failed them. She had failed her master. And now, only one choice remained…
06IO034.name: Momentous Choice

06NX020.description:
When I'm Equipped, deal 1 to your nexus. 
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Naganeka of Zuretta.
06NX020.flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
06NX020.name: The Darkin Ballista

06NX020T1.description: Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
06NX020T1.flavorText: Ancient muscles flexed once more. The warrior heard her general's call, and knew where she was needed--south, in the lands she once known as Icathia.
06NX020T1.name: Naganeka of Zuretta

06NX034.description: An Equipped ally strikes an enemy.
06NX034.flavorText: "Brothers in blood, once again!" - Noxian Defector
06NX034.name: Furious Wielder

06IO025.description: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
06IO025.flavorText: In the darkness, he'd seen it - a weapon to cut through the shadows. And in that moment, he heard a voice call to him, distant but powerful. He followed it to Kayn, the truth of its words guiding him.
06IO025.name: Shadowblade Fanatic

06IO030.description:
When I'm summoned, draw an equipment.
The first time each round an unequipped ally is Equipped, refill 1 spell mana and grant them +1|+0.
06IO030.flavorText:
"Mistfall is sacred ground. The swords at the site have been here for centuries... and it is my belief that any blade left here with a poem on its hilt will invite the spirits of lost wielders to imbue it with their blessing."
- Disciple of Doran, handwritten scroll
06IO030.name: Mistfall

06NX019.description: Attack: Grow my Power to that of the strongest equipped ally this round.
06NX019.flavorText:
“Been having dreams again, hearing that voice in the dark. Ten years... a whole bloody decade spent as the empire's obedient dog. Go there. Kill that. And for what? The glory of Noxus? Glory’s a pretty lie, and I fell for it. But no more. Kayn’s shown me a different path, and it leads to vengeance.”
- Royce, The Butcher’s journal
06NX019.name: Noxian Defector

06PZ033.description: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
06PZ033.flavorText:
"Location: Sector 3, Underway 19B
Item: Illegal Firearm
Notes: Confiscated during Operation: Sumplight. Weapon is highly dangerous. Handle with extreme care."
- Piltover Warden field report
06PZ033.name: Gatalyst v1.0

06BW042.description: Deal 2 to a unit. Draw 1 at the next Round Start for each damage dealt and give them Fleeting.
06BW042.flavorText: "Rex'll take care of the boom, don't you worry - an' I'll take care of the treasure. I'll take care of Rex's share too, elsewise he'll try to put it in the cannon, an' that's always a mess." - Petty Officer
06BW042.name: Loaded Vessel

06PZ034.description: Deal 5 to a unit. If I kill it, Obliterate it.
06PZ034.flavorText: For some creatures, death just isn't enough.
06PZ034.name: Hexbliterator

06DE033.description: Destroy a unit's equipment, and if it's a follower, Silence it.
06DE033.flavorText: "You've brought this upon yourself." - Lord Eldred, Mageseeker Leader
06DE033.name: Silence and Suppress

06IO001.description: When I'm summoned, create a Preparation in hand.
06IO001.flavorText:
"I have learned what knowledge I could to continue this sacred art. As for Doran, and his master, and his master before him... I hope their spirits will guide my hammer."
- Disciple of Doran, handwritten scroll
06IO001.name: Disciple of Doran

06IO001T1.description: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1.
06IO001T1.flavorText:
"A warrior is only as able as they are prepared."
- Wuju words of wisdom
06IO001T1.name: Preparation

06IO014.description: Nexus Strike: Recall me and transform me into Shimon Wind
06IO014.flavorText: Ting grinned as the attackers flooded the temple. Finally, a chance to prove himself! First Wukong, then Yi... both had dismissed his talents. Let the others run to find their "master"! He was ready. He was the Shimon Wind.
06IO014.name: Vastayan Disciple

06IO014T1.description: Summon a Vastayan Disciple and draw 1.
06IO014T1.name: Shimon Wind

06IO011.description: The first time I am Equipped, give me Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
06IO011.flavorText: At his signal, Jun unleashed a series of blows as precise as any Yi would have made himself. Though he deftly avoided the attack, he bowed before her, pride in his smile.
06IO011.name: Jun, the Prodigy

06IO008.description: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1 this round and Flow: Grant all allied Master Yis everywhere +2|+0.
06IO008.flavorText: Master Yi's mind drifted to the Darkin weapon. Ever since its discovery, he'd been troubled by a terrible sense of foreboding. Some of his students had taken a keen interest–too keen–so he had the curved blades placed under guard, deep within the temple. With some effort, he pushed those thoughts from his mind and continued his meditation. Passing on the teachings of Wuju was all that mattered, and Jun showed great promise.
06IO008.name: Master Yi

06IO008T1.description:
Attack: I immediately strike the weakest enemy. 
Round Start: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1 this round and Flow: Grant all allied Master Yis everywhere +2|+0.
06IO008T1.flavorText: From the corner of his eye, Yi saw the flash of steel and heard the unmistakable thud of a lifeless body. Could it have been her? How could he have failed his pupils so utterly? They were untrained and unprepared. But he was a master of Wuju, and neither shame nor shadow would win the day.
06IO008T1.name: Master Yi

06IO008T2.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create Meditate in hand. Create a Master Yi in your deck.
06IO008T2.name: Master Yi's Wuju Style

06IO013.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Meditate in hand.
06IO013.name: Wuju Style

06BC033.flavorText: "Behold! From the ruins of a sunken ferry, I fetched the boxing glove. From the depths of the city they call Zaun, I recovered springs, and from the forges of Demacia, I found metal! This is truly a creation of the world!" - Paparo the Great
06BC033.name: Mechapulverizer

06PZ040.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a Back Alley Barkeep.
Your new cards cost 1 less.
06PZ040.flavorText: After drying the last of the glasses, the barkeep took a moment to look over his place. This spot, this home from home, had seen so many strangers become friends, and wore the graffiti and dents from many a wild night. The barkeep smiled to himself. It wasn't a perfect place, but it was his.
06PZ040.name: Back Alley Bar

06MT006.description:
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Horazi.
06MT006.flavorText: Perhaps those who imprisoned the Darkin thought that burying the legendary warrior Horazi within an orb of star metal would sufficiently dim her irascible will. But as her general stirred, so too did Horazi, who found that even Targon's ancient protectors could be tempted by promises whispered from afar.
06MT006.name: The Darkin Lodestone

06MT006T2.description: Support: Grow my supported ally's stats to mine. Give it my positive keywords this round.
06MT006T2.flavorText: Horazi was gifted a higher perspective in the burning celestial matter that imprisoned her. She glimpsed the secrets of the cosmos, and of the infinite passage of time that preceded and followed her existence. She learned so much, and yet her hatred for the coward Xolaani remained.
06MT006T2.name: Horazi

06MT037.description: Obliterate an ally and create a Corrupted Form with its stats.
06MT037.flavorText: The fallen god-warriors entombed in these weapons could not be easily defeated, and so instead were contained.
06MT037.name: Seal In Steel

06MT037T1.flavorText: While the Darkin were entombed in the weapons they carried, they slowly changed until they resembled nothing of their original form.
06MT037T1.name: Corrupted Form

06BC015T3.description: Summon a random 2 or 3 cost follower. If your board is full, create a 0 cost Fleeting copy in hand instead.
06BC015T3.flavorText: Another mysterious portal... where would this one lead?
06BC015T3.name: Mysterious Portal

06BC011.description: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck and plant 3 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
06BC011.flavorText: Wandering through the various realms as he pleases, Bard listens, knowing that a great conflict approaches - one that could silence the song of creation.
06BC011.name: Magical Journey

06BC020.description: Give me +1|+0 for each of your traps or boons that was activated this round.
06BC020.flavorText: The magic of papercraft can be somewhat unpredictable. It is as much about the intention that goes into creating something new as the creation's desire to be shaped.
06BC020.name: Origami Slicer

06BC019.description: When I'm summoned, plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
06BC019.flavorText: Ashane was once a renowned tea maker before finding herself lost in Realm’s End. While experimenting with new flavors, an unfortunate blend of two leaves had put her into a deep sleep--she dreamed strange dreams about odd creatures and impossible structures, silhouetted against an endless horizon. But upon waking, she discovered it had been no dream at all.
06BC019.name: The Tea Maker

06BC021.description: Last Breath: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
06BC021.flavorText: He’d only been born the day before, but Marv--as Norra affectionally called him--took great pride in serving as her assistant. However, he sternly insisted on being referred to as "junk" and not "trash", as the latter held a negative connotation.
06BC021.name: Junk Construct

06BC015.description: Nexus Strike: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
06BC015.flavorText: Norra’s worked quickly, thoughts of home in mind. Portalwork was notoriously tricky business, and she hadn’t even had her first cup of tea yet. But Norra loved a good puzzle, especially the type that found her hopelessly lost in pocket dimensions between space and time. She worked faster, thinking fondly of her cat, who would be worried and expecting dinner.
06BC015.name: Norra

06BC015T2.description:
Your Mysterious Portals now summon 4, 5, 6, or 7 cost followers instead.
Nexus Strike: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
06BC015T2.flavorText: With a whiz and a snap, the totem’s various bits and bobs sprang to life, a knick-knack spinning here, a doohickey flashing there. As the room rumbled and groaned, a portal materialized high above, and the vague silhouette of cat ears appeared within. Norra squealed, spilling her tea in delight. Had she finally found the way home?
06BC015T2.name: Norra

06BC015T1.description:
Plant 2 Mysterious Portals randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw 1.
Create a Norra in your deck.
06BC015T1.flavorText:
“I ought to take the Low Roads more often! Silly me, I always forget to mind my head...“
- Norra
06BC015T1.name: Norra's Portalpalooza

06BC017.description: Plant 2 Mysterious Portals randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw 1.
06BC017.flavorText:
“I ought to take the Low Roads more often! Silly me, I always forget to mind my head...“
- Norra
06BC017.name: Portalpalooza

06BC024.description: Each round, the first time one of your traps or boons activate, give all allies +1|+1 and Impact this round.
06BC024.flavorText: Gaspar was the first yordle to arrive in Realm’s End. For many years, he wandered alone amidst the twisting paths and portals that all seemed to lead nowhere. Having decided that no one should ever have to do the same, he now helps other lost travelers find their way home.
06BC024.name: Realm's Caretaker

06BC016.description: When I'm summoned, if one of your traps or boons has activated this round, draw 1.
06BC016.flavorText: Considering it his duty to possess immense knowledge, he collects tomes from various travelers who have passed through Realm’s End. Unfortunately, all of this knowledge appears to have gone to his head.
06BC016.name: Living Library

06BC032.description: For each ally, plant a Mysterious Portal and 3 Chimes in the top 10 cards of your deck and plant a Flashbomb Trap and 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
06BC032.name: Eclectic Collection

06RU010.flavorText: This wrench is the only belonging Pesh brought with him when he made the move from Piltover to Bilgewater. It’s not magic or anything, though you might think otherwise when you see him put it to work.
06RU010.name: The Fix-Em 5000

06RU012.flavorText: The flavors in this pot are so good it hurts.
06RU012.name: Pot O' Pain

06RU028.flavorText: Her spectral guardian bursts from the amulet whenever Fireth is in danger. She seems to have no memory of these events, and aggressively denies its existence when her allies try to explain.
06RU028.name: Sandworn Amulet

06RU029.flavorText: Catch and release is an excellent tactic whether you're fishing or fighting.
06RU029.name: Fishawhack

06RU030.flavorText: Fireth says her mother made this rake for her. Exactly where her mother found an artifact of the ancient empire, and exactly why she attached it to a rake, Fireth cannot say.
06RU030.name: Upcycled Rake

06RU031.flavorText: Chaska takes a philosophical approach to shepherding. Their flock is whomever happens to be in the vicinity.
06RU031.name: Shepherd's Authority

06RU033.flavorText: The monks of Hirana send unruly students to the fisherfolk for a lesson in patience. Only a handful ever choose to return to the monastery.
06RU033.name: Combat Reel

06RU034.flavorText: Do NOT wash it with soap. Warm water or magic only.
06RU034.name: Pan O' Pain

06SI003.flavorText: Jax asked for Fireth’s name two dozen times in their first weeks of travel together, but she would only ever growl, “I am the Reaper!”. Breshi found a novel solution—he’d just baked a cake, you see, and needed the name of the group’s strongest member to properly celebrate.
06SI003.name: Fireth, Reaper of the Sands

06NX023.flavorText: Trisk’s life was turned upside down when, during what would be her last fishing tournament, she somehow managed to fish up a sputtering Jax. He refuses to discuss the incident, but the sea monster Trisk rescued him from gets bigger each time she retells it.
06NX023.name: Ionian Hookmaster

06BW027.description: To play, discard 1. Draw 2 and if you discarded an equipment, summon a Icathian Mirage.
06BW027.flavorText: Jax’s crew is proof that a whole can be greater than the sum of its parts. Still, Pesh insists on a different philosophy: sometimes, parts are pretty great on their own.
06BW027.name: Parts Made Whole

06SI031.description: Give an ally "Last Breath: Summon a Icathian Mirage with my equipment" this round.
06SI031.flavorText: Sometimes, the best you can do for a fallen ally is to take up their weapon and continue the fight.
06SI031.name: Blades of the Fallen

06SI031T1.flavorText: Perhaps they are a mirage. Perhaps she and hers hail from a remote, hidden village. She says nothing of her origin, and Jax does not ask. But when she rises from the sands and stands beside him, they fight in perfect, soundless, impossible harmony.
06SI031T1.name: Icathian Mirage

06BW029.flavorText: Pesh met Jax in a dockside brawl, and their timely escape was more convenience than partnership. But Pesh has been ferrying Jax about ever since, because things break around Jax, and if there’s one thing Pesh likes more than a good scrap, it’s a break in need of fixing.
06BW029.name: Piltovan Castaway

06MT004.description: Play: Pick an ally, it Improvises. If you don't, I Improvise.
06MT004.flavorText: Jax helped Chaska rescue their herd from rampaging faefolk. Then, Chaska rescued Jax from rampaging faefolk. They travel together whenever one of them doesn’t wander off.
06MT004.name: Wandering Shepherd

06DE024.description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round or equip it with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less.
06DE024.flavorText: This move is more painful if the party hasn't eaten yet.
06DE024.name: Catch!

06RU008.description:
Origin: Grandmaster at Arms.
Auto-Equip: The Light of Icathia.
06RU008.levelupDescription: Equipped allies have struck for 15+ damage.
06RU008.flavorText: Centuries ago, Jax lost his homeland to the Void. Now, he travels the world, searching for warriors with the strength of will--and the sheer gall--to one day stand against that terrible foe.
06RU008.name: Jax

06RU008T5.description: You may put any Weaponmaster cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
06RU008T5.name: Grandmaster at Arms

06RU008T6.description: If Jax has leveled, The Light of Icathia has Overwhelm.
06RU008T6.flavorText: "It's a stick with a heavy bit at the end. Weapon enough for me." - Jax
06RU008T6.name: The Light of Icathia

06RU008T7.description:
Auto-Equip The Light of Icathia.
Attack: Give me +1|+1 for each equipped ally this round.
06RU008T7.flavorText: "Icathia's been quiet a long time. But while I'm still standin', her people's roar will echo forever!" - Jax
06RU008T7.name: Jax

06RU008T8.description:
Give Jax Barrier this round and Forge him.
Shuffle a Jax into your deck.
06RU008T8.flavorText: "That's right, eyes on the champ!" - Jax
06RU008T8.name: Jax's Counter Strike

06BC047.description: Give an equipped ally the stats and keywords of its attachment this round and equip the attachment to another ally.
06BC047.flavorText: You’d think a shepherd would have no place on the battlefield, but the skillset has surprising utility. You just have to think about all the combatants as sheep in need of herding.
06BC047.name: Sharesies

06IO028.description: Give an ally Challenger this round. If it's Equipped, draw 1.
06IO028.flavorText: Everything's hungry for the right bait.
06IO028.name: Entrancing Lure

06FR032.description: Heal your Nexus 4 and grant all allies and equipment in your deck +1|+1. Draw 1 of them.
06FR032.flavorText: "Come, warm yourself by the fire." - Hearthblood Mender
06FR032.name: Gift of the Hearthblood

06SI006.description: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, grant me Lifesteal.
06SI006.flavorText: "The Box does not give its secrets freely, Shieda Kayn. They come at a grim price. But if you have the courage to gaze into the shadow of shadows, you will find that wonderful, terrible things lay within." - Ysdra, Keeper of the Box
06SI006.name: Keeper of the Box

06SI007.description:
To play me, kill an ally.
You may spend 10 mana to play me as Taarosh.
06SI007.flavorText: Straining against the confines of his cell, Taarosh heard his general's call. He would answer it, one way or another.
06SI007.name: The Darkin Halberd

06SI007T1.description: Each round, the first time I attack, fill your attackers with revived Ephemeral copies of the strongest followers you've slain this game.
06SI007T1.flavorText: Legend says Taarosh was mere moments from destroying Xolaani when the Darkin were set upon by the Targonians. As centuries passed, he sensed the land around him become corrupted, tainted with rot and perpetual stench of death. How he dreamt of steeping Xolaani in this same suffering once he'd claimed his freedom.
06SI007T1.name: Taarosh

06SI029.description: If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
06SI029.flavorText: "There can be no justice... only revenge." - Kalista
06SI029.name: Malefic Spear

06SI032.description: Kill a unit with 2 or less power or destroy a unit's equipment.
06SI032.flavorText: However death manifests on the Shadow Isles, may it be blessedly swift.
06SI032.name: Quietus

06DE006.description: When I'm summoned, I Improvise and Forge me.
06DE006.flavorText: After his time in the Demacian military, Breshi thought he’d retire and cook at a quiet hamlet tavern. Jax ruined this retirement with a tavern brawl and a particularly bad opinion on hardboiled eggs. Since then, Breshi’s embraced a new lot in life: teaching Jax some taste.
06DE006.name: Combat Cook

06FR004.description: The first time you equip an ally, Forge it.
06FR004.flavorText: Ornn made the living forge many, many years ago, and only went looking for it recently. He never once thought it might go looking for a new owner and wander off on its own.
06FR004.name: Weaponsmith's Apprentice

06FR008.description: Play: Forge an ally and heal it and your Nexus 3.
06FR008.flavorText: The Hearthblood were gone, all of them, when Ornn decided to leave the world. Generations passed and their name was all but forgotten. More recently, however, the tales of Ornn resurfaced, and it was whispered that some had begun to return to the way of the Hearthblood.
06FR008.name: Hearthblood Mender

06FR009.flavorText: When Fiske had first envisioned an apprentice, he imagined someone dedicated, serious about their craft, strong, and capable. Kindra was none of those things. She was prone to daydreaming. She would rather play than work. She was always fussing with that silly little turtle of hers. However... she was learning. That was what mattered.
06FR009.name: Adept Weaponsmith

06FR012.description: When I'm summoned, create a Time and Dedication in hand.
06FR012.flavorText: "My mother told me of Ornn, as her mother told her, and her mother before... and now I will tell you. Listen closely. Do not interrupt. Long ago, across a great, hot, churning sea..."
06FR012.name: Favored Artisan

06FR012T1.flavorText: "You may be worthy of this. Do not prove me wrong." - Ornn
06FR012T1.name: Time and Dedication

06DE032.flavorText: The standard sword and shield of choice for Demacia's helmeted brothers-in-arms.
06DE032.name: Demacian Steel

06FR011.description:
Play: Equip me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the strongest equipment from hand.
Attack: Forge me twice.
06FR011.levelupDescription: An ally has struck for 10+ damage.
06FR011.flavorText: If anyone asked Ornn why he had so little patience, he would answer simply that he did have patience. Tremendous patience, in fact, and that was why his work was incomparable. He simply did not have patience for PEOPLE. But nobody asked, and so he never answered.
06FR011.name: Ornn

06FR011T1.description:
Play: Equip me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the strongest equipment from hand.
Attack: Forge me twice, then summon an attacking Spirit of the Ram with my stats.
06FR011T1.flavorText: Some believe that when the world truly needs him, the chosen of Ornn will finally be able to find their god. Isn't that just the way of withdrawn, ornery gods? To be found only in the very last place you look?
06FR011T1.name: Ornn

06FR011T4.flavorText: "What remains after the fire is either forged, or melted. Better to be steel that takes shape than... something that burns away!" - Ornn
06FR011T4.name: Spirit of the Ram

06FR011T2.description:
Forge an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
Create a Ornn in deck.
06FR011T2.flavorText: "An iron will must be forged!" - Ornn
06FR011T2.name: Ornn's Bellows Breath

06FR022.description: Forge an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
06FR022.flavorText: "An iron will must be forged!" - Ornn
06FR022.name: Bellows Breath

06FR005.description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Fleeting Time and Dedication in hand.
06FR005.flavorText: Alone in Hearth-Home's forge with nothing but the sound of the molten river's slow coursing below, and the ring of Hammer on anvil... he quite liked that.
06FR005.name: Ornn's Forge

06FR023.description: The first time I'm Equipped, create a copy of me in hand. Grant it the equipment's stats.
06FR023.flavorText: Though he would not admit it, Ornn was quite pleased with the colossi. They served the exact purpose he assigned to them, and best of all, they did not speak.
06FR023.name: Wrought Colossus

06BW034.description: Destroy a unit's equipment and deal 2 to it.
06BW034.flavorText: "WHO THROWS AN ANCHOR IN A BAR FIGHT?! WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU LOT?!!" - Bilgewater Bartender
06BW034.name: Heavy Metal

06SI036.description: Kill all units except allied Darkin and allied Equipped units.
06SI036.flavorText: As she took hold of the weapons, her humanity fled, and in its place a hateful essence filled the emptying vessel that was once the student Jun. It washed through her, over her, around her, and out into the world, stirring the slumbering Darkin.
06SI036.name: Utter Devastation

06SH004.description:
Last Breath: If my bearer is not a Darkinthrall, summon a Darkinthrall.
You may spend 6 mana to play me as Xolaani.
06SH004.flavorText: As the fighting raged on, Jun, desperate and badly wounded, turned to the voice whispering in her thoughts. "You will never die," it said, soft as summer rain, "because I will never let you."
06SH004.name: The Darkin Bloodletters

06SH004T1.description: The first time I'm Equipped grant me +2|+2.
06SH004T1.flavorText: Long did these devoted few tend their lady's temples. Long did they sweep back the sands and expel would-be desecrators. Long did they pray for her return. Her kindness. Her control.
06SH004T1.name: Darkinthrall

06SH004T2.description:
To play me, kill an ally.
Last Breath: Create a The Darkin Bloodletters in hand.
06SH004T2.flavorText: Shurima's Ascended were doomed the moment they took up arms against the Void. This was an enemy that could never be beaten, and while the god-warriors were all but guaranteed immortality, their minds were never as resilient. Madness consumed them all. Xolaani, once a beloved and gifted healer, began using her hemomantic powers to control her brethren, and soon enough, the hatred between her and Aatrox boiled over into civil war.
06SH004T2.name: Xolaani
